CHAPTER_NN I_PRP ._.
INTRODUCTORY_NNP ._.
Appointment_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP :_: its_PRP$ object_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT Indian_JJ Hemp_NNP Drugs_NNP Commission_NNP was_VBD appointed_VBN under_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP the_DT Governor-General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP contained_VBD in_IN the_DT Resolution_NNP of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Finance_NNP and_CC Commerce_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
2792-Ex._JJ ,_, dated_VBD 3rd_CD July_NNP 1893_CD ._.
In_IN a_DT despatch_NN No_NNP ._.
36_CD (_( Revenue_NNP )_) ,_, dated_VBD 16th_CD March_NNP 1893_CD ,_, Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP informed_VBD the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP that_IN in_IN answer_NN to_TO a_DT question*_NN put_VBN in_IN the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS he_PRP had_VBD express-_JJ ed_IN his_PRP$ willingness_NN to_TO request_VB the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP to_TO appoint_VB a_DT Commission_NNP to_TO inquire_VB into_IN the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, the_DT preparation_NN of_IN drugs_NNS from_IN it_PRP ,_, the_DT trade_NN in_IN those_DT drugs_NNS ,_, the_DT effect_NN of_IN their_PRP$ consumption_NN upon_IN the_DT social_JJ and_CC moral_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT desir-_JJ ability_NN of_IN prohibiting_VBG the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN and_CC the_DT sale_NN of_IN ganja_NN and_CC allied_VBD drugs_NNS ._.
In_IN requesting_VBG the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP to_TO appoint_VB a_DT Commission_NNP for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS stated_VBN ,_, the_DT Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP desired_VBD that_IN such_JJ instructions_NNS might_MD be_VB issued_VBN as_IN would_MD ensure_VB that_IN the_DT inquiry_NN should_MD be_VB thorough_JJ and_CC complete_JJ ._.
Lord_NNP Kimberley_NNP was_VBD of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT inquiry_NN could_MD hardly_RB be_VB confined_VBN to_TO Ben-_NNP gal_NN ,_, but_CC should_MD extend_VB to_TO the_DT whole_NN of_IN India_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT Commission_NNP should_MD ascertain_VB to_TO what_WP extent_VB the_DT existence_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN all_DT over_IN India_NNP affects_VBZ the_DT practical_JJ difficulty_NN of_IN checking_VBG or_CC stopping_VBG the_DT consumption_NN of_IN ganja_NN as_IN dis-_JJ tinguished_VBN from_IN other_JJ narcotic_JJ drugs_NNS prepared_VBN from_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ,_, and_CC whether_IN there_EX is_VBZ ground_NN for_IN the_DT statement_NN that_IN bhang_NN is_VBZ less_RBR injurious_JJ than_IN ganja_NN to_TO con-_JJ sumers_NNS ._.
Constitution_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP Resolution_NNP of_IN 3rd_CD July_NNP 1893_CD consisted_VBD of_IN a_DT President_NNP and_CC six_CD Mem-_JJ bers_NNS ,_, three_CD of_IN whom_WP were_VBD officials_NNS and_CC three_CD Native_NNP non-official_JJ gentlemen_NNS ._.
Under_IN subsequent_JJ orders_NNS ,_, a_DT Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Commis-_NNP sion_NN was_VBD appointed.2_JJ REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._.
Instructions_NNS to_TO the_DT CommissionCH_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._. ]_VB
REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
3_CD employed_VBN for_IN taxing_VBG the_DT drug_NN or_CC the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN should_MD be_VB reviewed_VBN with_IN special_JJ reference_NN to_TO the_DT comparative_JJ incidence_NN of_IN this_DT taxation_NN in_IN differ-_JJ ent_NN parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP and_CC to_TO the_DT comparative_JJ efficacy_NN of_IN the_DT taxation_NN imposed_VBN in_IN restricting_VBG consumption_NN ,_, whether_IN by_IN the_DT mere_JJ weight_NN of_IN the_DT tax_NN or_CC by_IN the_DT method_NN and_CC stage_NN of_IN imposition_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ known_VBN that_IN the_DT rates_NNS vary_VBP considerably_RB in_IN different_JJ provinces_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT precise_JJ effect_NN of_IN the_DT variations_NNS is_VBZ not_RB fully_RB understood_JJ ._.
In_IN this_DT connection_NN the_DT Commissioners_NNPS should_MD notice_VB any_DT case_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT proxi-_JJ mity_NN of_IN a_DT Native_NNP State_NNP affects_VBZ the_DT production_NN or_CC consumption_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN in_IN British_JJ territory_NN ._.
(_( d_NN )_) Political_NNP discontent_NN ,_, social_JJ or_CC religious_JJ usage_NN ,_, and_CC other_JJ stimu-_JJ lants_NNS or_CC narcotics_NNS ._.
``_`` There_EX are_VBP two_CD points_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT subject-matter_NN of_IN the_DT inquiry_NN which_WDT call_NN for_IN special_JJ investigation_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ of_IN these_DT is_VBZ the_DT danger_NN lest_JJS prohibition_NN ,_, or_CC restrictive_JJ measures_NNS of_IN a_DT stringent_JJ character_NN ,_, may_MD give_VB rise_NN to_TO serious_JJ discontent_NN ,_, and_CC be_VB resented_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS as_IN an_DT unjustifiable_JJ interference_NN with_IN long-established_JJ social_JJ customs_NNS ._.
In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS is_VBZ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN ,_, common_JJ among_IN fakirs_NNS and_CC ascetics_NNS held_VBD in_IN veneration_NN by_IN large_JJ classes_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN ._.
In_IN Bengal_NNP it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN stated_VBN that_IN an_DT infusion_NN of_IN the_DT leaves_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ commonly_RB offered_VBN to_TO every_DT guest_NN and_CC member_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN on_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT Durga_NNP Puja_NNP :_: it_PRP has_VBZ no_DT ill_JJ effects_NNS ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ use_NN is_VBZ not_RB considered_VBN reprehensible_JJ in_IN any_DT way_NN ._.
The_DT Governor-General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP desires_VBZ that_IN the_DT Commissioners_NNPS will_MD endeavour_VB to_TO ascertain_VB to_TO what_WP extent_VB these_DT and_CC similar_JJ customs_NNS prevail_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP and_CC other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP ,_, and_CC how_WRB far_RB the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS forms_VBZ a_DT part_NN of_IN social_JJ ,_, or_CC possibly_RB religious_JJ ,_, ceremonial_JJ or_CC observance_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP should_MD ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, take_VB the_DT evidence_NN of_IN witnesses_NNS drawn_VBN from_IN the_DT classes_NNS among_IN whom_WP the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS is_VBZ chiefly_JJ prevalent_NN ._.
The_DT Commissioners_NNPS should_MD state_NN their_PRP$ opinion_NN whether_IN the_DT prohibition_NN of_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS or_CC any_DT restrictive_JJ measures_NNS which_WDT they_PRP may_MD deem_VB practicable_JJ would_MD be_VB likely_RB to_TO give_VB rise_NN to_TO political_JJ discontent_NN in_IN any_DT parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP or_CC among_IN any_DT classes_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN bhang_NN is_VBZ ,_, in_IN a_DT special_JJ degree_NN ,_, the_DT poor_JJ man_NN 's_POS narcotic_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT possible_JJ unpopularity_NN of_IN a_DT measure_NN which_WDT would_MD deprive_VB the_DT very_RB poorest_JJS of_IN the_DT population_NN of_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN a_DT narcotic_JJ to_TO which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP always_RB been_VBN accustomed_VBN should_MD not_RB be_VB overlooked_VBN ._.
``_`` Another_DT point_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT Commissioners_NNP should_MD be_VB directed_VBN is_VBZ the_DT probability_NN or_CC possibility_NN that_IN ,_, if_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS is_VBZ prohi-_JJ bited_JJ ,_, those_DT who_WP would_MD otherwise_VB continue_NN to_TO use_VB them_PRP may_MD be_VB driven_VBN to_TO have_VB recourse_NN to_TO alcohol_VB ,_, or_CC to_TO other_JJ stimulants_NNS or_CC narcotics_NNS which_WDT may_MD be_VB more_JJR dele-_JJ terious_JJ ._.
(_( e_NN )_) Recommendations_NNPS of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ._.
``_`` Finally_RB ,_, the_DT Governor-General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP requests_NNS that_IN the_DT Commis-_NNP sioners_NNS ,_, if_IN they_PRP should_MD be_VB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT pro-_JJ hibition_NN of_IN the_DT consumption_NN of_IN any_DT hemp_JJ drug_NN should_MD not_RB ,_, or_CC could_MD not_RB ,_, be_VB enforced_VBN ,_, will_MD indicate_VB ,_, for_IN the_DT consideration_NN of_IN the_DT Gov-_NNP ernment_NN of_IN India_NNP ,_, any_DT reforms_NNS and_CC improvements_NNS which_WDT their_PRP$ investigations_NNS may_MD lead_VB them_PRP to_TO recommend_VB in_IN the_DT existing_VBG arrangements_NNS of_IN each_DT province_NN for_IN controlling_VBG the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT manufacture_NN ,_, sale_NN ,_, and_CC taxation_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.
In_IN framing_VBG their_PRP$ recommendations_NNS ,_, regard_NN should_MD ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, be_VB had_VBN to_TO the_DT considerations_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN stated_VBN in_IN paragraphs_NN 7_CD and_CC 8_CD of_IN this_DT Resolution_NNP ._.
Absolute_NNP prohibition_NN ,_, or_CC repressive_JJ measures_NNS of_IN a_DT stringent_JJ nature_NN ,_, may_MD involve_VB inquisitorial_JJ proceedings_NNS of_IN an_DT unpopular_JJ character_NN ,_, and_CC 4_CD REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
I._NN afford_NN opportunities_NNS for_IN the_DT levy_NN of_IN blackmail_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN framing_JJ regulations_NNS for_IN the_DT prohibition_NN or_CC for_IN the_DT restriction_NN of_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ,_, these_DT considerations_NNS should_MD be_VB borne_VBN in_IN mind_NN ._.
``_`` If_IN the_DT Commission_NNP should_MD be_VB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN for_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN drugs_NNS ,_, or_CC the_DT consumption_NN of_IN any_DT hemp_JJ drug_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB absolutely_RB prohibited_VBN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB their_PRP$ duty_NN to_TO state_NN the_DT regulations_NNS which_WDT should_MD be_VB adopted_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ._. ''_''
Commission_NNP 's_POS method_NN of_IN inquiry_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
Under_IN the_DT terms_NNS of_IN the_DT Resolution_NNP appointing_VBG the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, they_PRP were_VBD directed_VBN to_TO assemble_VB in_IN Calcutta_NNP on_IN the_DT 1st_CD August_NNP 1893_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ collective_JJ meeting_NN of_IN the_DT Com-_NNP mission_NN actually_RB took_VBD place_NN on_IN the_DT 3rd_CD August_NNP 1893_CD ._.
A_DT series_NN of_IN questions_NNS was_VBD drawn_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT Commission_NNP for_IN distribution_NN to_TO witnesses_NNS ._.
The_DT series_NN of_IN ques-_JJ tions_NNS was_VBD prefaced_VBN by_IN an_DT explanatory_JJ note_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD carefully_RB pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN they_PRP were_VBD not_RB to_TO be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN exhaustive_JJ ,_, but_CC were_VBD intended_VBN rather_RB to_TO serve_VB as_IN an_DT index_NN to_TO the_DT witnesses_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT subjects_NNS to_TO which_WDT their_PRP$ attention_NN should_MD be_VB specially_RB directed_VBN ._.
The_DT witnesses_NNS were_VBD requested_VBN not_RB to_TO withhold_VB any_DT information_NN merely_RB because_IN it_PRP was_VBD not_RB indicated_VBN by_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT questions_NNS ._.
They_PRP were_VBD invited_VBN to_TO give_VB any_DT information_NN which_WDT did_VBD not_RB appear_VB to_TO fall_VB under_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT questions_NNS ,_, either_RB by_IN appending_VBG it_PRP as_IN a_DT separate_JJ note_NN to_TO the_DT chapter_NN under_IN which_WDT it_PRP seemed_VBD naturally_RB to_TO fall_VB ,_, or_CC by_IN recording_VBG it_PRP at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT evidence_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT questions_NNS were_VBD necessarily_RB of_IN wide_JJ and_CC general_JJ application_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN it_PRP was_VBD not_RB intended_VBN that_IN in_IN every_DT case_NN the_DT witness_NN should_MD answer_VB all_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_, but_CC should_MD confine_VB himself_PRP to_TO those_DT questions_NNS which_WDT dealt_VBP with_IN parts_NNS of_IN the_DT subject_NN with_IN which_WDT he_PRP was_VBD more_RBR or_CC less_RBR acquainted_VBN ;_: and_CC ,_, to_TO enable_VB the_DT Com-_NNP mission_NN to_TO estimate_VB the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT information_NN given_VBN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD requested_VBN that_IN the_DT witness_NN should_MD indicate_VB the_DT source_NN of_IN his_PRP$ information_NN and_CC the_DT facts_NNS or_CC experi-_JJ ences_NNS on_IN which_WDT he_PRP based_VBN his_PRP$ opinions_NNS and_CC statements_NNS ._.
Invitation_NN to_TO persons_NNS interested_JJ to_TO lay_VB their_PRP$ views_NNS before_IN the_DT Com-_NNP mission_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
Previous_JJ to_TO issuing_VBG their_PRP$ series_NN of_IN questions_NNS to_TO Local_JJ Governments_NNS and_CC Administrations_NNS for_IN distribution_NN to_TO witnesses_NNS ,_, the_DT Com-_NNP mission_NN had_VBD intimated_VBN to_TO them_PRP that_IN they_PRP were_VBD anxious_JJ to_TO receive_VB evidence_NN from_IN well-informed_JJ persons_NNS and_CC representative_JJ associa-_JJ tions_NNS ,_, whether_IN philanthropic_NN ,_, religious_JJ ,_, or_CC social_JJ bodies_NNS ,_, who_WP desired_VBD to_TO see_VB the_DT pre-_JJ paration_NN and_CC sale_NN of_IN ganja_NN and_CC other_JJ hemp_NN drugs_NNS further_RBR restricted_VBD or_CC entirely_RB prohibited_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO give_VB such_JJ persons_NNS and_CC associations_NNS the_DT freest_JJS opportunity_NN of_IN coming_VBG forward_RB and_CC laying_VBG their_PRP$ views_NNS before_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ._.
To_TO enable_VB these_DT persons_NNS and_CC associations_NNS to_TO place_VB themselves_PRP in_IN communication_NN with_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, Local_JJ Governments_NNS and_CC Administrations_NNS were_VBD requested_VBN to_TO make_VB it_PRP widely_RB known_VBN through_IN the_DT Press_NNP ,_, or_CC in_IN such_JJ other_JJ manner_NN as_IN might_MD be_VB suitable_JJ ,_, that_IN the_DT Commission_NNP would_MD be_VB glad_VBN to_TO receive_VB written_VBN statements_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ views_NNS ,_, accompanied_VBN by_IN an_DT intimation_NN as_IN to_TO whether_IN the_DT writer_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN an_DT asso-_JJ ciation_NN or_CC public_JJ body_NN ,_, a_DT representative_NN ,_, would_MD be_VB willing_JJ to_TO appear_VB before_IN the_DT Commission_NNP for_IN oral_JJ examination_NN ._.

6_CD ._.
In_IN circulating_VBG their_PRP$ questions_NNS to_TO Local_JJ Governments_NNS and_CC Administra-_NNP tions_NNS for_IN distribution_NN to_TO suitable_JJ witnesses_NNS ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP took_VBD pains_NNS to_TO explain_VB that_IN they_PRP attached_VBD much_RB importance_NN to_TO a_DT due_JJ proportion_NN of_IN non-official_JJ witnesses_NNS being_VBG selected_VBN ,_, and_CC requested_VBD that_IN in_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN copies_NNS of_IN the_DT questions_NNS should_MD be_VB supplied_VBN to_TO the_DT persons_NNS or_CC associations_NNS advocating_VBG restriction_NN who_WP might_MD have_VB availed_VBN them-_JJ selves_NNS of_IN the_DT invitation_NN to_TO come_VB forward_RB and_CC lay_VB their_PRP$ views_NNS before_IN the_DT Commis-_JJ sion_NN ._.

Regarding_VBG the_DT latter_JJ class_NN ,_, every_DT effort_NN was_VBD put_VBN forth_RB by_IN the_DT Commission_NNP to_TO obtain_VB missionary_JJ opinion_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN their_PRP$ inquiries_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT matter_NN of_IN some_DT regret_NN to_TO them_PRP that_IN their_PRP$ efforts_NNS have_VBP met_VBN with_IN but_CC little_JJ success_NN ._.
Not_RB only_RB was_VBD it_PRP announced_VBD through_IN Local_JJ Governments_NNS that_IN the_DT Commission_NNP desired_VBD to_TO receive_VB communications_NNS from_IN religious_JJ bodies_NNS of_IN all_DT denominations_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT Commission_NNP themselves_PRP also_RB com-_VBP municated_VBN freely_RB with_IN persons_NNS of_IN this_DT class_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT large_JJ majority_NN of_IN them_PRP declined_VBD to_TO come_VB forward_RB as_IN witnesses_NNS ,_, and_CC many_JJ ,_, including_VBG Churchmen_NNS ,_, Dissent-_NNP ers_NNS ,_, and_CC Roman_NNP Catholics_NNPS ,_, communicated_VBD letters_NNS either_CC to_TO Government_NNP or_CC direct_VB to_TO the_DT Commission_NNP excusing_VBG themselves_PRP on_IN the_DT ground_NN of_IN want_NN of_IN knowledge_NN ._.
As_IN an_DT example_NN of_IN the_DT want_NN of_IN knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT subject_NN or_CC lack_NN of_IN interest_NN in_IN the_DT inquiry_NN evinced_VBN by_IN missionaries_NNS ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB observed_VBN that_IN in_IN one_CD instance_NN (_( in_IN the_DT Madras_NNP Presidency_NNP )_) the_DT Commission_NNP made_VBD over_IN 70_CD copies_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ questions_NNS to_TO two_CD sects_NNS of_IN missionaries_NNS professing_VBG to_TO represent_VB one-fifth_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ missionary_JJ enterprise_NN of_IN the_DT Madras_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
Yet_CC the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN missionaries_NNS in_IN this_DT Presidency_NN who_WP sent_VBD in_IN answers_NNS or_CC statements_NNS to_TO the_DT Commission_NNP (_( though_IN some_DT of_IN them_PRP quoted_VBD the_DT opinions_NNS of_IN others_NNS )_) was_VBD only_RB 15_CD ,_, many_JJ of_IN whom_WP do_VBP not_RB belong_VB to_TO either_DT of_IN the_DT two_CD sects_NNS referred_VBD to_TO ._.
Special_JJ instructions_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN regarding_VBG two_CD classes_NNS of_IN witnesses_NNS ._.
Firstly_RB ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO secure_VB compliance_NN with_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP that_IN the_DT evidence_NN of_IN medical_JJ experts_NNS should_MD be_VB freely_RB obtained_VBN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD requested_VBN that_IN the_DT questions_NNS should_MD be_VB distributed_VBN to_TO selected_VBN medical_JJ officers_NNS ,_, both_DT European_NNP and_CC Native_NNP ._.
Emphasis_NN was_VBD laid_VBN upon_IN the_DT importance_NN of_IN ascertaining_VBG the_DT views_NNS of_IN subordinate_JJ native_JJ medical_JJ officers_NNS whose_WP$ duties_NNS bring_VBP them_PRP into_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD suggested_VBN that_IN replies_NNS should_MD either_RB be_VB obtained_VBN separately_RB from_IN com-_JJ petent_NN officers_NNS of_IN this_DT class_NN ,_, or_CC that_IN they_PRP should_MD be_VB embodied_VBN in_IN the_DT replies_NNS received_VBN from_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ._.
The_DT evidence_NN of_IN private_JJ native_JJ medical_JJ practitioners_NNS of_IN repute_NN ,_, especially_RB of_IN those_DT practising_VBG after_IN native_JJ methods_NNS ,_, was_VBD also_RB solicited_VBN ._.

Information_NN from_IN official_NN and_CC other_JJ sources_NNS ._.
7_CD ._.

Preliminary_JJ tour_NN :_: Objects_NNS and_CC reasons_NNS ofCH_VBP ._.
I_PRP ._. ]_VB
REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
7_CD than_IN was_VBD at_IN first_JJ anticipated_VBN ._.
During_IN this_DT tour_NN this_DT Commission_NNP as_IN a_DT whole_JJ ,_, or_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS Sub-Committees_NNS of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, visited_VBD the_DT head-_JJ quarters_NNS of_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT more_RBR important_JJ Native_NNP States_NNPS to_TO make_VB arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT collection_NN of_IN information_NN in_IN these_DT States_NNS as_IN desired_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
Opportunity_NN was_VBD also_RB taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Commission_NNP at_IN this_DT period_NN of_IN their_PRP$ inquiries_NNS to_TO get_VB at_IN facts_NNS and_CC opinions_NNS in_IN an_DT informal_JJ way_NN ;_: and_CC with_IN this_DT object_NN in_IN view_NN many_JJ visits_NNS were_VBD made_VBN by_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, or_CC by_IN members_NNS of_IN the_DT Com-_NNP mission_NN (_( generally_RB unexpectedly_RB and_CC under_IN the_DT guidance_NN of_IN private_JJ persons_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN of_IN officials_NNS )_) ,_, to_TO see_VB cultivation_NN and_CC manufacture_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ,_, to_TO ware-_JJ houses_NNS and_CC to_TO shops_VB where_WRB these_DT drugs_NNS are_VBP stored_VBN and_CC sold_VBN ,_, and_CC to_TO religious_JJ places_NNS and_CC other_JJ places_NNS of_IN resort_NN where_WRB the_DT drugs_NNS are_VBP consumed_VBN in_IN some_DT form_NN or_CC other_JJ ._.
The_DT results_NNS of_IN these_DT inquiries_NNS were_VBD sometimes_RB recorded_VBN in_IN notes_NNS ,_, and_CC some-_JJ times_NNS in_IN the_DT statements_NNS of_IN persons_NNS who_WP were_VBD then_RB added_VBN to_TO the_DT list_NN of_IN witnesses_NNS ._.
Inquiries_NNS were_VBD also_RB held_VBN at_IN many_JJ asylums_NNS ,_, as_IN will_MD be_VB explained_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ paragraph_NN ,_, which_WDT deals_VBZ with_IN the_DT special_JJ inquiries_NNS made_VBN by_IN the_DT Commission_NNP in_IN this_DT direction_NN ._.
Lunatic_JJ Asylums_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP were_VBD especially_RB enjoined_VBN to_TO thoroughly_VB examine_VB the_DT testi-_JJ mony_NN in_IN support_NN of_IN the_DT commonly_RB received_JJ opinion_NN that_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS is_VBZ a_DT frequent_JJ cause_NN of_IN lunacy_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN this_DT object_NN have_VBP made_VBN very_RB searching_JJ inquiries_NNS ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO make_VB this_DT very_RB important_JJ branch_NN of_IN their_PRP$ labours_NNS as_IN complete_JJ and_CC searching_VBG as_IN possible_JJ ,_, the_DT procedure_NN adopted_VBN in_IN the_DT different_JJ asylums_NNS of_IN India_NNP in_IN classifying_VBG and_CC dealing_VBG with_IN cases_NNS of_IN insanity_NN ascribed_VBN to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS was_VBD specially_RB examined_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT connection_NN ,_, whether_IN causal_NN or_CC otherwise_RB ,_, between_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS and_CC insanity_NN was_VBD investigated_VBN in_IN minute_NN detail_NN ._.
Every_DT asylum_NN in_IN British_JJ India_NNP was_VBD visited_VBN either_RB by_IN the_DT Commission_NNP or_CC by_IN some_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Commis-_NNP sion_NN ,_, and_CC careful_JJ inquiries_NNS were_VBD conducted_VBN on_IN the_DT spot_NN in_IN every_DT case_NN of_IN insanity_NN attributed_VBN to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS for_IN a_DT given_VBN period_NN ._.
The_DT period_NN selected_VBN for_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN India_NNP was_VBD the_DT calendar_NN year_NN 1892_CD ,_, the_DT last_JJ year_NN for_IN which_WDT statistics_NNS were_VBD available_JJ at_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP 's_POS labours_NN ._.
Every_DT case_NN of_IN insanity_NN ascribed_VBN to_TO hemp_VB drugs_NNS in_IN the_DT asylums_NNS of_IN India_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN 1892_CD has_VBZ been_VBN specially_RB inquired_VBN into_IN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN where_WRB the_DT patient_NN was_VBD confined_VBN ,_, the_DT papers_NNS and_CC records_NNS of_IN the_DT case_NN have_VBP been_VBN thoroughly_RB examined_VBN ,_, and_CC instructions_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN to_TO have_VB a_DT further_JJ local_JJ inquiry_NN made_VBN by_IN an_DT ex-_JJ perienced_JJ Magistrate_NNP ,_, in_IN consultation_NN with_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT past_JJ personal_JJ and_CC family_NN history_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN and_CC any_DT circumstances_NNS likely_JJ to_TO throw_VB light_NN on_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN his_PRP$ insanity_NN ._.
The_DT record_NN of_IN this_DT inquiry_NN ,_, where_WRB made_VBN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN submitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Commission_NNP through_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT asylum_NN concerned_VBN ,_, who_WP has_VBZ thus_RB had_VBD an_DT opportunity_NN of_IN reconsidering_VBG the_DT case_NN with_IN fuller_NN information_NN before_IN him_PRP on_IN which_WDT to_TO base_VB an_DT opinion_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT insanity_NN ._.
Further_RB ,_, the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN insanity_NN and_CC the_DT method_NN of_IN preparing_VBG and_CC compiling_VBG these_DT statistics_NNS have_VBP been_VBN subjected_VBN to_TO a_DT rigid_JJ scrutiny_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT opportunity_NN has_VBZ been_VBN lost_VBN of_IN obtaining_VBG the_DT evidence_NN of_IN medical_JJ experts_NNS ,_, including_VBG Government_NNP officers_NNS ,_, private_JJ practitioners_NNS of_IN all_DT classes_NNS ,_, and_CC Superin-_JJ tendents_NNS of_IN Lunatic_NNP Asylums_NNP and_CC their_PRP$ subordinates_NNS ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN of_IN non-profes-_JJ sional_JJ persons_NNS ,_, as_IN to_TO the_DT relation_NN between_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS and_CC insanity_NN ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP have_VBP endeavoured_VBN to_TO investigate_VB and_CC weigh_VB the_DT popular_JJ as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT scientific_JJ view_NN of_IN this_DT subject_NN ._.
8_CD REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._.
Connection_NN between_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS and_CC violent_NN crime_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
In_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT alleged_VBN connection_NN between_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS and_CC violent_NN crime_NN ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, in_IN addition_NN to_TO sifting_VBG the_DT written_VBN and_CC oral_JJ evidence_NN ,_, have_VBP examined_VBN the_DT judicial_JJ and_CC other_JJ records_NNS of_IN cases_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN alluded_VBN to_TO by_IN the_DT witnesses_NNS as_IN forming_VBG the_DT basis_NN ,_, or_CC part_NN of_IN the_DT basis_NN ,_, on_IN which_WDT their_PRP$ opinions_NNS were_VBD framed_VBN ._.
Native_JJ States_NNS ._.
11_CD ._.
As_IN stated_VBN above_IN ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP were_VBD precluded_VBN by_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP from_IN holding_VBG formal_JJ sittings_NNS in_IN Native_NNP States_NNPS ,_, but_CC nevertheless_RB they_PRP have_VBP endeavour-_JJ ed_NN to_TO obtain_VB full_JJ and_CC complete_JJ information_NN from_IN all_PDT the_DT most_RBS important_JJ Native_JJ States_NNS in_IN India_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Native_NNP States_NNPS in_IN political_JJ relation_NN with_IN the_DT Gov-_NNP ernment_NN of_IN India_NNP ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, in_IN some_DT cases_NNS in_IN personal_JJ communication_NN with_IN the_DT Agent_NNP to_TO the_DT Governor-General_NNP or_CC the_DT Resident_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS by_IN letter_NN ,_, arranged_VBN for_IN the_DT collection_NN of_IN the_DT required_JJ information_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT larger_JJR Agencies_NNPS and_CC States_NNPS special_JJ officers_NNS were_VBD appointed_VBN ,_, through_IN the_DT courtesy_NN of_IN the_DT Agent_NNP to_TO the_DT Governor-General_NNP or_CC the_DT Darbar_NNP ,_, to_TO collect_VB and_CC compile_VB the_DT available_JJ information_NN ,_, and_CC much_RB useful_JJ information_NN has_VBZ thereby_RB been_VBN placed_VBN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT smaller_JJR States_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN States_NNP under_IN the_DT political_JJ control_NN of_IN Local_JJ Governments_NNP ,_, a_DT memo-_JJ randum_NN of_IN the_DT system_NN in_IN force_NN ,_, together_RB with_IN statistics_NNS so_RB far_RB as_IN avail-_JJ able_JJ ,_, has_VBZ generally_RB been_VBN furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT Political_JJ Agent_NN or_CC a_DT responsible_JJ officer_NN of_IN the_DT State_NNP ._.
Beyond_IN giving_VBG the_DT States_NNPS in_IN question_NN such_JJ advice_NN and_CC assistance_NN as_IN they_PRP desired_VBD in_IN respect_NN to_TO the_DT best_JJS methods_NNS of_IN conducting_VBG their_PRP$ inquiries_NNS ,_, indicating_VBG clearly_RB the_DT points_NNS on_IN which_WDT information_NN was_VBD desired_VBN and_CC supplying_VBG lists_NNS of_IN questions_NNS where_WRB required_VBN ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP did_VBD not_RB interfere_VB in_IN any_DT way_NN with_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN these_DT inquiries_NNS or_CC select_NN or_CC examine_NN witnesses_NNS for_IN themselves_PRP ._.
The_DT Army_NNP ._.
12_CD ._.

The_DT evidence_NN :_: Method_NN of_IN treat-_JJ ment_NN of14_JJ REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
I._IN the_DT Commission_NNP thought_VBD the_DT witness_NN could_MD give_VB further_JJR information_NN than_IN that_DT con-_JJ tained_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ paper_NN ._.
In_IN every_DT case_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT witness_NN was_VBD permitted_VBN ,_, if_IN he_PRP chose_VBD to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, to_TO supplement_VB his_PRP$ written_VBN paper_NN by_IN offering_VBG any_DT further_JJ evidence_NN relevant_NN to_TO the_DT inquiry_NN not_RB already_RB given_VBN by_IN him_PRP ._.
When_WRB a_DT witness_NN was_VBD orally_RB exa-_JJ mined_VBN ,_, his_PRP$ evidence_NN was_VBD taken_VBN down_RP by_IN a_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD not_RB recorded_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN question_NN and_CC answer_NN ,_, as_IN this_DT would_MD have_VB involved_VBN loss_NN of_IN time_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT narrative_JJ as_RB nearly_RB as_IN might_MD be_VB in_IN the_DT words_NNS used_VBN by_IN the_DT witness_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT evidence_NN was_VBD completed_VBN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD read_VBN over_IN to_TO him_PRP ,_, and_CC (_( after_IN any_DT necessary_JJ correction_NN )_) was_VBD admitted_VBN by_IN him_PRP to_TO be_VB correct_JJ ._.
This_DT evid-_JJ ence_NN ,_, as_IN thus_RB accepted_VBN by_IN the_DT witness_NN in_IN each_DT case_NN ,_, is_VBZ published_VBN immediately_RB beneath_IN his_PRP$ written_VBN evidence_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ supplementary_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN connection_NN with_IN which_WDT it_PRP requires_VBZ to_TO be_VB considered_VBN ._.
In_IN almost_RB every_DT province_NN some_DT witnesses_NNS were_VBD examined_VBN orally_RB who_WP had_VBD not_RB previously_RB submitted_VBN written_VBN papers_NNS ._.
These_DT were_VBD either_CC persons_NNS who_WP ,_, although_IN they_PRP had_VBD not_RB answered_VBN the_DT questions_NNS ,_, appeared_VBD to_TO the_DT Commission_NNP to_TO be_VB in_IN a_DT position_NN to_TO afford_VB information_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD invited_VBN by_IN the_DT Commission_NNP when_WRB they_PRP arrived_VBD in_IN the_DT province_NN to_TO appear_VB before_IN them_PRP ,_, or_CC they_PRP were_VBD persons_NNS who_WP volun-_VBP teered_VBN to_TO give_VB evidence_NN while_IN the_DT Commission_NNP were_VBD actually_RB holding_VBG their_PRP$ sittings_NNS in_IN the_DT province_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN officials_NNS who_WP were_VBD summoned_VBN to_TO appear_VB ,_, but_CC who_WP were_VBD unable_JJ to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, and_CC of_IN non-official_JJ witnesses_NNS who_WP were_VBD invited_VBN to_TO appear_VB ,_, but_CC failed_VBD to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP have_VBP not_RB excluded_VBN their_PRP$ papers_NNS from_IN the_DT record_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ written_VBN papers_NNS are_VBP published_VBN ,_, but_CC a_DT note_NN is_VBZ added_VBN to_TO the_DT effect_NN that_IN they_PRP did_VBD not_RB appear_VB before_IN the_DT Commission_NNP for_IN oral_JJ examination_NN although_IN summoned_VBD or_CC invited_VBN to_TO attend_VB ,_, as_IN the_DT case_NN may_MD be_VB ._.
In_IN the_DT lists_NNS of_IN witnesses_NNS prefacing_VBG the_DT volumes_NNS of_IN evidence_NN appended_VBN to_TO this_DT report_NN distinguishing_VBG marks_NNS are_VBP given_VBN to_TO indicate_VB those_DT who_WP were_VBD examined_VBN orally_RB in_IN addition_NN to_TO furnishing_VBG written_VBN papers_NNS ,_, those_DT who_WP gave_VBD oral_JJ evidence_NN only_RB ,_, and_CC those_DT who_WP failed_VBD to_TO attend_VB although_IN summoned_JJ or_CC invited_VBN to_TO appear_VB ._.
CHAPTER_NN II_NNP ._.
IMPORTANT_NNP POINTS_NNP CONNECTED_NNP WITH_NNP THE_NNP NATURAL_NNP HISTORY_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP HEMP_NNP PLANT_NNP (_( CANNABIS_NNP SATIVA_NNP )_) ._.
Limitation_NN of_IN discussion_NN ._.
17_CD ._.
The_DT subject_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT Commission_NNP have_VBP to_TO deal_VB is_VBZ surrounded_VBN in_IN many_JJ of_IN its_PRP$ aspects_NNS with_IN a_DT mist_NN of_IN uncertainty_NN and_CC conjecture_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT business_NN of_IN the_DT Com-_NNP mission_NN to_TO remove_VB these_DT doubts_NNS as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, and_CC for_IN this_DT end_NN it_PRP is_VBZ incumbent_JJ on_IN them_PRP to_TO proceed_VB on_IN a_DT basis_NN of_IN ascertained_VBN fact_NN and_CC established_VBN opinion_NN as_IN regards_NNS each_DT branch_NN of_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
This_DT principle_NN must_MD be_VB applied_VBN to_TO the_DT natural_JJ history_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN equally_RB with_IN the_DT other_JJ matters_NNS on_IN which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP to_TO report_VB ._.
Points_NNS for_IN discussion_NN ._.
18_CD ._.
In_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT identification_NN and_CC idiosyncracies_NNS of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ,_, those_DT points_NNS only_RB will_MD be_VB noticed_VBN which_WDT have_VBP a_DT direct_JJ bearing_NN on_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT narcotic_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ various_JJ forms_NNS ._.
These_DT points_NNS appear_VBP to_TO be16_VB REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._.
other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT Latin_NNP and_CC Greek_NNP Cannabis_NNP is_VBZ apparently_RB derived_VBN from_IN the_DT Arabic_NNP kinnab_NN ._.
De_NNP Candolle_NNP says_VBZ that_IN 'the_NNP species_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN wild_JJ beyond_IN a_DT doubt_NN to_TO the_DT south_NN of_IN the_DT Caspian_NNP Sea_NNP ,_, in_IN Siberia_NNP ,_, near_IN the_DT Irtysch_NNP in_IN the_DT deserts_NNS of_IN the_DT Kirghiz_NNP ,_, beyond_IN lake_JJ Baikal_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN Dahuria_NNP ._. '_''
He_PRP is_VBZ doubtful_JJ of_IN its_PRP$ being_VBG a_DT native_NN of_IN Southern_NNP and_CC Central_NNP Russia_NNP ,_, but_CC suspects_VBZ that_IN its_PRP$ area_NN may_MD have_VB extended_VBN into_IN China_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ not_RB sure_JJ about_IN the_DT plant_NN being_VBG indigenous_JJ to_TO Persia_NNP ._. The_DT only_JJ part_NN of_IN India_NNP included_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Watt_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ authorities_NNS in_IN the_DT area_NN of_IN indigenous_JJ growth_NN is_VBZ therefore_IN the_DT Western_JJ Himalayas_NNP and_CC Kashmir_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN only_RB in_IN doubtful_JJ language_NN ._.

He_PRP explains_VBZ the_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ method_NN of_IN cultivating_VBG hemp_NN and_CC flax_NN ,_, involving_VBG free_JJ exposure_NN of_IN the_DT individual_JJ plants_NNS to_TO light_NN ,_, heat_NN ,_, and_CC air_NN ,_, in_IN causing_VBG the_DT fibre_NN to_TO become_VB woody_NN and_CC brittle_JJ instead_RB of_IN flex-_JJ ible_JJ and_CC strong_JJ ._.
He_PRP contrasts_VBZ the_DT European_JJ method_NN of_IN cultivation_NN by_IN thick_JJ sowing_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, with_IN a_DT temperate_NN climate_NN inducing_VBG slow_JJ growth_NN ,_, conduces_NNS to_TO height_VB and_CC suppleness_VB in_IN the_DT plant_NN and_CC its_PRP$ fibres_NNS ._.
He_PRP admits_VBZ that_IN the_DT Indian_JJ climate_NN with_IN its_PRP$ comparatively_RB short_JJ seasons_NNS ,_, great_JJ alternations_NNS of_IN dryness_NN and_CC of_IN moisture_NN ,_, and_CC considerable_JJ extremes_NNS of_IN temperature_NN is_VBZ not_RB the_DT best_JJS suited_VBN to_TO the_DT production_NN of_IN good_JJ flax_NN and_CC hemp_NN ._.

The_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN Excise_NNP ,_, Bengal_NNP ,_, says_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$ memorandum_NN that_IN ``_`` the_DT wild_JJ plant_NN is_VBZ found_VBN in_IN nearly_RB every_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP grows_VBZ abundantly_RB in_IN several_JJ places_NNS ._. ''_''

The_DT Patna_NNP Division_NNP north_NN of_IN the_DT Ganges_NNP ._.
26_CD ._.
The_DT Terai_NNP region_NN of_IN Bengal_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO resemble_VB that_IN of_IN the_DT North-West-_NNP ern_JJ Provinces_NNPS in_IN having_VBG a_DT luxuriant_JJ growth_NN of_IN hemp_NN ._.

The_DT Bhagalpur_NNP Division_NNP ._.
27_CD ._.
Eastward_RB from_IN Patna_NNP lies_VBZ the_DT Bhagalpur_NNP Division_NNP ,_, the_DT region_NN from_IN which_WDT the_DT bhang_NN supply_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP is_VBZ brought_VBN ._.
A_DT special_JJ inquiry_NN was_VBD made_VBN in_IN this_DT tract_NN ,_, North_NNP Bhagalpur_NNP and_CC Purnea_NNP ,_, by_IN Mr._NNP B._NNP C._NNP Basu_NNP ,_, Assistant_NNP to_TO the_DT Director_NNP of_IN Land_NNP Records_NNP and_CC Agri-_NNP culture_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT request_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ._.

He_PRP says_VBZ that_IN the_DT growth_NN as_IN a_DT rule_NN ``_`` is_VBZ confined_VBN to_TO land_VB in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ vicinity_NN of_IN raiyats_NNS '_POS holdings_NNS ._.
Such_JJ land_NN is_VBZ usually_RB called_VBN dihisar_NN in_IN Purnea_NNP and_CC Bhagalpur_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ naturally_RB the_DT richest_JJS in_IN the_DT village_NN ._. ''_''
He_PRP says_VBZ further_RBR on_IN that_IN these_DT lands_NNS are_VBP used_VBN as_IN standing_VBG ground_NN for_IN the_DT cattle_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN ``_`` the_DT washings_NNS from_IN them_PRP flow_VBP over_IN the_DT alleys_NNS and_CC ditches_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN ;_: and_CC as_IN there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ or_CC no_DT cultivation_NN at_IN any_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, every_DT bit_NN of_IN bare_NN ground_NN which_WDT is_VBZ otherwise_RB suited_VBN is_VBZ covered_VBN with_IN a_DT luxuriant_JJ mass_NN of_IN wild_JJ hemp_NN as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT cold_NN weather_NN has_VBZ set_VBN in_IN ._. ''_''
The_DT Commission_NNP would_MD have_VB been_VBN glad_JJ to_TO learn_VB more_JJR about_IN the_DT lands_NNS at_IN a_DT distance_NN from_IN houses_NNS ._.
The_DT Collectors_NNPS of_IN Purnea_NNP and_CC Bhagalpur_NNP ,_, while_IN confirming_VBG Mr._NNP Basu_NNP 's_POS account_NN ,_, report_NN that_IN the_DT growth_NN springs_VBZ up_RP notwithstanding_VBG that_IN the_DT lands_NNS may_MD have_VB been_VBN flooded_VBN for_IN 3_CD or_CC 4_CD months_NNS in_IN the_DT rains_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB confined_VBN to_TO waste_VB lands_NNS ,_, but_CC comes_VBZ up_RP with_IN the_DT crops_NNS which_WDT are_VBP sown_VBN after_IN the_DT inundations_NNS have_VBP subsided_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ specially_RB abundant_JJ within_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN the_DT floods_NNS of_IN the_DT Kosi_NNP river_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ clear_JJ then_RB that_IN the_DT growth_NN about_IN homesteads_NNS and_CC cultivation_NN is_VBZ extremely_RB plentiful_JJ ;_: and_CC ,_, looking_VBG to_TO the_DT whole_JJ evidence_NN ,_, the_DT probability_NN is_VBZ that_IN towards_VBG the_DT Terai_NNP the_DT wild_JJ growth_NN is_VBZ found_VBN in_IN less_JJR close_JJ association_NN with_IN man_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN great_JJ quantity_NN in_IN suitable_JJ positions_NNS and_CC soils_NNS ._.

[_JJ CH_NNP ._.

(_( 63_CD )_) ,_, 2nd_CD Inspector_NN of_IN Excise_NNP ,_, says_VBZ that_IN the_DT wild_JJ bhang_NN grows_NNS luxuriantly_RB all_DT over_IN the_DT division_NN ._.
But_CC this_DT sweeping_JJ statement_NN is_VBZ not_RB generally_RB corroborated_VBN ._.

The_DT evidence_NN tendered_VBD to_TO the_DT Commission_NNP confirms_VBZ this_DT description_NN gen-_JJ erally_RB ;_: but_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB noted_VBN that_IN not_RB a_DT single_JJ witness_NN speaks_NNS to_TO spontaneous_JJ growth_NN in_IN the_DT districts_NNS named_VBN in_IN the_DT mar-_JJ gin_NN ,_, all_DT of_IN which_WDT ,_, except_IN Jhansi_NNP and_CC Hamirpur_NNP ,_, lie_VBD north_JJ and_CC east_NN of_IN the_DT Jumna_NNP ._.

There_EX may_MD possibly_RB be_VB some_DT confusion_NN in_IN the_DT mind_NN of_IN the_DT reporter_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT wild_JJ ganja_NN plant_NN being_VBG specifically_RB distinct_VBP from_IN that_DT which_WDT is_VBZ usually_RB cultivated_VBN ,_, for_IN there_EX is_VBZ some_DT small_JJ extent_NN of_IN cultivation_NN in_IN the_DT State_NNP ._.
But_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB safely_RB inferred_VBN that_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN has_VBZ nowhere_RB run_VBN wild_NN ,_, even_RB if_IN a_DT chance_NN plant_NN may_MD occasionally_RB be_VB found_VBN ._.
Kashmir_NNP ._.
81_CD ._.
Information_NN regarding_VBG Kashmir_NNP is_VBZ derived_VBN from_IN memoranda_NN by_IN the_DT Gov-_NNP ernors_NNS of_IN Kashmir_NNP and_CC Jammu_NNP and_CC Muhammad_NNP Hayat_NNP Khan_NNP ,_, Member_NNP of_IN the_DT Kashmir_NNP State_NNP Council_NNP ._.
According_VBG to_TO the_DT last-named_JJ authority_NN ,_, the_DT spontaneous_JJ growth_NN in_IN Jammu_NNP resem-_JJ bles_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ character_NN and_CC the_DT localities_NNS it_PRP affects_VBZ the_DT growth_NN in_IN the_DT plains_NNS of_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP ._.
He_PRP does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO have_VB any_DT very_RB exact_JJ idea_NN of_IN the_DT latter_JJ growth_NN ;_: for_IN he_PRP places_VBZ many_JJ localities_NNS on_IN the_DT same_JJ footing_NN ,_, in_IN some_DT of_IN which_WDT the_DT growth_NN is_VBZ common_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN others_NNS scanty_VBP or_CC even_RB wanting_VBG ._.
This_DT much_JJ may_MD be_VB gathered_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, with_IN tolerable_JJ certainty_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT growth_NN in_IN Jammu_NNP is_VBZ not_RB so_RB abundant_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT more_RBR elevated_JJ tract_NN of_IN Kashmir_NNP ._.
The_DT tract_NN of_IN profuse_NN growth_NN in_IN Kashmir_NNP mentioned_VBN by_IN Muhammad_NNP Hayat_NNP Khan_NNP is_VBZ Kashmir_NNP proper_NN ,_, extending_VBG from_IN Baramula_NNP to_TO Verinag_NNP and_CC Shopayan_NNP ._.
The_DT country_NN lying_VBG between_IN Adham-_NNP pur_NN and_CC Banhal_NNP in_IN the_DT Jammu_NNP province_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT jagirs_NN of_IN Bhaddarwah_NNP and_CC Poonch_NNP ,_, have_VBP also_RB an_DT abundant_JJ growth_NN ._.
Two_CD kinds_NNS of_IN wild_JJ growth_NN in_IN Kashmir_NNP proper_NN ._.
82_CD ._.
The_DT memorandum_NN of_IN the_DT Kashmir_NNP Governor_NNP mentions_NNS two_CD kinds_NNS of_IN wild_JJ growth_NN which_WDT appear_VBP to_TO have_VB somewhat_RB distinct_JJ characters_NNS ._.
The_DT growth_NN called_VBD talia_JJ consists_NNS of_IN the_DT female_NN plant_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ found_VBN in_IN the_DT Anantnag_NNP district_NN and_CC the_DT Nagam_NNP tahsil_NN of_IN the_DT 34_CD REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
III_NNP ._.
ranges_NNS ._.
It_PRP may_MD very_RB well_RB be_VB doubted_VBN if_IN without_IN these_DT aids_NNS the_DT plant_NN would_MD long_RB survive_VB in_IN the_DT low_JJ country_NN under_IN the_DT vicissitudes_NNS of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ climate_NN and_CC seasons_NNS ._.
The_DT plant_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB very_RB hardy_JJ when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ once_RB well_RB established_VBN ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ clear_JJ from_IN the_DT distribution_NN of_IN the_DT wild_JJ growth_NN in_IN India_NNP that_IN the_DT conditions_NNS of_IN soil_NN and_CC climate_NN under_IN which_WDT it_PRP can_MD attain_VB full_JJ growth_NN are_VBP limited_VBN ._.
Conditions_NNS favourable_JJ to_TO the_DT wild_JJ growth_NN ._.
86_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT description_NN of_IN cultivation_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP that_IN the_DT seeds_NNS will_MD only_RB germinate_VB properly_RB if_IN the_DT nursery_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN thoroughly_RB dry_JJ and_CC the_DT rainfall_NN is_VBZ not_RB excessive_JJ ._.
And_CC throughout_IN the_DT growth_NN the_DT plant_NN prefers_VBZ a_DT light_NN ,_, permeable_JJ ,_, well_RB drained_VBN soil_NN ._.
Similar_JJ evidence_NN is_VBZ furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT facts_NNS connected_VBN with_IN cultivation_NN in_IN the_DT Central_NNP Provinces_NNPS and_CC Bombay_NNP and_CC the_DT direct_JJ testimony_NN of_IN witnesses_NNS in_IN answer_NN to_TO the_DT latter_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP 's_POS question_NN 13_CD ._.
The_DT soil_NN need_MD not_RB be_VB rich_JJ for_IN the_DT mere_JJ growth_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN ,_, for_IN it_PRP will_MD be_VB found_VBN on_IN a_DT ballast_NN heap_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN a_DT dunghill_NN ._.
The_DT essential_JJ conditions_NNS noted_VBN above_IN are_VBP present_JJ in_IN the_DT Himalayas_NNP with_IN the_DT additional_JJ encouragement_NN of_IN a_DT moderate_JJ temperature_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT rainfall_NN should_MD sometimes_RB be_VB tropical_JJ and_CC excessive_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ carried_VBN off_RB rapidly_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT seed_NN or_CC seedling_NN has_VBZ every_DT chance_NN of_IN surviving_VBG it_PRP ._.
The_DT seed_NN seems_VBZ to_TO germin-_JJ ate_NN at_IN the_DT elevation_NN of_IN Simla_NNP in_IN May_NNP and_CC June_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ five_CD or_CC six_CD or_CC seven_CD months_NNS to_TO grow_VB and_CC ripen_VB its_PRP$ seed_NN before_IN the_DT frosts_NNS come_VBP upon_IN it_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT Hima-_NNP layan_JJ submontane_NN tract_VB the_DT seed_NN germinates_VBZ in_IN November_NNP or_CC December_NNP ,_, i.e._NN ,_, after_IN the_DT excessive_JJ moisture_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN has_VBZ sunk_VBN away_RB from_IN the_DT surface_NN soil_NN ,_, leaving_VBG it_PRP light_JJ and_CC friable_JJ ._.
The_DT growth_NN is_VBZ favoured_VBN by_IN the_DT light_JJ cold_NN weather_NN rains_NNS ,_, and_CC does_VBZ not_RB meet_VB with_IN any_DT very_RB trying_VBG conditions_NNS unless_IN it_PRP wanders_VBZ very_RB far_RB from_IN the_DT shelter_NN of_IN the_DT mountains_NNS ._.
If_IN it_PRP does_VBZ ,_, it_PRP will_MD in_IN all_DT probability_NN be_VB burnt_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT fierce_JJ dry_JJ heat_NN of_IN the_DT months_NNS from_IN March_NNP to_TO May_NNP or_CC June_NNP ._.
Protected_VBN by_IN the_DT mountain_NN and_CC forest_JJS air_NN ,_, it_PRP survives_VBZ to_TO ripen_VB its_PRP$ seed_NN ,_, or_CC perishes_NNS with_IN the_DT advent_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ._.
The_DT plant_NN is_VBZ not_RB regular_JJ as_IN to_TO the_DT time_NN of_IN germinating_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB later_RB in_IN the_DT Assam_NNP Valley_NNP than_IN in_IN Hindustan_NNP ._.
But_CC in_IN the_DT same_JJ patch_NN of_IN growth_NN plants_NNS will_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN all_DT stages_NNS from_IN the_DT seedling_VBG to_TO the_DT flower_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB the_DT seed_NN bearer_NN ._.
Conditions_NNS unsuitable_JJ to_TO the_DT wild_JJ growth_NN prevailing_NN in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP ._.
87_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ evident_JJ that_IN throughout_IN India_NNP outside_IN the_DT demarcated_JJ region_NN there_EX must_MD be_VB conditions_NNS unfavourable_JJ to_TO the_DT spontaneous_JJ growth_NN ._.
They_PRP may_MD be_VB conditions_NNS of_IN permanent_JJ unsuitability_NN or_CC recurring_VBG vicissitudes_NNS ._.
Probably_RB both_DT operate_NN to_TO keep_VB the_DT growth_NN in_IN check_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT very_RB general_JJ way_NN may_MD be_VB indicated_VBN heavy_JJ soils_NNS ,_, short_JJ seasons_NNS with_IN severe_JJ alternations_NNS of_IN dryness_NN and_CC moisture_NN ,_, extreme_JJ drought_NN as_IN in_IN Baluchis-_NNP tan_NN ,_, Sind_NNP ,_, and_CC Rajputana_NNP ,_, excessive_JJ and_CC continuous_JJ rain_NN as_IN on_IN the_DT Western_JJ Ghâts_NNP ,_, and_CC seasons_NNS of_IN abnormal_JJ drought_NN or_CC abnormal_JJ moisture_NN ._.
Where_WRB ,_, as_IN in_IN Travancore_NNP ,_, the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ alleged_VBN to_TO reproduce_VB itself_PRP ,_, an_DT unusually_RB wet_JJ season_NN may_MD operate_VB as_IN a_DT very_RB effectual_JJ check_NN to_TO extension_NN of_IN the_DT growth_NN ,_, either_CC eliminating_VBG it_PRP for_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, or_CC thrusting_VBG it_PRP back_RB into_IN a_DT few_JJ well-drained_JJ localities_NNS ._.
Areas_NNP where_WRB the_DT spontaneous_JJ growth_NN may_MD be_VB important_JJ outside_IN the_DT region_NN of_IN wild_JJ growth_NN ._.
88_CD ._.
South_NNP of_IN the_DT demarcated_JJ boundary_NN of_IN wild_JJ growth_NN will_MD be_VB seen_VBN on_IN the_DT map_NN (_( Vol_NNP ._.
III_NNP Appendices_NNPS )_) two_CD areas_NNS in_IN lighter_JJR shading_NN ._.
One_CD includes_VBZ the_DT central_JJ belt_NN of_IN spontane-_JJ ous_JJ growth_NN in_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS ;_: the_DT other_JJ the_DT country_NN between_IN the_DT Ganges_NNP and_CC Bhagirathi_NNP on_IN the_DT one_CD side_NN and_CC the_DT Eastern_NNP Hill_NNP Tracts_VBZ on_IN the_DT other_JJ stretching_VBG down_RP to_TO Calcutta_NNP ._.
In_IN these_DT areas_NNS the_DT spontaneous_JJ growth_NN may_MD under_IN favourable_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN site_NN and_CC season_NN attain_VBP some_DT importance_NN ._.
CHAPTER_NN IV_NNP ._.
EXTENT_NN OF_NNP CULTIVATION_NNP ,_, AND_NNP ITS_NNP TENDENCY_NNP TO_NNP INCREASE_NNP OR_NNP DECREASE_NNP ._.
Bengal_NNP ._.
Cultivation_NN confined_VBD to_TO a_DT limited_JJ tract_NN ._.
89_CD ._.
In_IN Bengal_NNP the_DT law_NN (_( section_NN 5_CD of_IN Bengal_NNP Act_NNP VII_NNP of_IN 1878_CD )_) forbids_VBZ the_DT culti-_JJ vation_NN without_IN a_DT license_NN from_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN plants_NNS from_IN which_WDT intoxicating_VBG drugs_NNS are_VBP produced_VBN ._.
The_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN is_VBZ accordingly_RB confined_VBN to_TO a_DT compact_JJ tract_NN having_VBG a_DT radius_NN of_IN about_IN sixteen_JJ miles_NNS ,_, and_CC lying_VBG in_IN the_DT three_CD districts_NNS of_IN Dinajpur_NNP ,_, Raj-_NNP shahi_NN ,_, and_CC Bogra_NNP ._.
The_DT reasons_NNS why_WRB this_DT tract_NN was_VBD selected_VBN are_VBP not_RB authorita-_JJ tively_RB stated_VBN ._.
Cultivation_NN was_VBD formerly_RB carried_VBN on_IN in_IN the_DT Jessore_NNP district_NN also_RB ,_, but_CC that_DT was_VBD suppressed_VBN in_IN 1875_CD ._.
The_DT present_JJ ganja_NN tract_NN was_VBD probably_RB found_VBN to_TO be_VB most_RBS suitable_JJ to_TO the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD obviously_RB an_DT advantage_NN to_TO the_DT excise_NN administration_NN to_TO have_VB the_DT production_NN confined_VBD to_TO one_CD area_NN where_WRB economical_JJ and_CC efficient_JJ arrangements_NNS could_MD be_VB made_VBN for_IN supervising_VBG it_PRP ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT unlicensed_JJ cultivation_NN in_IN the_DT tract_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT tract_NN is_VBZ being_VBG reduced_VBN in_IN area_NN ._.
90_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ practically_RB no_DT clandestine_NN cultivation_NN within_IN this_DT tract_NN ._.
The_DT Ex-_NNP cise_NN Commissioner_NNP writes_VBZ that_IN ``_`` owing_VBG to_TO the_DT area_NN in_IN which_WDT cultivation_NN is_VBZ permitted_VBN being_VBG extremely_RB limit-_JJ ed_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT close_JJ supervision_NN there_RB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ every_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN un-_JJ licensed_JJ cultivation_NN has_VBZ been_VBN all_DT but_CC suppressed_VBD ._. ''_''
The_DT ganja_NN tract_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB a_DT tendency_NN to_TO further_JJ concentration_NN ._.
The_DT 1st_CD Assistant_NNP Supervisor_NNP of_IN ganja_JJ cultivation_NN states_NNS that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ now_RB included_VBN within_IN a_DT radius_NN of_IN about_IN fourteen_JJ miles_NNS ,_, having_VBG been_VBN reduced_VBN from_IN a_DT radius_NN of_IN twenty_NN miles_NNS since_IN 1866_CD ,_, and_CC he_PRP gives_VBZ the_DT following_JJ explanation_NN of_IN the_DT change_NN :_: ``_`` The_DT gradual_JJ reduction_NN in_IN the_DT extent_NN of_IN the_DT tract_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN by_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN jungles_NNS in_IN the_DT villages_NNS not_RB far_RB off_IN Naogaon_NNP more_JJR land_NN became_VBD generally_RB available_JJ for_IN cultivation_NN ,_, and_CC more_JJR ganja_NN was_VBD produced_VBN ._.
Purchasers_NNS having_VBG ganja_NN near_IN Naogaon_NNP do_VBP not_RB naturally_RB like_IN to_TO go_VB to_TO distant_VB villages_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ supplies_NNS ._. ''_''
The_DT remote_JJ villages_NNS in_IN the_DT north_NN ,_, south_NN ,_, and_CC east_NN of_IN the_DT tract_NN have_VBP accordingly_RB given_VBN up_RP the_DT cultiva-_JJ tion_NN ._.
The_DT area_NN cultivated_VBD ._.
91_CD ._.
The_DT area_NN cultivated_VBN in_IN 1892-93_CD was_VBD 3,540_CD bighas_NN ,_, an_DT area_NN far_RB larger_JJR than_IN the_DT crop_NN has_VBZ occupied_VBN for_IN twenty_NN years_NNS past_IN ._.
But_CC in_IN the_DT year_NN 1891-92_CD the_DT cultivation_NN was_VBD the_DT least_JJS in_IN the_DT same_JJ period_NN ,_, and_CC doubtless_VB the_DT short_JJ outturn_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB made_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT fol-_JJ lowing_NN season_NN ._.
The_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT two_CD years_NNS together_RB is_VBZ not_RB remarkably_RB high_JJ ._.
The_DT following_JJ explanation_NN by_IN the_DT Excise_NNP Commissioner_NNP must_MD be_VB read_VBN with_IN the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN cultivation_NN :_: ``_`` It_PRP will_MD be_VB observed_VBN that_IN ,_, except_IN in_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT material_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT area_NN under_IN ganja_JJ cultivation_NN during_IN the_DT last_JJ twenty_NN years_NNS ._.
The_DT column_NN shows_VBZ the_DT quantity_NN of_IN land_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT crop_NN finally_RB matured_VBD ,_, excluding_VBG such_JJ land_NN as_IN was_VBD cultivated_VBN ,_, but_CC in_IN which_WDT the_DT plants_NNS failed_VBD altogether_RB ;_: and_CC therefore_RB ,_, although_IN it_PRP would_MD appear_VB that_IN cultivation_NN was_VBD greatly_RB curtailed_VBN during_IN the_DT years_NNS 1875-76_JJ ,_, 1878-79_JJ ,_, 1879-80_JJ ,_, 1885-86_JJ ,_, and_CC 1891-92_JJ ,_, this_DT was_VBD not_RB really_RB the_DT case_NN in_IN all_PDT the_DT years_NNS excepting_VBG 1885-86_JJ ,_, as_IN the_DT plants_NNS in_IN large_JJ areas_NNS under_IN cultivation_NN were_VBD destroyed_VBN in_IN these_DT years_NNS by_IN heavy_JJ floods_NNS ,_, and_CC such_JJ lands_NNS were_VBD not_RB taken_VBN into_IN account_NN ._.
The_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT area_NN cultivated_VBN in_IN 1885-86_CD was_VBD due_JJ to_TO the_DT smaller_JJR profits_NNS of_IN the_DT cultivators_NNS in_IN the_DT pre-_JJ ceding_NN two_CD years_NNS ._.
The_DT high_JJ price_NN which_WDT the_DT drug_NN had_VBD realised_VBN in_IN 1891-92_JJ owing_NN to_TO wholesale_JJ failure_NN of_IN the_DT crop_NN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN caused_VBN by_IN inundation_NN 36_CD REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._.
induced_VBN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN raiyats_NNS to_TO take_VB up_RP lands_NNS for_IN cultivation_NN during_IN the_DT following_JJ year_NN ._.
Some_DT raiyats_NNS are_VBP regular_JJ growers_NNS of_IN ganja_NN ,_, and_CC annually_RB set_VB apart_RP a_DT portion_NN of_IN their_PRP$ holdings_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ;_: others_NNS are_VBP induced_VBN to_TO take_VB to_TO ganja_VB cultivation_NN by_IN the_DT high_JJ profits_NNS of_IN one_CD year_NN to_TO abandon_VB it_PRP again_RB when_WRB prices_NNS fall_VBP ._. ''_''
The_DT evidence_NN furnishes_VBZ no_DT better_JJR account_NN of_IN the_DT fluctuations_NNS than_IN this_DT ._.
A_DT bigha_NN is_VBZ about_IN one-third_NN of_IN an_DT acre_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
The_DT cultivation_NN of_IN 1892-93_JJ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, amounted_VBD to_TO 1,180_CD acres_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT average_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ five_CD years_NNS from_IN 1888-89_CD to_TO 1892-93_CD is_VBZ 824_CD acres_NNS ._.
Clandestine_JJ cultivation_NN :_: not_RB on_IN a_DT large_JJ scale_NN ._.
92_CD ._.
Leaving_VBG the_DT ganja_NN tract_NN ,_, the_DT evidence_NN gives_VBZ reason_NN to_TO suppose_VB that_IN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN rearing_NN of_IN scattered_JJ plants_NNS ._.
This_DT is_VBZ ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, carried_VBD on_IN secretly_RB ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT places_NNS where_WRB the_DT wild_NN or_CC spontaneous_JJ growth_NN flourishes_NNS detection_NN is_VBZ more_RBR difficult_JJ ._.
The_DT Hon'ble_NNP Mr._NNP Lyall_NNP thinks_VBZ that_IN the_DT quantity_NN of_IN bhang_NN that_WDT is_VBZ now_RB exported_VBN from_IN the_DT Bhagalpur_NNP Division_NNP shows_VBZ that_IN there_EX must_MD be_VB cultivation_NN to_TO a_DT consider-_JJ able_JJ extent_NN in_IN that_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ._.
He_PRP means_VBZ that_IN the_DT bhang_NN which_WDT is_VBZ exported_VBN as_IN wild_JJ must_MD often_RB be_VB fostered_VBN ,_, and_CC perhaps_RB to_TO some_DT extent_NN sown_NN and_CC tended_VBD ,_, by_IN the_DT occupants_NNS of_IN the_DT lands_NNS on_IN which_WDT ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN which_WDT ,_, it_PRP grows_VBZ ._.
Mr._NNP Westmacott_NNP holds_VBZ similar_JJ views_NNS because_IN he_PRP has_VBZ never_RB found_VBN the_DT wild_JJ plant_NN in_IN the_DT jungle_NN at_IN a_DT distance_NN from_IN habitations_NNS ,_, but_CC he_PRP does_VBZ not_RB indicate_VB the_DT localities_NNS to_TO which_WDT his_PRP$ remarks_NNS apply_RB ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT Assist-_NNP ant_NN to_TO the_DT Director_NNP of_IN Land_NNP Records_NNP and_CC Agriculture_NNP ,_, who_WP made_VBD special_JJ enquiries_NNS in_IN the_DT region_NN referred_VBD to_TO by_IN Mr._NNP Lyall_NNP ,_, reports_VBZ :_: ``_`` I_PRP could_MD find_VB no_DT evid-_JJ ence_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN being_VBG actually_RB cultivated_VBN in_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN Purnea_NNP and_CC Bhagalpur_NNP ._.
Everywhere_RB it_PRP came_VBD up_RP as_IN a_DT weed_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT places_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, where_WRB the_DT plants_NNS did_VBD not_RB grow_VB in_IN abundance_NN ,_, and_CC would_MD therefore_VB seem_VB to_TO be_VB an_DT object_NN of_IN considerable_JJ value_NN to_TO bhang_VB drinkers_NNS ,_, I_PRP observed_VBD signs_NNS of_IN its_PRP$ having_VBG been_VBN looked_VBN after_IN with_IN some_DT degree_NN of_IN care_NN ._. ''_''
He_PRP then_RB describes_VBZ the_DT signs_NNS of_IN the_DT plants_NNS having_VBG been_VBN attended_VBN to_TO ,_, and_CC proceeds_NNS :_: ``_`` All_PDT this_DT made_VBN me_PRP suspect_VB that_IN the_DT people_NNS knew_VBD a_DT great_JJ deal_NN more_RBR about_IN the_DT bhang_NN plant_NN than_IN they_PRP were_VBD willing_JJ to_TO avow_VB ._. ''_''
This_DT evidence_NN is_VBZ a_DT partial_JJ corroboration_NN of_IN the_DT high_JJ authorities_NNS named_VBN above_IN ,_, but_CC it_PRP points_VBZ rather_RB to_TO the_DT surreptitious_JJ production_NN of_IN ganja_NN in_IN small_JJ quantity_NN than_IN to_TO the_DT cultivation_NN on_IN a_DT large_JJ scale_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN which_WDT the_DT contractors_NNS carry_VBP away_RB as_IN bhang_NN ._.
And_CC all_PDT the_DT other_JJ evidence_NN of_IN the_DT cultiva-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT wild_JJ plant_NN and_CC of_IN unlicensed_JJ cultivation_NN generally_RB refers_VBZ more_RBR or_CC less_RBR distinctly_RB to_TO the_DT rearing_NN of_IN a_DT few_JJ plants_NNS near_IN houses_NNS ,_, or_CC in_IN enclosures_NNS ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN crops_NNS ,_, and_CC not_RB to_TO operations_NNS of_IN a_DT more_RBR extensive_JJ kind_NN ._.
The_DT character_NN of_IN the_DT clandestine_NN cultivation_NN ._.
93_CD ._.
This_DT desultory_JJ cultivation_NN ,_, either_RB from_IN ganja_NN seed_NN or_CC by_IN rearing_VBG plants_NNS which_WDT have_VBP sprung_VBN up_IN of_IN themselves_PRP ,_, occurs_VBZ every-_NN where_WRB ,_, though_IN the_DT evidence_NN does_VBZ not_RB give_VB the_DT impres-_JJ sion_NN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ common_JJ anywhere_RB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN in_IN Mr._NNP Gupta_NNP 's_POS memorandum_NN that_IN there_EX were_VBD 86_CD arrests_NNS and_CC 71_CD convictions_NNS on_IN this_DT account_NN in_IN the_DT year_NN 1892-93_RB ._.
Arrests_NNS were_VBD made_VBN in_IN 25_CD districts_NNS ,_, ``_`` but_CC all_PDT the_DT cases_NNS were_VBD for_IN growing_VBG a_DT few_JJ plants_NNS (_( very_RB often_RB a_DT single_JJ plant_NN )_) in_IN the_DT courtyards_NNS of_IN houses_NNS ._. ''_''

CHAPTER_NN V._NNP METHODS_NNP OF_NNP CULTIVATION_NNP AND_NNP MATTERS_NNP CONNECTED_NNP THEREWITH_NNP ._.
Definition_NN of_IN the_DT narcotic_JJ products_NNS of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ._.
151_CD ._.
Before_IN describing_VBG the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB proper_JJ to_TO mention_VB the_DT products_NNS which_WDT are_VBP got_VBN from_IN it_PRP ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN shown_VBN that_IN the_DT plant_NN which_WDT yields_VBZ the_DT true_JJ hemp_NN fibre_NN is_VBZ the_DT same_JJ as_IN that_DT which_WDT produces_VBZ the_DT narcotics_NNS ._.
The_DT seed_NN is_VBZ the_DT familiar_JJ hemp_NN seed_NN which_WDT is_VBZ given_VBN to_TO cage_VB birds_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB occasionally_RB eaten_VBN by_IN the_DT natives_NNS of_IN India_NNP ,_, especially_RB in_IN the_DT Himalayas_NNP ,_, and_CC an_DT useful_JJ oil_NN is_VBZ expressed_VBN from_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT fibre_NN and_CC seeds_VBZ only_RB come_VBN incidentally_RB within_IN the_DT scope_NN of_IN the_DT pre-_JJ sent_NN inquiry_NN ._.
The_DT narcotic_JJ products_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN are_VBP ganja_VBN ,_, charas_NNS ,_, and_CC bhang_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Prain_NNP has_VBZ described_VBN very_RB fully_RB the_DT physiological_JJ processes_NNS by_IN which_WDT the_DT narcotic_JJ principle_NN is_VBZ secreted_VBN in_IN the_DT various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO state_NN plainly_RB and_CC briefly_VB what_WP the_DT three_CD articles_NNS are_VBP in_IN the_DT simple_JJ forms_NNS in_IN which_WDT they_PRP first_RB enter_VBP the_DT market_NN ._.
The_DT definitions_NNS with_IN which_WDT the_DT Commission_NNP 's_POS list_NN of_IN questions_NNS is_VBZ introduced_VBN are_VBP as_IN follows_VBZ ._.
They_PRP are_VBP borrowed_VBN from_IN Dr._NNP Prain:60_NNP REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
V._NNP lost_VBD ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ cultivated_VBN in_IN Sind_NNP with_IN similar_JJ precautions_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT fertilization_NN of_IN the_DT female_NN plant_NN as_IN in_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT product_NN is_VBZ called_VBN nothing_NN but_CC bhang_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ rarely_RB used_VBN for_IN anything_NN but_CC concocting_VBG drink_NN and_CC sweetmeats_NNS ,_, the_DT smoking_NN ganja_NN being_VBG imported_VBN ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ the_DT ancient_JJ name_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN narcotic_JJ product_NN which_WDT was_VBD earliest_JJS discovered_VBN ,_, for_IN it_PRP must_MD have_VB taken_VBN time_NN to_TO learn_VB the_DT art_NN of_IN isolating_VBG the_DT female_NN plant_NN and_CC so_RB producing_VBG ganja_NN ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ also_RB the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS simple_JJ style_NN of_IN consumption_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, by_IN pounding_VBG and_CC drinking_NN ,_, which_WDT must_MD have_VB preceded_VBN smoking_NN ._.
Naturally_RB ,_, there-_JJ fore_NN ,_, bhang_NN is_VBZ a_DT more_RBR comprehensive_JJ term_NN than_IN ganja_NN ,_, and_CC often_RB includes_VBZ it_PRP ,_, especially_RB where_WRB the_DT production_NN of_IN ganja_NN has_VBZ not_RB become_VBN a_DT recognised_JJ industry_NN ._.

This_DT is_VBZ probably_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN being_VBG only_RB known_VBN to_TO the_DT people_NNS as_IN cultivated_VBN for_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN ganja_NN ._.
Charas_NNP is_VBZ not_RB always_RB the_DT simple_JJ resin_NN ._.
154_CD ._.
Charas_NNS may_MD not_RB always_RB be_VB the_DT pure_NN resinous_JJ matter_NN ._.
It_PRP generally_RB con-_JJ tains_NNS leaf_JJ dust_NN and_CC other_JJ impurities_NNS picked_VBD up_RP in_IN the_DT process_NN of_IN manufacture_NN ._.
But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ hardly_RB ever_RB con-_NN founded_VBD with_IN ganja_NN or_CC bhang_NN ._.
Its_PRP$ appearance_NN ,_, that_IN of_IN dark_JJ green_JJ or_CC brown_JJ paste_NN ,_, is_VBZ distinct_JJ from_IN that_DT of_IN both_DT the_DT other_JJ drugs_NNS ._.

Bengal_NNP ._.

In_IN Bengal_NNP the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN is_VBZ grown_VBN solely_RB for_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN ganja_NN in_IN the_DT area_NN of_IN regular_JJ and_CC licensed_JJ cultivation_NN ._.
The_DT illicit_NN cultivation_NN which_WDT is_VBZ to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN insignifi-_JJ cant_JJ quantity_NN all_DT over_IN the_DT province_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT character_NN of_IN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN described_VBN ,_, yields_NNS for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN bhang_NN and_CC not_RB ganja_JJ fit_NN for_IN smoking_NN ._.
Ganja_NNP of_IN inferior_JJ quality_NN is_VBZ produced_VBN in_IN the_DT Tributary_NNP States_NNPS of_IN Orissa_NNP in_IN considerable_JJ quantity_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Tributary_NNP States_NNPS of_IN the_DT Chota_NNP Nagpur_NNP Division_NNP ganja_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ quality_NN is_VBZ produced_VBN ,_, but_CC in_IN less_JJR quantity_NN ._.
The_DT cultivated_JJ product_NN of_IN Hill_NNP Tippera_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB still_RB lower_JJR in_IN the_DT scale_NN as_IN regards_NNS quality_NN ,_, and_CC very_RB little_JJ in_IN quantity_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ proposed_VBN now_RB to_TO describe_VB the_DT skilled_JJ cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT Ganja_NNP Mahal_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT agricultural_JJ processes_NNS for_IN the_DT growth_NN and_CC pre-_JJ paration_NN of_IN ganja_NNS have_VBP undoubtedly_RB been_VBN brought_VBN to_TO greater_JJR perfection_NN than_IN in_IN any_DT other_JJ part_NN of_IN India_NNP ,_, and_CC ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN information_NN will_MD allow_VB ,_, the_DT more_RBR homely_RB prac-_JJ tices_NNS prevailing_VBG outside_IN that_DT tract_NN ._.
Babu_NNP Hem_NNP Chunder_NNP Kerr_NNP 's_POS report_NN contains_VBZ a_DT detailed_JJ account_NN of_IN the_DT Rajshahi_NNP cultivation_NN ;_: Dr._NNP Prain_NNP has_VBZ given_VBN a_DT brief_JJ out-_JJ line_NN of_IN the_DT mode_NN of_IN culture_NN ;_: and_CC Mr._NNP Price_NNP ,_, Collector_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Rajshahi_NNP ,_, has_VBZ submitted_VBN a_DT sketch_NN of_IN the_DT cultivators_NNS '_POS business_NN during_IN each_DT month_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.

156_CD ._.
Hemp_NNP is_VBZ an_DT exhausting_VBG crop_NN ,_, and_CC requires_VBZ a_DT light_JJ ,_, well-drained_JJ soil_NN ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN there_EX is_VBZ but_CC a_DT limited_JJ quantity_NN of_IN thoroughly_JJ suitable_JJ ground_NN in_IN the_DT Ganja_NNP Mahal_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT tendency_NN to_TO abandon_VB the_DT outlying_NN lands_NNS and_CC concentrate_VB the_DT CH_NNP ._.
V._NNP ]_NNP REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
61_CD cultivation_NN about_IN Naogaon_NNP ._.
The_DT ganja_NN plant_NN is_VBZ reared_VBN in_IN a_DT seed_NN bed_NN or_CC nursery_NN and_CC planted_VBN out_RP into_IN the_DT field_NN ._.
The_DT field_NN is_VBZ selected_VBN between_IN January_NNP and_CC the_DT middle_NN of_IN March_NNP ,_, and_CC must_MD be_VB one_CD which_WDT has_VBZ lain_NN fallow_NN ,_, or_CC has_VBZ borne_VBN nothing_NN but_CC light_JJ crops_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN pulses_NNS or_CC mustard_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT two_CD previous_JJ years_NNS ._.
It_PRP must_MD not_RB be_VB overshadowed_VBN by_IN trees_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ first_RB ploughed_VBN to_TO remove_VB weeds_NNS and_CC stubble_JJ as_RB thoroughly_RB as_IN the_DT cultivators_NNS '_POS means_NNS will_MD allow_VB ._.
In_IN April_NNP and_CC May_NNP the_DT field_NN is_VBZ liberally_RB dressed_VBN with_IN fresh_JJ surface_NN earth_NN from_IN surrounding_VBG lands_NNS ,_, the_DT quantity_NN used_VBN depending_VBG on_IN the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT field_NN ._.
The_DT turf_NN and_CC weeds_NNS on_IN the_DT sides_NNS of_IN the_DT field_NN are_VBP next_JJ dug_NN up_RP in_IN clods_NNS and_CC thrown_VBN on_IN to_TO the_DT field_NN ,_, the_DT holes_NNS thus_RB made_VBD being_VBG filled_VBN up_RP with_IN earth_NN from_IN the_DT ditches_NNS ._.
The_DT field_NN is_VBZ thus_RB cleaned_VBN to_TO its_PRP$ extreme_JJ boundaries_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT weeds_NNS utilised_VBD as_IN dressing_NN for_IN the_DT land_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT process_NN a_DT small_JJ bank_NN about_IN nine_CD inches_NNS high_JJ is_VBZ raised_VBN round_IN the_DT field_NN ._.
The_DT fresh_JJ earth_NN added_VBD to_TO the_DT field_NN becomes_RB desiccated_VBN in_IN a_DT week_NN or_CC so_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB cow-dung_JJ manure_NN is_VBZ added_VBN and_CC the_DT field_NN well_RB ploughed_RB again_RB ._.
From_IN this_DT time_NN till_JJ September_NNP ploughing_NN ,_, followed_VBN by_IN harrowing_VBG with_IN the_DT bamboo_NN ladder_NN ,_, is_VBZ carried_VBN out_IN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ,_, the_DT belief_NN being_VBG ,_, as_IN Babu_NNP Hem_NNP Chunder_NNP Kerr_NNP says_VBZ ,_, that_IN the_DT oftener_NN the_DT land_NN is_VBZ ploughed_VBN the_DT better_JJR is_VBZ the_DT crop_NN ._.
A_DT channel_NN is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO keep_VB the_DT field_NN well_RB drained_VBN ._.
The_DT nursery_JJ conditions_NNS requisite_VBP to_TO the_DT germination_NN of_IN seed_NN and_CC growth_NN of_IN seedlings_NNS ._.
157_CD ._.
The_DT details_NNS given_VBN by_IN Babu_NNP Hem_NNP Chunder_NNP Kerr_NNP regarding_VBG the_DT selection_NN of_IN the_DT seed_NN bed_NN have_VBP special_JJ interest_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT spontaneous_JJ growth_NN ._.

In_IN another_DT place_NN Babu_NNP Hem_NNP Chunder_NNP Kerr_NNP says_VBZ :_: ``_`` The_DT nursery_NN or_CC seed_NN bed_NN consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT plot_NN of_IN high_JJ ,_, light_JJ ,_, sandy_JJ loam_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT selection_NN of_IN this_DT plot_NN is_VBZ made_VBN in_IN May_NNP ,_, and_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD showers_NNS have_VBP fallen_VBN it_PRP is_VBZ ploughed_VBN ._.
The_DT ploughing_NN is_VBZ repeated_VBN three_CD or_CC four_CD times_NNS each_DT month_NN till_RB August_NNP ._.
The_DT object_NN is_VBZ complete_JJ pulverisation_NN of_IN the_DT soil_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, the_DT bamboo_NN ladder_NN in_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT plough_NN is_VBZ passed_VBN over_IN the_DT land_NN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ._.

The_DT seeds_NNS are_VBP sown_VBN broadcast_NN on_IN a_DT fine_JJ day_NN after_IN a_DT ploughing_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT sowing_NN is_VBZ followed_VBN by_IN harrowing_VBG to_TO cover_VB the_DT seed_NN ._.
The_DT bed_NN is_VBZ carefully_RB drained_VBN ._.
The_DT following_VBG remarks_NNS from_IN Babu_NNP Hem_NNP Chunder_NNP Kerr_NNP 's_POS report_NN are_VBP quoted_VBN to_TO show_VB certain_JJ idiosyncrasies_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN for_IN the_DT same_JJ reason_NN that_IN the_DT previous_JJ verbatim_NN extracts_NNS were_VBD made_VBN :_: ``_`` Seeds_NNS are_VBP not_RB sown_VBN on_IN either_CC a_DT rainy_NN or_CC even_RB a_DT cloudy_NN day_NN when_WRB rain_NN is_VBZ apprehended_VBN ,_, as_IN the_DT wet_NN ground_NN rots_VBD them_PRP ._.

161_CD ._.
At_IN about_IN this_DT stage_NN the_DT detection_NN and_CC removal_NN of_IN the_DT male_NN plants_NNS is_VBZ begun_VBN ._.

The_DT cultivation_NN of_IN hemp_NN in_IN the_DT Ganja_NNP Mahal_NNP is_VBZ a_DT practice_NN that_WDT is_VBZ handed_VBN down_RP from_IN father_NN to_TO son_NN in_IN common_JJ with_IN so_RB many_JJ arts_NNS and_CC industries_NNS in_IN this_DT country_NN ._.

An_DT account_NN of_IN the_DT cultivation_NN is_VBZ furnished_VBN in_IN the_DT appendix_NN of_IN Mr._NNP James_NNP Wilson_NNP 's_POS evidence_NN as_IN having_VBG been_VBN given_VBN him_PRP by_IN his_PRP$ Excise_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Kirthee_NNP Singh_NNP ._.
The_DT plant_NN is_VBZ reared_VBN for_IN bhang_NN only_RB ,_, never_RB for_IN ganja_NN ,_, and_CC charas_NNS is_VBZ not_RB extracted_VBN except_IN rarely_RB for_IN private_JJ consumption_NN ._.
The_DT land_NN is_VBZ usually_RB close_JJ to_TO the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT description_NN called_VBD niain_RB ,_, the_DT same_JJ as_IN that_DT described_VBN by_IN Duthie_NNP and_CC Fuller_NNP ,_, when_WRB speaking_NN of_IN the_DT Himalayan_NNP cultivation_NN ,_, which_WDT the_DT daily_JJ offices_NNS of_IN the_DT vil-_JJ lagers_NNS provide_VBP with_IN a_DT plentiful_JJ supply_NN of_IN manure_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ ploughed_VBN frequently_RB in_IN August_NNP and_CC September_NNP ,_, the_DT seed_NN is_VBZ sown_JJ broadcast_NN in_IN the_DT latter_JJ month_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT field_NN is_VBZ watered_VBN ._.
The_DT watering_NN is_VBZ repeated_VBN three_CD or_CC four_CD times_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT crop_NN is_VBZ hoed_VBN now_RB and_CC then_RB and_CC kept_VBD clear_JJ of_IN weeds_NNS ._.
The_DT crop_NN is_VBZ ready_JJ to_TO cut_VB in_IN March_NNP and_CC April_NNP ._.
No_DT distinction_NN is_VBZ made_VBN between_IN male_NN and_CC female_JJ plants_NNS ._.
The_DT whole_NN is_VBZ cut_VBN and_CC dried_VBN together_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT leaves_NNS ,_, flowers_NNS ,_, and_CC small_JJ twigs_NNS are_VBP then_RB shaken_VBN out_RP and_CC form_VB bhang_NN ._.
The_DT outturn_NN is_VBZ eight_CD to_TO ten_VB maunds_VBZ a_DT bigha_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ sown_JJ broadcast_NN ._.

In_IN March-April_NNP the_DT male_NN plant_NN called_VBN kera_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ smaller_JJR than_IN the_DT female_JJ and_CC bears_VBZ a_DT flowery_JJ head_NN ,_, is_VBZ eradicated_VBN ._.

Mr._NNP Dames_NNP (_( 9_CD )_) ,_, Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Dera_NNP Ghazi_NNP Khan_NNP ,_, states_VBZ that_IN the_DT land_NN is_VBZ well_RB watered_VBN before_IN sowing_VBG between_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN June_NNP and_CC September_NNP ._.

It_PRP may_MD be_VB concluded_VBN that_IN the_DT crop_NN is_VBZ generally_RB grown_VBN in_IN the_DT rabbi_NN season_NN ,_, though_IN occasionally_RB in_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ;_: that_IN it_PRP requires_VBZ high_JJ tilth_NN ,_, including_VBG a_DT liberal_JJ supply_NN of_IN manure_NN and_CC irrigation_NN ;_: that_DT transplantation_NN and_CC the_DT extirpation_NN of_IN the_DT male_NN plant_NN are_VBP sometimes_RB practised_VBN ;_: that_IN the_DT cultivation_NN is_VBZ for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN carried_VBN on_IN by_IN consumers_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP a_DT very_RB large_JJ proportion_NN are_VBP fakirs_NNS and_CC religious_JJ characters_NNS ._.

V._NNP ]_NNP REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
71_CD The_DT first_JJ two_CD are_VBP the_DT best_JJS ;_: the_DT last_JJ is_VBZ too_RB stiff_JJ if_IN the_DT season_NN happens_VBZ to_TO be_VB very_RB wet_JJ ._.
The_DT seed_NN is_VBZ specially_RB cultivated_VBN in_IN fields_NNS apart_RB from_IN the_DT ganja_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN this_DT the_DT practice_NN differs_NNS from_IN that_DT of_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT seeds_NNS which_WDT fall_VBP from_IN the_DT ganja_NN in_IN the_DT process_NN of_IN preparation_NN are_VBP kept_VBN for_IN sowing_NN ._.
The_DT seed_NN of_IN Dhakalgaon_NNP ,_, a_DT village_NN in_IN Indore_NNP territory_NN ,_, is_VBZ considered_VBN the_DT best_JJS ,_, and_CC fetches_NNS double_RB the_DT price_NN of_IN other_JJ seed_NN ._.
It_PRP gives_VBZ a_DT stouter_NN and_CC more_JJR branching_NN plant_NN than_IN the_DT local_JJ seed_NN ._.
The_DT same_JJ fields_NNS are_VBP used_VBN year_NN after_IN year_NN for_IN hemp_NN cultivation_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN sufficient_JJ to_TO manure_VB heavily_RB once_RB in_IN three_CD years_NNS ._.
Here_RB again_RB the_DT practice_NN differs_NNS essentially_RB from_IN that_DT of_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT land_NN will_MD only_RB grow_VB hemp_NN every_DT three_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC heavy_JJ manuring_NN is_VBZ required_VBN each_DT time_NN it_PRP is_VBZ sown_VBN ._.
The_DT manure_NN used_VBN in_IN Khandwa_NNP consists_NNS of_IN household_NN refuse_NN ,_, cow-dung_NN ,_, and_CC ashes_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ given_VBN to_TO the_DT land_NN at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN sixteen_NN to_TO twenty_VB cartloads_NNS per_IN acre_NN ._.

The_DT regular_JJ cultivation_NN ._.
203_CD ._.
In_IN cultivation_NN by_IN well_RB the_DT area_NN is_VBZ generally_RB smaller_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT other_JJ process_NN (_( 2_CD )_) ._.

83_CD new_JJ seed_NN ._.
The_DT soil_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ grown_VBN in_IN Dewas_NNP is_VBZ described_VBN as_IN ``_`` dry_JJ ,_, stony_NN ,_, elevated_VBD loam_NN ._. ''_''

[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
V_NNP 323_CD a_DT description_NN by_IN Mr._NNP Hodgson_NNP of_IN the_DT cultivation_NN for_IN fibre_NN ._.

''_''

219_CD ._.

``_`` Some_DT persons_NNS in_IN the_DT hills_NNS plant_NN a_DT few_JJ trees_NNS which_WDT are_VBP to_TO be_VB had_VBN growing_VBG wild_JJ ._. ''_''
``_`` By_IN slitting_VBG the_DT stem_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN and_CC inserting_VBG a_DT piece_NN of_IN opium_NN or_CC clove_VB or_CC bhiroza_VB wood_NN and_CC tying_VBG up_RP the_DT part_NN with_IN a_DT string_VBG the_DT ganja_NN becomes_VBZ somewhat_RB more_JJR intoxicating_NN ._.

``_`` The_DT male_NN plant_NN of_IN the_DT ganja_NN is_VBZ solid_JJ ;_: the_DT female_JJ one_NN is_VBZ hollow_JJ ._.

From_IN these_DT extracts_NNS it_PRP may_MD be_VB gathered_VBN that_IN the_DT wild_JJ seedlings_NNS are_VBP transport-_JJ ed_NN and_CC planted_VBN in_IN suitable_JJ places_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN every_DT endeavour_NN is_VBZ then_RB made_VBN to_TO en-_JJ courage_NN the_DT secretion_NN of_IN the_DT resin_NN in_IN the_DT female_NN (_( called_VBN male_NN )_) plants_NNS ._.

Bengal_NNP ._.
220_CD ._.
The_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT finest_JJS sort_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ a_DT somewhat_RB laborious_JJ pro-_JJ cess_NN ,_, and_CC requires_VBZ skill_JJ and_CC knowledge_NN ._.
