The_DT crop_NN does_VBZ not_RB all_DT come_VBN to_TO maturity_NN at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT plants_NNS must_MD be_VB manipulated_VBN within_IN three_CD or_CC four_CD days_NNS of_IN maturity_NN ,_, or_CC they_PRP become_VBP useless_JJ ._.
These_DT conditions_NNS have_VBP to_TO be_VB borne_VBN in_IN mind_NN in_IN arranging_VBG for_IN the_DT manufacture_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP would_MD seem_VB that_IN the_DT plants_NNS have_VBP sometimes_VBN to_TO be_VB gathered_VBN before_IN they_PRP are_VBP full_JJ ripe_NN ._.
The_DT plants_NNS are_VBP cut_VBN in_IN batches_NNS ,_, as_RB many_JJ as_IN can_MD be_VB handled_VBN ,_, by_IN the_DT available_JJ labour_NN and_CC means_NNS in_IN three_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT Khasia_NNP plants_NNS are_VBP left_VBN standing_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN gathered_VBN by_IN mistake_NN ,_, are_VBP rejected_VBN in_IN selecting_VBG the_DT portions_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN to_TO be_VB worked_VBN up_RP ._.
The_DT manufacture_NN of_IN flat_JJ ganja_NN ._.
221_CD ._.
The_DT manufacture_NN of_IN flat_JJ ganja_NN takes_VBZ three_CD days_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ carried_VBN out_RP on_IN a_DT piece_NN of_IN ground_NN near_IN the_DT field_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN specially_RB levelled_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT chator_NN or_CC khola_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN plants_NNS handled_VBN in_IN each_DT three-days_NNS '_POS operations_NNS is_VBZ usually_RB about_IN fifty_NN or_CC sixty_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ day_NN the_DT plants_NNS are_VBP cut_VBN in_IN the_DT morning_NN ,_, brought_VBD to_TO the_DT manufacturing_NN ground_NN ,_, and_CC spread_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT sun_NN till_IN the_DT afternoon_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP then_RB cut_VBN up_RP one_CD by_IN one_CD into_IN lengths_NNS of_IN about_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD feet_NNS ._.
Those_DT having_VBG flower_JJR spikes_NNS upon_IN them_PRP are_VBP retained_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT rest_NN is_VBZ thrown_VBN away_RB ._.
The_DT portions_NNS selected_VBN are_VBP spread_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT dew_NN for_IN the_DT night_NN ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT second_JJ day_NN begins_VBZ at_IN noon_NN ._.
It_PRP consists_VBZ in_IN alternately_RB press-_JJ ing_NN and_CC drying_VBG the_DT crop_NN and_CC getting_VBG rid_JJ of_IN useless_JJ leaf_NN and_CC seed_NN ._.
The_DT branches_NNS are_VBP piled_VBN by_IN bundles_NNS of_IN five_CD or_CC ten_VB ,_, flower_JJR spikes_NNS inwards_NNS and_CC overlapping_VBG ,_, in_IN a_DT circular_JJ heap_NN about_IN four_CD feet_NNS in_IN diameter_NN ._.
The_DT workmen_NNS tread_VBP this_DT down_RP ,_, mov-_JJ ing_NN round_NN upon_IN it_PRP and_CC supporting_VBG one_CD another_DT ._.
Bundles_NNS are_VBP added_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN till_VB the_DT heap_NN is_VBZ about_IN two_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ._.
A_DT mat_NN is_VBZ then_RB placed_VBN over_IN the_DT heap_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT men_NNS sit_VBP or_CC place_NN weights_NNS upon_IN it_PRP ._.
After_IN half_PDT an_DT hour_NN of_IN the_DT pressure_NN the_DT pile_NN is_VBZ unstacked_JJ ,_, the_DT bundles_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN off_RP and_CC beaten_VB together_RB over_IN a_DT mat_NN to_TO shake_VB out_RP seeds_NNS and_CC leaf_NN ._.
The_DT heap_NN is_VBZ again_RB built_VBN exactly_RB as_IN before_RB ,_, the_DT upper_JJ layers_NNS of_IN the_DT previous_JJ heap_NN being_VBG put_VBN at_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC the_DT processes_NNS of_IN treading_NN ,_, pressing_VBG ,_, unstacking_JJ ,_, and_CC beating_VBG are_VBP repeated_VBN ._.
The_DT bundles_NNS are_VBP now_RB laid_VBN out_RP side_NN by_IN side_NN on_IN mats_NNS and_CC trodden_JJ individually_RB ,_, the_DT workman_NN holding_VBG the_DT stem_NN ends_VBZ with_IN one_CD foot_NN while_IN he_PRP passes_VBZ the_DT other_JJ foot_NN downwards_NNS over_IN the_DT flower_NN ._.
The_DT bundles_NNS are_VBP turned_VBN and_CC beaten_VBN against_IN the_DT mat_NN during_IN this_DT process_NN ._.
When_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ complete_JJ ,_, they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN reduced_VBN in_IN size_NN ,_, and_CC consist_NN of_IN four_CD or_CC five_CD twigs_NNS each_DT ._.
They_PRP are_VBP then_RB laid_VBN in_IN slanting_VBG position_NN over_IN a_DT pole_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, and_CC left_VBD for_IN the_DT night_NN ._.
The_DT third_JJ day_NN 's_POS work_NN begins_VBZ in_IN the_DT early_JJ morning_NN ._.
The_DT twigs_NNS are_VBP separated_VBN ,_, and_CC again_RB piled_VBN in_IN bundles_NNS in_IN the_DT same_JJ circular_JJ form_NN as_IN before_RB ,_, trodden_NN for_IN a_DT short_JJ 22_CD 86_CD REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
while_IN ,_, and_CC covered_VBD up_RP ._.
Work_NN is_VBZ resumed_VBN at_IN 10_CD A.M_NNP ._.
The_DT heap_NN is_VBZ unstacked_JJ and_CC the_DT bundles_NNS are_VBP carefully_RB handled_VBN to_TO remove_VB leaf_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP then_RB laid_VBN out_RP in_IN rows_NNS and_CC trodden_NN ._.
During_IN this_DT process_NN they_PRP are_VBP turned_VBN over_IN ,_, and_CC at_IN intervals_NNS the_DT sun_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO play_VB upon_IN them_PRP ._.
They_PRP are_VBP then_RB handled_VBN again_RB and_CC gently_RB beaten_VBN ,_, and_CC spread_VBD out_RP more_RBR completely_RB than_IN before_RB ._.
Those_DT that_WDT have_VBP retained_VBN an_DT undue_JJ quantity_NN of_IN leaf_NN are_VBP stood_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.
The_DT last_JJ process_NN is_VBZ to_TO press_VB the_DT twigs_NNS individually_RB with_IN the_DT feet_NNS in_IN the_DT way_NN already_RB described_VBN ._.
The_DT manufacture_NN is_VBZ now_RB complete_JJ ._.
The_DT flower_NN spikes_NNS have_VBP been_VBN pressed_VBN into_IN flat_JJ masses_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT leaf_NN and_CC seeds_NNS have_VBP been_VBN as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ removed_NN ._.

87_CD drug_NN is_VBZ the_DT superior_JJ product_NN ,_, and_CC contains_VBZ much_RB less_JJR useless_JJ matter_NN than_IN the_DT flat_JJ ._.
But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ plain_JJ that_IN in_IN both_DT cases_NNS the_DT process_NN of_IN manufacture_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP is_VBZ technical_JJ and_CC elaborate_JJ ,_, and_CC this_DT is_VBZ the_DT point_NN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ desired_VBN to_TO bring_VB into_IN strong_JJ relief_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB noted_VBN that_IN occasionally_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT weather_NN is_VBZ unfavourable_JJ ,_, the_DT drying_NN is_VBZ effected_VBN by_IN fire_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT result_NN that_IN the_DT ganja_NN is_VBZ discolored_VBN and_CC reduced_VBN in_IN market_NN value_NN ._.
The_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT manufacturing_NN processes_VBZ ._.
224_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Prain_NNP describes_VBZ the_DT purposes_NNS which_WDT are_VBP served_VBN by_IN the_DT above_JJ pro-_JJ cesses_NNS :_: ``_`` The_DT drying_NN process_NN (_( a_DT )_) removes_VBZ the_DT watery_NN juices_NNS of_IN the_DT plants_NNS ,_, and_CC thus_RB not_RB only_RB reduces_VBZ its_PRP$ weight_NN as_IN an_DT excisable_JJ article_NN ,_, but_CC removes_VBZ to_TO a_DT considerable_JJ extent_NN the_DT risk_NN of_IN mould_NN ;_: (_( b_NN )_) causes_VBZ the_DT comparatively_RB inert_JJ small_JJ leaves_NNS to_TO shrivel_VB ,_, and_CC so_RB makes_VBZ their_PRP$ removal_NN more_RBR easy_JJ ._.

''_''

93_CD Preparation_NN of_IN bhang_NN ._.
237_CD ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ prepared_VBN by_IN cutting_VBG and_CC drying_VBG the_DT plants_NNS ,_, cultivated_VBD or_CC wild_JJ ,_, and_CC shaking_VBG or_CC beating_VBG out_RP the_DT leaves_NNS ._.
This_DT is_VBZ done_VBN either_RB by_IN the_DT contractors_NNS themselves_PRP ,_, or_CC by_IN ``_`` resid-_JJ ents_NNS of_IN jungly_NN tracts_NNS for_IN sale_NN to_TO licensed_JJ vendors_NNS ''_'' (_( 38_CD )_) ._.
The_DT districts_NNS where_WRB the_DT cultivated_JJ bhang_NN is_VBZ produced_VBN have_VBP been_VBN named_VBN ._.
The_DT supply_NN of_IN wild_JJ bhang_NN is_VBZ drawn_VBN from_IN various_JJ places_NNS in_IN the_DT belt_NN of_IN wild_JJ growth_NN below_IN the_DT Himalayas_NNP ._.
The_DT gathering_NN goes_VBZ on_IN from_IN March_NNP to_TO June_NNP ._.
The_DT zamindars_NNS on_IN whose_WP$ lands_VBZ the_DT plant_NN grows_VBZ appear_VBP to_TO make_VB some_DT money_NN by_IN selling_VBG it_PRP to_TO the_DT contractors_NNS (_( 247_CD )_) ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ sometimes_RB dried_VBN under_IN straw_NN or_CC other_JJ covering_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP turns_VBZ yellow_JJ ,_, instead_RB of_IN retaining_VBG the_DT green_JJ colour_NN ,_, which_WDT it_PRP does_VBZ if_IN dried_VBN in_IN the_DT sun_NN (_( 21_CD ,_, 248_CD ,_, 203_CD )_) ._.
The_DT object_NN of_IN this_DT is_VBZ not_RB clear_JJ ._.
Preparation_NN of_IN charas_NNS ._.
238_CD ._.
In_IN these_DT provinces_NNS charas_VBP is_VBZ prepared_VBN to_TO a_DT small_JJ extent_NN from_IN the_DT crops_NNS grown_VBN for_IN fibre_NN in_IN the_DT Himalayas_NNP ,_, to_TO a_DT less_RBR extent_NN from_IN the_DT Himalayan_NNP wild_JJ growth_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO a_DT still_RB smaller_JJR extent_NN from_IN the_DT wild_JJ growth_NN of_IN the_DT plains_NNS ._.

The_DT methods_NNS of_IN preparing_VBG charas_NNS from_IN the_DT fibre_NN plants_NNS are_VBP described_VBN by_IN witness_NN (_( 49_CD )_) ._.
The_DT sujango_NN or_CC female_JJ plants_NNS ,_, having_VBG been_VBN cut_VBN in_IN November_NNP ,_, are_VBP spread_VBN out_IN to_TO dry_VB for_IN twenty-four_JJ hours_NNS ._.
The_DT people_NNS then_RB sit_VBP round_NN in_IN the_DT heat_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC pluck_VBD off_RP the_DT flower_JJR heads_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP now_RB full_JJ of_IN seed_NN ,_, discarding_VBG the_DT coarser_NN leaves_VBZ ._.

These_DT are_VBP charas_NNS ._.
Sometimes_RB the_DT plants_NNS are_VBP trodden_JJ instead_RB of_IN handled_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT feet_NNS scraped_VBD ._.
A_DT more_RBR uncommon_JJ method_NN ,_, by_IN which_WDT a_DT choice_NN kind_NN of_IN charas_NN called_VBN chahar_NN mulhi_NN is_VBZ obtained_VBN ,_, is_VBZ to_TO pass_VB the_DT hands_NNS up_IN the_DT ripe_NN plants_NNS while_IN they_PRP are_VBP still_RB standing_VBG in_IN the_DT field_NN ._.
This_DT plan_NN is_VBZ not_RB approved_VBN ,_, the_DT witness_NN says_VBZ ,_, because_IN it_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO damage_VB the_DT fibre_NN ._.

242_CD ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ prepared_JJ both_DT from_IN the_DT uncultivated_JJ plant_NN and_CC from_IN the_DT small_JJ quantity_NN of_IN cultivated_JJ plant_NN in_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ way_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, by_IN simple_JJ drying_NN ._.

No_DT ._.
(_( 73_CD )_) says_VBZ May_NNP or_CC June_NNP ._.

The_DT bhang_NN of_IN some_DT localities_NNS is_VBZ regarded_VBN as_IN superior_JJ ,_, such_JJ as_IN that_DT of_IN Ambota_NNP and_CC Gagret_NNP ,_, of_IN Bhimbar_NNP in_IN Kashmir_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN Gurdaspur_NNP ._.

247_CD ._.

97_CD Preparation_NN of_IN ganja_NN in_IN North_NNP Arcot_NNP ._.
251_CD ._.
Mr._NNP Benson_NNP has_VBZ given_VBN a_DT description_NN of_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN ganja_NN in_IN con-_JJ nection_NN with_IN the_DT regular_JJ cultivation_NN in_IN the_DT North_NNP Arcot_NNP and_CC Kistna_NNP districts_NNS ._.
The_DT methods_NNS differ_VBP materially_RB ._.
``_`` In_IN the_DT Javadi_NNP Hills_NNP the_DT plants_NNS are_VBP cut_VBN and_CC carried_VBN bodily_RB to_TO the_DT village_NN thresh-_JJ ing_JJ floor_NN ._.

The_DT selected_VBN heads_NNS are_VBP spread_VBN out_RP for_IN three_CD to_TO five_CD hours_NNS in_IN the_DT heat_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN to_TO dry_VB ,_, and_CC are_VBP then_RB loosely_RB rolled_VBN in_IN the_DT hand_NN to_TO work_VB out_RP such_JJ seed_NN as_IN may_MD have_VB been_VBN formed_VBN and_CC to_TO break_VB up_RP the_DT leaf_NN that_WDT remains_VBZ ._.

The_DT flower_JJR heads_NNS are_VBP then_RB placed_VBN in_IN a_DT thin_JJ layer_NN in_IN a_DT basket_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN dusted_VBN within_IN with_IN leaf_JJ powder_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP trodden_VBN by_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD men_NNS according_VBG to_TO the_DT size_NN of_IN the_DT basket_NN ._.

This_DT process_NN goes_VBZ on_IN till_IN the_DT basket_NN is_VBZ full_JJ ._.
The_DT contents_NNS are_VBP then_RB turned_VBN out_RP on_IN to_TO flat_JJ hard_JJ ground_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT stone_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN on_IN the_DT pile_NN with_IN other_JJ stones_NNS to_TO add_VB to_TO the_DT weight_NN ._.
The_DT material_NN is_VBZ left_VBN thus_RB for_IN the_DT night_NN ._.
Next_JJ morning_NN each_DT layer_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN off_RP separately_RB ,_, broken_VBD up_RP ,_, and_CC spread_NN in_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.
Each_DT piece_NN is_VBZ trodden_JJ and_CC turned_VBD over_IN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT evening_VBG the_DT pieces_NNS are_VBP again_RB re-piled_JJ and_CC weighted_VBD for_IN the_DT night_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT next_JJ day_NN the_DT process_NN of_IN exposure_NN is_VBZ repeat-_JJ ed_NN until_IN the_DT material_NN is_VBZ thoroughly_JJ dry_JJ ._.
``_`` Great_JJ importance_NN is_VBZ attached_VBN to_TO the_DT thoroughness_NN of_IN the_DT treading_NN ,_, the_DT sufficiency_NN of_IN the_DT pressing_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT complete-_JJ ness_NN of_IN the_DT drying_NN ;_: the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN being_VBG said_VBD to_TO depend_VB on_IN the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT those_DT processes_NNS are_VBP carried_VBN out_RP ._.

252_CD ._.

VI_NNP ._.
either_DT in_IN milk_NN or_CC cocoanut_JJ water_NN ._.

It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT above_NN detailed_VBD description_NN that_IN bhang_NN ,_, whether_IN produced_VBN by_IN the_DT cultivated_VBN or_CC wild_JJ plant_NN ,_, is_VBZ prepared_VBN by_IN simple_JJ drying_NN ._.

Deterioration_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.
274_CD ._.
Regarding_VBG the_DT question_NN whether_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS deteriorate_VBP or_CC not_RB by_IN keeping_VBG ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, for_IN reasons_NNS which_WDT will_MD be_VB explained_VBN later_RB ,_, are_VBP unable_JJ to_TO state_NN definitely_RB the_DT precise_JJ period_NN for_IN which_WDT the_DT drugs_NNS will_MD retain_VB unimpaired_JJ their_PRP$ full_JJ narcotic_JJ power_NN under_IN ordinary_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN storage_NN ._.

The_DT general_JJ tenor_NN of_IN the_DT evidence_NN is_VBZ to_TO the_DT effect_NN that_IN the_DT fresher_JJR the_DT drugs_NNS ,_, the_DT better_JJR ._.

VI_NNP ._.
Regarding_VBG the_DT keeping_VBG properties_NNS of_IN charas_NNS ,_, the_DT information_NN must_MD necessa-_VB rily_RB be_VB inexact_JJ ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ an_DT imported_JJ article_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ practically_RB impossible_JJ for_IN the_DT real_JJ age_NN of_IN any_DT particular_JJ sample_NN to_TO be_VB known_VBN ._.

CHAPTER_NN VII_NNP ._.
TRADE_NN AND_CC MOVEMENT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP ._.
Bengal_NNP ._.
278_CD ._.
The_DT area_NN cultivated_VBN in_IN the_DT Ganja_NNP Mahal_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN 1892-93_CD was_VBD much_RB greater_JJR than_IN in_IN any_DT one_CD of_IN the_DT preceding_VBG 19_CD years_NNS ,_, being_VBG ,_, 3,540_CD bighas_NN (_( Excise_NNP Commissioner_NNP 's_POS Memo-_NNP randum_NN )_) ,_, equivalent_JJ to_TO 1,180_CD acres_NNS ._.

Nearly_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT charas_JJ supply_NN of_IN India_NNP comes_VBZ through_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP ._.

It_PRP grows_VBZ at_IN Bokhara_NNP and_CC other_JJ places_NNS in_IN Turkestan_NNP ,_, but_CC I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN informed_VBN that_IN the_DT Russians_NNPS have_VBP prohibited_VBN its_PRP$ cultivation_NN within_IN their_PRP$ dominions_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN supplies_NNS of_IN the_DT drug_NN are_VBP now_RB obtained_VBN almost_RB entirely_RB from_IN Yarkand_NNP territory_NN ._.

in_IN excess_NN of_IN the_DT real_JJ value_NN ._. ''_''

Ganja_NNP is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS important_JJ of_IN the_DT three_CD drugs_NNS ;_: it_PRP contributes_VBZ nearly_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_JJ drug_NN revenue_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ consumed_VBN in_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT province_NN ._.

10_CD ._.

A_DT mass_NN will_MD sometimes_RB be_VB prepared_JJ and_CC kept_VBD for_IN use_NN day_NN by_IN day_NN ._.

Hemp_NNP sweetmeats_NNS ._.
429_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, a_DT very_RB considerable_JJ consumption_NN of_IN sweetmeats_NNS made_VBN with_IN ganja_NN or_CC bhang_NN ,_, or_CC even_RB sometimes_RB charas_NNS ._.

Various_JJ ways_NNS of_IN using_VBG hemp_NN for_IN consumption_NN ._.

CHAPTER_NN IX_NNP ._.
SOCIAL_NNP AND_NNP RELIGIOUS_NNP CUSTOMS_NNP ._.
Scope_NN of_IN this_DT Chapter_NN ._.
431_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT instructions_NNS issued_VBN to_TO the_DT Commission_NNP by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, reference_NN is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_JJ drugs_NNS among_IN fakirs_NNS and_CC ascetics_NNS who_WP are_VBP held_VBN in_IN veneration_NN by_IN large_JJ classes_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT custom_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO obtain_VB to_TO a_DT large_JJ extent_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, of_IN offering_VBG an_DT infusion_NN of_IN bhang_NN to_TO every_DT guest_NN and_CC member_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN on_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT Durga_NNP Puja_NNP ._.

The_DT custom_NN of_IN worshipping_VBG the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ,_, although_IN not_RB so_RB prevalent_JJ as_IN that_DT of_IN offering_VBG hemp_NN to_TO Siva_NNP and_CC other_JJ deities_NNS of_IN the_DT Hindus_NNP ,_, would_MD nevertheless_RB appear_VB from_IN the_DT state-_JJ ments_NNS of_IN the_DT witnesses_NNS to_TO exist_VB to_TO some_DT extent_NN in_IN some_DT provinces_NNS of_IN India_NNP ._.

General_JJ conclusions_NNS ._.
450_CD ._.
In_IN summing_VBG up_RP their_PRP$ conclusions_NNS on_IN this_DT chapter_NN ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP would_MD first_RB remark_VB that_DT charas_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT comparatively_RB new_JJ article_NN of_IN consumption_NN ,_, has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN shown_VBN to_TO be_VB in_IN any_DT way_NN connected_VBN with_IN religious_JJ observance_NN ._.
As_IN regards_NNS Northern_NNP India_NNP ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN bhang_NN is_VBZ more_RBR or_CC less_RBR common_JJ everywhere_RB in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT social_JJ and_CC religious_JJ customs_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
As_IN regards_NNS ganja_NNS ,_, they_PRP find_VBP that_IN there_EX are_VBP certain_JJ classes_NNS in_IN all_DT parts_NNS ,_, except_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP ,_, who_WP use_VBP the_DT drug_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN their_PRP$ social_JJ and_CC religious_JJ observances_NNS ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP are_VBP also_RB of_IN opinion_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO bhang_VB that_IN its_PRP$ use_NN is_VBZ considered_VBN essential_JJ in_IN some_DT religious_JJ observances_NNS by_IN a_DT large_JJ section_NN of_IN the_DT community_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN regard_NN to_TO ganja_VB that_IN those_DT who_WP consider_VBP it_PRP essential_JJ are_VBP comparatively_RB very_RB few_JJ ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP have_VBP little_JJ doubt_NN that_IN interference_NN with_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT customs_NNS and_CC observances_NNS above_RB referred_VBD to_TO would_MD be_VB regard-_JJ ed_NN by_IN the_DT consumers_NNS as_IN an_DT interference_NN with_IN long_JJ established_VBN usage_NN and_CC as_IN an_DT encroachment_NN upon_IN their_PRP$ religious_JJ liberty_NN ._.
And_CC this_DT feeling_NN would_MD ,_, especially_RB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN bhang_NN ,_, undoubtedly_RB be_VB shared_VBN to_TO some_DT extent_NN by_IN the_DT people_NNS at_IN large_JJ ._.
Regarding_VBG Southern_NNP India_NNP ,_, the_DT same_JJ remarks_NNS apply_RB with_IN this_DT reservation_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT difference_NN between_IN ganja_NN and_CC bhang_NN as_IN materials_NNS for_IN smoking_NN and_CC drink-_JJ ing_NN respectively_RB is_VBZ much_RB less_JJR marked_JJ there_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT distinction_NN between_IN the_DT two_CD forms_NNS of_IN the_DT drug_NN is_VBZ much_RB less_JJR clearly_RB recognised_VBN ,_, although_IN by_IN the_DT term_NN ``_`` bhang_NN ''_'' is_VBZ generally_RB meant_VBN the_DT drug_NN as_IN used_VBN for_IN drinking_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN ``_`` ganja_NN ''_'' the_DT drug_NN as_IN used_VBN for_IN smoking_NN ._.
CHAPTER_NN X._NNP EFFECTS168_NNP REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
X._NN conceals_NNS the_DT smell_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ easily_RB intelligible_JJ that_IN respectable_JJ per-_JJ sons_NNS should_MD have_VB a_DT very_RB limited_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT consumption_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ,_, and_CC especially_RB of_IN the_DT smoking_NN of_IN ganja_NN and_CC charas_NNS ,_, except_IN by_IN dissipated_JJ or_CC excessive_JJ consumers_NNS ._.
As_IN might_MD have_VB been_VBN anticipated_VBN from_IN a_DT careful_JJ consideration_NN of_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS ,_, the_DT experience_NN of_IN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN witnesses_NNS ,_, even_RB of_IN those_DT who_WP have_VBP seen_VBN something_NN of_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ,_, is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO be_VB confined_VBN to_TO having_VBG seen_VBN palki-bearers_NNS or_CC boatmen_NNS smoke_VBP in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN hard_JJ work_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO occasionally_RB seeing_VBG a_DT friend_NN indulge_NN ._.
Some_DT other_JJ witnesses_NNS have_VBP only_RB known_VBN the_DT habit_NN as_IN practised_VBN by_IN such_JJ persons_NNS as_IN fakirs_NNS or_CC by_IN dissipated_JJ persons_NNS who_WP consume_VBP to_TO excess_VB ._.
Some_DT have_VBP only_RB seen_VBN the_DT drug_NN used_VBN when_WRB they_PRP have_VBP gone_VBN in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN duty_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, in_IN pursuance_NN of_IN this_DT inquiry_NN ,_, to_TO shops_NNS or_CC other_JJ places_NNS where_WRB smokers_NNS resort_VBP ._.
The_DT witnesses_NNS are_VBP very_RB few_JJ who_WP have_VBP any_DT extensive_JJ and_CC accurate_JJ acquaintance_NN with_IN consumption_NN ._.

But_CC there_EX are_VBP certain_JJ admixtures_NNS which_WDT are_VBP taken_VBN with_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS ,_, at_IN least_JJS ostensibly_RB ,_, with_IN the_DT express_NN purpose_NN of_IN intensifying_VBG their_PRP$ effects_NNS ._.

193_CD are_VBP stated_VBN to_TO have_VB induced_VBN slight_JJ excitement_NN within_IN half_PDT a_DT minute_NN ,_, lasting_VBG for_IN a_DT few_JJ seconds_NNS ._.

488_CD ._.

223_CD Summary_NNP of_IN the_DT evidence_NN ._.
510_CD ._.
The_DT medical_JJ evidence_NN which_WDT has_VBZ thus_RB been_VBN analysed_VBN very_RB clearly_RB indi-_JJ cates_NNS in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP that_WDT when_WRB the_DT basis_NN of_IN the_DT opinions_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT alleged_VBN evil_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS is_VBZ subjected_VBN to_TO careful_JJ examination_NN ,_, the_DT grounds_NNS on_IN which_WDT the_DT allegations_NNS are_VBP founded_VBN prove_NN to_TO be_VB in_IN the_DT highest_JJS degree_JJ defective_NN ._.
A_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN medical_JJ witnesses_NNS of_IN all_DT classes_NNS ascribe_VBP dysentery_NN ,_, bronchitis_NN ,_, and_CC asthma_NN to_TO the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ._.
An_DT equally_RB representa-_JJ tive_JJ number_NN give_VB a_DT diametrically_RB opposite_JJ opinion_NN ._.
The_DT most_RBS striking_JJ feature_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ evidence_NN is_VBZ perhaps_RB the_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN practitioners_NNS of_IN long_JJ experience_NN who_WP have_VBP seen_VBN no_DT evidence_NN of_IN any_DT connection_NN between_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS and_CC disease_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB witnesses_NNS who_WP speak_VBP to_TO these_DT ill_JJ effects_NNS from_IN the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN are_VBP cross-examined_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ found_VBN that_IN (_( a_DT )_) their_PRP$ opinions_NNS are_VBP based_VBN on_IN popular_JJ ideas_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN ;_: (_( b_NN )_) they_PRP have_VBP not_RB discriminated_VBN between_IN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN moderate_JJ and_CC excessive_JJ use_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ;_: (_( c_NN )_) they_PRP have_VBP accepted_VBN the_DT diseases_NNS as_IN being_VBG induced_VBN by_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS because_IN the_DT patients_NNS confessed_VBD to_TO the_DT habit_NN ;_: and_CC (_( d_NN )_) the_DT fact_NN has_VBZ been_VBN overlooked_VBN that_IN the_DT smoking_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS is_VBZ recognized_VBN as_IN a_DT remedial_JJ agent_NN in_IN asthma_NN and_CC bronchitis_NN ._.
A_DT few_JJ witnesses_NNS incidentally_RB refer_VBP to_TO personal_JJ idiosyncrasy_NN as_IN perhaps_RB being_VBG a_DT factor_NN in_IN render-_JJ ing_VBG some_DT consumers_NNS of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS less_CC tolerant_JJ and_CC more_RBR liable_JJ to_TO be_VB affected_VBN by_IN them_PRP even_RB when_WRB used_VBN in_IN moderate_JJ quantity_NN ._.
This_DT view_NN the_DT Commission_NNP are_VBP pre-_JJ pared_VBN to_TO accept_VB ;_: but_CC for_IN the_DT vast_JJ majority_NN of_IN consumers_NNS ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP consider_NN that_IN the_DT evidence_NN shows_VBZ the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN ganja_NN or_CC charas_NNS not_RB to_TO be_VB appreciably_RB harmful_JJ ,_, while_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN moderate_JJ bhang_NN drinking_VBG the_DT evidence_NN shows_VBZ the_DT habit_NN to_TO be_VB quite_RB harmless_JJ ._.
As_IN in_IN long-continued_JJ and_CC excessive_JJ cigarette_NN smoking_VBG considerable_JJ bronchial_JJ irritation_NN and_CC chronic_JJ catarrhal_NNS laryngitis_NN may_MD be_VB induced_VBN ,_, so_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, may_MD a_DT similar_JJ condition_NN be_VB caused_VBN by_IN excessive_JJ ganja_NN or_CC charas_NNS smoking_VBG ;_: and_CC to_TO the_DT 224_CD REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.

siddhi_NN tipplers_NNS than_IN among_IN other_JJ people_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ class_NN ._.
What_WP does_VBZ happen_VB is_VBZ that_DT digestion_NN is_VBZ impaired_VBN ,_, the_DT daily_JJ consumption_NN of_IN such_PDT a_DT dose_NN of_IN narcotic_JJ overburdens_NNS the_DT alimentary_JJ and_CC eliminating_VBG systems_NNS ,_, the_DT man_NN 's_POS appetite_NN goes_VBZ ,_, and_CC the_DT food_NN he_PRP takes_VBZ is_VBZ not_RB properly_RB absorbed_VBN ._.

Asylum_NNP statistics_NNS ._.
515_CD ._.
If_IN this_DT be_VB the_DT case_NN in_IN England_NNP ,_, how_WRB much_RB more_RBR is_VBZ it_PRP necessary_JJ in_IN India_NNP to_TO exercise_VB caution_NN in_IN receiving_VBG statistics_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT causes_NNS of_IN insanity_NN ,_, to_TO examine_VB carefully_RB the_DT source_NN from_IN which_WDT they_PRP come_VBP ,_, and_CC to_TO rely_VB only_RB on_IN those_DT which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN carefully_RB tested_VBN ._.
The_DT Com-_NNP mission_NN in_IN examining_VBG the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS soon_RB found_VBD that_IN they_PRP could_MD not_RB be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN trustworthy_NN ._.
They_PRP first_RB of_IN all_DT enquired_VBN into_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN the_DT Dullunda_NNP Asylum_NNP (_( Calcutta_NNP )_) ,_, and_CC ascertained_VBD generally_RB the_DT practice_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO recording_VBG the_DT cause_NN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN registers_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT character_NN of_IN the_DT inquiry_NN on_IN which_WDT that_DT record_NN was_VBD based_VBN ._.
What_WP they_PRP learned_VBD there_EX led_VBN them_PRP to_TO distrust_VB the_DT asylum_NN statistics_NNS ._.
They_PRP determined_VBD to_TO make_VB a_DT careful_JJ inquiry_NN into_IN all_DT cases_NNS attributed_VBD to_TO hemp_VB drugs_NNS in_IN one_CD year_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO endeavour_VB thus_RB to_TO ascertain_VB how_WRB far_RB the_DT statistics_NNS were_VBD reasonably_RB correct_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, also_RB to_TO arrive_VB at_IN some_DT conclusion_NN as_IN to_TO whether_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS have_VBP any_DT real_JJ connection_NN with_IN insanity_NN ._.
They_PRP fixed_VBP on_IN the_DT year_NN 1892_CD ._.

At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN these_DT statistics_NNS had_VBD been_VBN completed_VBN and_CC printed_VBN before_IN the_DT proposal_NN to_TO have_VB any_DT inquiry_NN into_IN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN ganja_NN had_VBD been_VBN made_VBN ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP decided_VBD to_TO take_VB up_RP each_DT of_IN these_DT cases_NNS of_IN 1892_CD separately_RB ,_, and_CC to_TO inquire_VB as_RB fully_RB as_IN possible_JJ into_IN its_PRP$ history_NN ._.
Hitherto_NNP any_DT opinion_NN regarding_VBG the_DT connection_NN between_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS and_CC insanity_NN which_WDT has_VBZ professed_VBN to_TO have_VB any_DT solid_JJ basis_NN at_IN all_DT ,_, or_CC to_TO be_VB more_JJR than_IN a_DT vague_JJ impression_NN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN based_VBN on_IN the_DT figures_NNS contained_VBN in_IN the_DT annual_JJ Statement_NNP No_NNP ._.

The_DT figures_NNS contained_VBN in_IN that_DT statement_NN are_VBP compiled_VBN from_IN the_DT entries_NNS as_IN to_TO cause_VB made_VBN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN registers_NNS ._.
The_DT great_JJ majority_NN of_IN the_DT Superintend-_JJ ents_NNS of_IN Asylums_NNP have_VBP clearly_RB stated_VBN that_IN these_DT entries_NNS are_VBP based_VBN on_IN the_DT de-_JJ scriptive_JJ rolls_NNS sent_VBD with_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS ._.
They_PRP have_VBP not_RB considered_VBN it_PRP necessary_JJ to_TO enquire_VB how_WRB far_RB the_DT descriptive_JJ rolls_NNS are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO give_VB trustworthy_JJ information_NN regarding_VBG cause_NN ,_, how_WRB or_CC by_IN what_WP agency_NN that_DT information_NN is_VBZ collected_VBN ,_, or_CC bywhom_VB it_PRP is_VBZ supplied_VBN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN sufficient_JJ that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ sent_VBN to_TO them_PRP officially_RB ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP have_VBP no_DT opportunities_NNS of_IN testing_VBG it_PRP ._.

The_DT practically_RB universal_JJ rule_NN has_VBZ been_VBN to_TO 228_CD REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
XII_NN ._.
accept_IN the_DT cause_NN entered_VBD in_IN the_DT descriptive_JJ roll_NN ,_, and_CC only_RB to_TO make_VB enquiries_NNS in_IN the_DT asylum_NN when_WRB no_DT cause_NN had_VBD been_VBN entered_VBN ._.
It_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB said_VBD that_IN even_RB this_DT practice_NN has_VBZ been_VBN carefully_RB and_CC accurately_RB observed_VBD ._.
The_DT copying_NN of_IN the_DT entries_NNS is_VBZ left_VBN to_TO subordinates_NNS who_WP sometimes_RB use_VBP their_PRP$ own_JJ discretion_NN ._.
Thus_RB Dr._NNP McConaghy_NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Poona_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, says_VBZ :_: ``_`` The_DT register_NN is_VBZ filled_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT assistant_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT lunatic_NN 's_POS admission_NN ._.
According_VBG to_TO my_PRP$ idea_NN of_IN asylum_NN practice_NN ,_, the_DT entries_NNS must_MD be_VB in_IN accordance_NN with_IN Form_NNP C._NNP If_IN the_DT cause_NN is_VBZ entered_VBN as_IN unknown_JJ ,_, it_PRP must_MD be_VB so_RB shown_VBN in_IN the_DT register_NN ._.

Yet_RB of_IN the_DT six_CD cases_NNS ascribed_VBN to_TO hemp_VB drugs_NNS in_IN 1892_CD ,_, there_EX was_VBD not_RB one_CD in_IN respect_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT entry_NN in_IN the_DT register_NN corresponded_VBD with_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT descriptive_JJ roll_NN as_IN to_TO cause_VB ,_, and_CC there_EX was_VBD nothing_NN on_IN record_NN to_TO explain_VB the_DT discrepancy_NN in_IN any_DT case_NN ._.

''_''

under_IN the_DT ``_`` Not_RB given_VBN ''_'' of_IN a_DT previous_JJ case_NN ._.

517_CD ._.

The_DT following_JJ statements_NNS may_MD be_VB taken_VBN as_IN typical_JJ of_IN the_DT usual_JJ experience_NN of_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP in_IN this_DT respect_NN :_: ``_`` As_IN Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, I_PRP got_VBD the_DT information_NN from_IN friends_NNS or_CC from_IN the_DT police_NN ._.
Very_RB often_RB I_PRP had_VBD cases_NNS where_WRB no_DT friends_NNS came_VBD ._.
In_IN such_JJ cases_NNS I_PRP trusted_VBD to_TO the_DT police_NN or_CC wherever_NN I_PRP could_MD get_VB my_PRP$ information_NN ''_'' (_( Surgeon-Major_NNP Boyd_NNP ,_, Colaba_NNP )_) ._.

The_DT inquiry_NN into_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT case_NN is_VBZ not_RB an_DT inquiry_NN conducted_VBN by_IN a_DT pro-_JJ fessional_JJ man_NN from_IN the_DT persons_NNS likely_JJ to_TO know_VB most_JJS about_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ ._.

Dacca_NNP Asylum_NNP no_DT exception_NN ._.
519_CD ._.
Although_IN these_DT statistics_NNS have_VBP been_VBN discussed_VBN seriously_RB from_IN year_NN to_TO year_NN ,_, they_PRP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN much_RB used_VBN as_IN the_DT basis_NN of_IN measures_NNS of_IN ganja_JJ administration_NN except_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Burma_NNP ._.

[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
XII_NN ._.
in_IN Burma_NNP were_VBD ostensibly_RB based_VBN on_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ asylum_NN returns_NNS which_WDT were_VBD quot-_JJ ed_NN by_IN more_JJR than_IN one_CD Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, special_JJ reference_NN being_VBG made_VBN to_TO the_DT figures_NNS for_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Asylum_NNP ._.
This_DT special_JJ reference_NN to_TO this_DT asylum_NN and_CC the_DT fact_NN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ situated_VBN in_IN the_DT most_RBS important_JJ ganja-consuming_JJ tract_NN in_IN India_NNP were_VBD among_IN the_DT reasons_NNS why_WRB the_DT Commission_NNP summoned_VBD Surgeon-_NNP Lieutenant-Colonel_NNP Crombie_NNP (_( Bengal_NNP witness_RB No_NNP ._.
104_CD )_) as_IN a_DT witness_NN ;_: for_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN seven_CD years_NNS Superintendent_NNP of_IN that_DT asylum_NN ._.
Before_IN the_DT Opium_NNP Commission_NNP also_RB ,_, and_CC in_IN an_DT interesting_JJ discussion_NN on_IN opium_NN published_VBN as_IN a_DT Supplement_NN to_TO the_DT Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Gazette_NNP of_IN July_NNP 1892_CD ,_, Dr._NNP Crombie_NNP had_VBD incidentally_RB spoken_VBN strongly_RB of_IN the_DT evil_JJ effects_NNS of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS as_IN seen_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ asylum_NN experience_NN ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP hoped_VBD therefore_RB that_IN Dr._NNP Crombie_NNP might_MD be_VB found_VBN to_TO have_VB devoted_VBN special_JJ attention_NN to_TO his_PRP$ asylum_NN work_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO speak_VB with_IN exceptional_JJ authority_NN ._.
He_PRP informed_VBD the_DT Commission_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ written_VBN evidence_NN that_IN ``_`` nearly_RB thirty_JJ per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS in_IN Bengal_NNP are_VBP persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN ganja_JJ smokers_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN a_DT very_RB large_JJ pro-_JJ portion_NN of_IN these_DT I_PRP believe_VBP ganja_NN to_TO be_VB the_DT actual_JJ and_CC immediate_JJ cause_NN of_IN their_PRP$ insanity_NN ._.
But_CC though_IN I_PRP am_VBP not_RB prepared_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ never_RB the_DT cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ most_RBS frequently_RB the_DT result_NN of_IN long_RB excessive_JJ use_NN ,_, and_CC especially_RB of_IN occasional_JJ debauches_NNS with_IN the_DT drug_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ the_DT same_JJ relationship_NN to_TO insanity_NN in_IN India_NNP that_IN alcohol_NN has_VBZ in_IN Europe_NNP ,_, and_CC may_MD be_VB the_DT cause_NN of_IN fierce_JJ maniacal_JJ excitement_NN of_IN short_JJ duration_NN (_( as_IN in_IN delirium_NN tremens_NNS )_) or_CC of_IN a_DT chronic_JJ cheerful_NN mania_NN which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT characteristic_JJ insanity_NN of_IN Indian_JJ asylums_NNS ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ not_RB the_DT same_JJ tendency_NN to_TO lead_VB to_TO dementia_VB ,_, the_DT result_NN of_IN tissue_NN changes_NNS in_IN the_DT brain_NN ,_, as_IN alcohol_NN has_VBZ ._.

Both_DT forms_NNS of_IN ganja_NN insanity_NN ,_, the_DT acute_NN and_CC chronic_NN ,_, are_VBP dis-_JJ tinguishable_JJ by_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS ._.
(_( See_VB separate_JJ memorandum_NNS ._. )_) ''_''
These_DT views_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP stated_VBN in_IN greater_JJR detail_NN in_IN a_DT separate_JJ memorandum_NN ,_, are_VBP based_VBN entirely_RB on_IN his_PRP$ experience_NN as_IN Superintendent_NN of_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Asylum_NNP and_CC as_IN visitor_NN to_TO other_JJ asylums_NNS ;_: for_IN Dr._NNP Crombie_NNP says_VBZ :_: ``_`` In_IN my_PRP$ practice_NN outside_IN of_IN lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS my_PRP$ experience_NN is_VBZ confined_VBN to_TO very_RB few_JJ cases_NNS ,_, only_RB two_CD or_CC three_CD in_IN the_DT whole_JJ course_NN of_IN my_PRP$ service_NN ,_, of_IN ganja_JJ intoxication_NN brought_VBD to_TO hospital_NN ._. ''_''

drug_NN cases_NNS and_CC the_DT large_JJ proportion_NN (_( nearly_RB 2_CD to_TO 1_CD )_) of_IN error_NN in_IN the_DT cases_NNS accept-_JJ ed_NN and_CC recorded_VBD as_IN hemp_JJ drug_NN cases_NNS in_IN Dr._NNP Crombie_NNP 's_POS time_NN too_RB much_JJ weight_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB attached_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ views_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT clinical_JJ features_NNS of_IN hemp_JJ drug_NN insanity_NN ._.

It_PRP may_MD well_RB seem_VB extraordinary_JJ that_IN statistics_NNS based_VBN on_IN such_JJ absolutely_RB untrustworthy_JJ material_NN should_MD have_VB been_VBN submitted_VBN year_NN after_IN year_NN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN reports_NNS ._.

The_DT remarks_NNS of_IN three_CD may_MD be_VB quoted_VBN as_IN being_VBG specially_RB interesting_VBG ._.
Surgeon-Lieutenant-Colonel_NNP Leapingwell_NNP (_( Viza-_NNP gapatam_NN )_) says_VBZ :_: ``_`` I_PRP should_MD myself_PRP have_VB put_VBN down_RP ganja_NN as_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN in_IN any_DT case_NN where_WRB I_PRP examined_VBD the_DT friends_NNS if_IN they_PRP merely_RB said_VBD the_DT man_NN used_VBN ganja_NN and_CC I_PRP could_MD get_VB no_DT other_JJ cause_NN ,_, as_IN I_PRP did_VBD not_RB discriminate_VB between_IN the_DT excessive_JJ and_CC moderate_JJ use_NN ._.
I_PRP should_MD go_VB much_RB more_RBR carefully_RB into_IN the_DT matter_NN now_RB ,_, since_IN I_PRP have_VBP in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ inquiry_NN learned_VBD so_RB much_RB more_RBR about_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ._. ''_''

''_''
Surgeon-Major_JJ Willcocks_NNP ,_, of_IN Agra_NNP ,_, says_VBZ :_: ``_`` Ordinarily_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT practice_NN to_TO enter_VB hemp_JJ drugs_NNS as_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN where_WRB it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN shown_VBN that_IN the_DT patient_NN used_VBN these_DT drugs_NNS ._.

The_DT Commission_NNP were_VBD forced_VBN to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT trust-_JJ worthy_JJ basis_NN for_IN a_DT satisfactory_JJ and_CC reasonably_RB accurate_JJ opinion_NN on_IN the_DT connection_NN between_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS and_CC insanity_NN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN statistics_NNS appended_VBD to_TO the_DT annual_JJ reports_NNS ._.

The_DT Commission_NNP added_VBD :_: ``_`` In_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT importance_NN of_IN this_DT branch_NN of_IN the_DT inquiry_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ sug-_JJ gested_JJ that_IN ,_, wherever_VB this_DT is_VBZ possible_JJ ,_, a_DT careful_JJ local_JJ inquiry_NN should_MD be_VB con-_JJ ducted_VBN by_IN a_DT trustworthy_NN and_CC experienced_JJ Magistrate_NNP ,_, in_IN consultation_NN with_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT past_JJ personal_JJ and_CC family_NN history_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN ,_, and_CC any_DT circumstances_NNS likely_JJ to_TO throw_VB light_NN on_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN his_PRP$ insanity_NN ._.
The_DT record_NN of_IN this_DT inquiry_NN should_MD in_IN each_DT case_NN be_VB submitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Commission_NNP through_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT asylum_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT patient_NN was_VBD treated_VBN to_TO enable_VB him_PRP to_TO submit_VB the_DT report_NN above_IN mentioned_VBN ._. ''_''
All_PDT this_DT information_NN ,_, both_DT that_WDT collected_VBD in_IN the_DT asylums_NNS and_CC that_DT collected_VBD in_IN these_DT further_JJ inquiries_NNS ,_, is_VBZ recorded_VBN in_IN Vol_NNP ._.

Only_RB the_DT final_JJ report_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP is_VBZ printed_VBN ,_, unless_IN it_PRP is_VBZ inaccurate_JJ or_CC incomplete_JJ ,_, or_CC unless_IN there_EX is_VBZ anything_NN of_IN interest_NN in_IN the_DT records_NNS which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ not_RB noticed_VBN ._.

of_IN the_DT admissions_NNS for_IN 1892_CD in_IN which_WDT the_DT cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN was_VBD shown_VBN as_IN ``_`` unknown_JJ ._. ''_''

241_CD Dhatura_NNP ._.
525_CD ._.
There_EX are_VBP three_CD ``_`` mixed_JJ ''_'' cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT dhatura_NN has_VBZ been-ascertained_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT possible_JJ cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN ._.

The_DT result_NN is_VBZ that_IN in_IN some_DT cases_NNS men_NNS who_WP should_MD have_VB been_VBN simply_RB punished_VBN for_IN being_VBG intoxicated_VBN have_VBP been_VBN sent_VBN to_TO the_DT asylum_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, though_RB sane_NN when_WRB they_PRP reached_VBD that_IN institution_NN ,_, have_VBP been_VBN detained_VBN there_RB ._.
These_DT cases_NNS are_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, much_RB rarer_JJR than_IN they_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB ,_, if_IN one_CD may_MD judge_VB from_IN the_DT old_JJ asylum_NN reports_NNS ._.
A_DT more_RBR serious_JJ result_NN of_IN this_DT con-_JJ fusion_NN is_VBZ that_IN there_EX are_VBP cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT men_NNS who_WP have_VBP committed_VBN offences_NNS ,_, espe-_JJ cially_RB crimes_NNS of_IN violence_NN ,_, under_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS have_VBP been_VBN acquitted_VBN on_IN the_DT ground_NN of_IN insanity_NN ,_, although_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS have_VBP been_VBN such_JJ that_WDT had_VBD the_DT intoxicant_JJ been_VBN alcohol_RB ,_, they_PRP would_MD have_VB been_VBN convicted_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ undoubtedly_RB more_RBR difficult_JJ in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN ganja_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN alcohol_NN to_TO recognize_VB the_DT line_NN drawn_NN for_IN social_JJ and_CC legal_JJ purposes_NNS between_IN intoxication_NN and_CC insanity_NN ._.

When_WRB they_PRP are_VBP recognised_VBN as_IN a_DT common_JJ intoxicant_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB hoped_VBN that_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN the_DT Courts_NNS will_MD be_VB freed_VBN from_IN the_DT occasional_JJ blemishes_NNS above_IN indicated_VBN ._.

Social_JJ effects_NNS ._.
540_CD ._.

These_DT last_JJ statements_NNS can_MD not_RB be_VB accepted_VBN as_IN generally_RB true_JJ ._.
No_DT doubt_NN the_DT drugs_NNS may_MD sometimes_RB have_VB these_DT sedative_JJ effects_NNS ,_, though_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN witnesses_NNS speak_VBP to_TO habitual_JJ use_NN producing_VBG irritability_NN ._.
Any_DT one_NN who_WP has_VBZ extensively_RB visited_VBN ganja_JJ shops_NNS or_CC places_NNS where_WRB consumers_NNS congregate_VB must_MD be_VB struck_VBN with_IN the_DT perfect_JJ quiet_JJ which_WDT prevails_VBZ in_IN the_DT great_JJ majority_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT slothful_NN ,_, easy_JJ attitude_NN of_IN the_DT consumers_NNS ._.
These_DT are_VBP not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT invariable_JJ effects_NNS of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.
Undoubtedly_RB the_DT excessive_JJ use_NN does_VBZ in_IN some_DT cases_NNS make_VBP the_DT consumer_NN violent_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ probably_RB safe_JJ to_TO say_VB in_IN view_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT evidence_NN that_IN the_DT tendency_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS often_RB seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB to_TO develop_VB or_CC bring_VB into_IN play_NN the_DT natural_JJ disposition_NN of_IN the_DT consumer_NN ,_, to_TO emphasize_VB his_PRP$ characteristic_JJ peculiarities_NNS ,_, or_CC to_TO assist_VB him_PRP in_IN obtaining_VBG what_WP he_PRP sets_VBZ his_PRP$ mind_NN on_IN ._.
If_IN he_PRP aims_VBZ at_IN ease_NN and_CC rest_NN and_CC is_VBZ let_JJ alone_RB ,_, he_PRP will_MD be_VB quiet_JJ and_CC restful_JJ ;_: but_CC if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ naturally_RB excitable_JJ and_CC ill-tempered_JJ ,_, or_CC if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ disturbed_VBN and_CC crossed_VBN ,_, he_PRP may_MD be_VB violent_JJ ._.
This_DT may_MD be_VB accepted_VBN perhaps_RB as_IN generally_RB true_JJ if_IN allowance_NN be_VB specially_RB made_VBN for_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN excess_NN in_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS tends_VBZ to_TO show_VB and_CC to_TO develop_VB inherent_JJ weakness_NN of_IN character_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN the_DT fact_NN that_IN so_RB many_JJ witnesses_NNS testify_VBP to_TO the_DT peaceable_JJ and_CC orderly_JJ character_NN of_IN the_DT excessive_JJ con-_NN sumers_NNS goes_VBZ far_RB to_TO prove_VB that_DT in_IN this_DT country_NN experience_NN shows_VBZ that_IN as_IN a_DT rule_NN these_DT drugs_NNS do_VBP not_RB tend_VB to_TO crime_NN and_CC violence_NN ._.
Evidence_NN to_TO the_DT contrary_NN ._.

These_DT witnesses_NNS did_VBD not_RB profess_VB a_DT detailed_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN these_DT cases_NNS ,_, but_CC merely_RB suggested_VBD that_IN the_DT records_NNS should_MD be_VB consulted_VBN as_IN the_DT cases_NNS seemed_VBD to_TO be_VB such_JJ as_IN the_DT Commission_NNP desired_VBD to_TO see_VB ._.

Dr._NNP Mullane_NNP ,_, a_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP in_IN Assam_NNP ,_, mentions_NNS two_CD cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT he_PRP thinks_VBZ the_DT crime_NN was_VBD associated_VBN with_IN ganja_NN ._.

a_DT witness_NN at_IN the_DT trial_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Moran_NNP 's_POS memory_NN does_VBZ not_RB serve_VB him_PRP well_RB in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT facts_NNS ._.

The_DT next_JJ case_NN (_( No_UH ._.
73_CD )_) is_VBZ given_VBN by_IN Colonel_NNP Chrystie_NNP ,_, a_DT Deputy_NNP Inspector-_NNP General_NNP of_IN Police_NNP in_IN Madras_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ referred_VBN to_TO by_IN several_JJ other_JJ witnesses_NNS ._.
A_DT peon_NN having_VBG been_VBN fined_VBN is_VBZ said_VBD in_IN his_PRP$ irritation_NN to_TO have_VB taken_VBN a_DT considerable_JJ amount_NN of_IN ganja_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO have_VB then_RB rushed_VBN out_RP with_IN a_DT club_NN ._.
He_PRP struck_VBD a_DT boy_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB ran_VBD along_IN the_DT public_JJ road_NN until_IN he_PRP met_VBD an_DT old_JJ man_NN whom_WP he_PRP beat_VBD to_TO death_NN ,_, alleging_VBG afterwards_NNS that_IN he_PRP had_VBD killed_VBN a_DT black_JJ pig_NN ._.

This_DT is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT accepted_JJ cases_NNS for_IN 1892_CD in_IN the_DT Madras_NNP Asylum_NNP ._.

74_CD to_TO 76_CD )_) were_VBD referred_VBN to_TO by_IN Mr._NNP Stokes_NNP ,_, a_DT Madras_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, as_IN having_VBG been_VBN mentioned_VBN to_TO him_PRP by_IN a_DT Police_NNP Inspector_NNP as_IN ganja_NN cases_NNS ._.

The_DT last_JJ Madras_NNP case_NN (_( No_UH ._.
77_CD )_) is_VBZ a_DT strange_JJ one_CD ._.
A_DT father_NN first_RB cruelly_RB burned_VBN his_PRP$ child_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, when_WRB the_DT child_NN cried_VBD ,_, it_PRP occurred_VBD to_TO the_DT father_NN as_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT feast_JJ day_NN to_TO offer_VB the_DT child_NN to_TO the_DT god_NN ._.

Results_NNS of_IN the_DT examination_NN of_IN these_DT cases_NNS ._.
551_CD ._.
Of_IN these_DT twenty-three_JJ cases_NNS then_RB ,_, the_DT records_NNS in_IN not_RB less_JJR than_IN eighteen_VB show_NN that_IN the_DT crimes_NNS can_MD not_RB be_VB connected_VBN with_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ one_CD case_NN on_IN which_WDT doubt_NN is_VBZ thrown_VBN by_IN subsequent_JJ discoveries_NNS ._.
The_DT connection_NN between_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS and_CC crime_NN is_VBZ only_RB established_VBN in_IN the_DT remaining_VBG four_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ astonishing_VBG to_TO find_VB how_WRB defective_JJ and_CC misleading_VBG are_VBP the_DT recollections_NNS which_WDT many_JJ witnesses_NNS retain_VBP even_RB of_IN cases_NNS with_IN which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP had_VBN special_JJ opportunities_NNS of_IN being_VBG well_RB acquainted_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ instructive_JJ to_TO see_VB how_WRB preconceived_JJ notions_NNS based_VBN on_IN rumour_NN and_CC tradition_NN tend_VBP to_TO preserve_VB the_DT impression_NN of_IN certain_JJ particulars_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT impressions_NNS of_IN far_RB more_RBR important_JJ features_NNS of_IN the_DT case_NN are_VBP completely_RB forgotten_VBN ._.

Summary_NNP of_IN conclusions_NNS regard-_JJ ing_JJ effects_NNS ._.
552_CD ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP have_VBP now_RB examined_VBN all_PDT the_DT evidence_NN before_IN them_PRP regarding_VBG the_DT effects_NNS attributed_VBD to_TO hemp_VB drugs_NNS ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB well_RB to_TO summarize_VB briefly_IN the_DT conclusions_NNS to_TO which_WDT they_PRP come_VBP ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN clearly_RB established_VBN that_IN the_DT occasional_JJ use_NN of_IN hemp_NN in_IN moderate_JJ doses_NNS may_MD be_VB beneficial_JJ ;_: but_CC this_DT use_NN may_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN medicinal_NN in_IN character_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ rather_RB to_TO the_DT popular_JJ and_CC common_JJ use_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS that_IN the_DT Commission_NNP will_MD now_RB confine_VB their_PRP$ attention_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ convenient_JJ to_TO consider_VB the_DT effects_NNS separately_RB as_IN affecting_VBG the_DT physical_JJ ,_, mental_JJ ,_, or_CC moral_JJ nature_NN ._.
In_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT physical_JJ effects_NNS ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP have_VBP come_VBN to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS is_VBZ practically_RB attended_VBN by_IN no_DT evil_JJ results_NNS at_IN all_DT ._.
There_EX may_MD be_VB exceptional_JJ cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT ,_, owing_VBG to_TO idiosyncracies_NNS of_IN constitution_NN ,_, the_DT drugs_NNS in_IN even_RB moderate_JJ use_NN may_MD be_VB injurious_JJ ._.
There_EX is_VBZ probably_RB nothing_NN the_DT use_NN of_IN which_WDT may_MD not_RB possibly_RB be_VB injurious_JJ in_IN cases_NNS of_IN exceptional_JJ intolerance_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP also_RB many_JJ cases_NNS where_WRB in_IN tracts_NNS with_IN a_DT specially_RB malarious_JJ climate_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN circumstances_NNS of_IN hard_JJ work_NN and_CC exposure_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS attribute_VBP beneficial_JJ effects_NNS to_TO the_DT habitual_JJ moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS ;_: and_CC there_EX is_VBZ evidence_NN to_TO show_VB that_IN the_DT popular_JJ impression_NN may_MD have_VB some_DT basis_NN in_IN fact_NN ._.
Speaking_VBG generally_RB ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS appears_VBZ to_TO cause_VB no_DT appreciable_JJ physical_JJ injury_NN of_IN any_DT kind_NN ._.
The_DT excessive_JJ use_NN does_VBZ cause_VB injury_NN ._.
As_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN other_JJ intoxicants_NNS ,_, excessive_JJ use_NN tends_VBZ to_TO weaken_VB the_DT constitu-_JJ tion_NN and_CC to_TO render_VB the_DT consumer_NN more_RBR susceptible_JJ to_TO disease_VB ._.
In_IN respect_NN to_TO the_DT particular_JJ diseases_NNS which_WDT according_VBG to_TO a_DT considerable_JJ number_NN of_IN witnesses_NNS 264_CD REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.

XIII_NN ._.
should_MD be_VB associated_VBN directly_RB with_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB reasonably_RB estab-_JJ lished_VBD that_IN the_DT excessive_JJ use_NN of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS does_VBZ not_RB cause_VB asthma_NN ;_: that_IN it_PRP may_MD indirectly_RB cause_VB dysentery_NN by_IN weakening_VBG the_DT constitution_NN as_IN above_IN indicated_VBN ;_: and_CC that_IN it_PRP may_MD cause_VB bronchitis_NN mainly_RB through_IN the_DT action_NN of_IN the_DT inhaled_JJ smoke_NN on_IN the_DT bronchial_JJ tubes_NN ._.
In_IN respect_NN to_TO the_DT alleged_VBN mental_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP have_VBP come_VBN to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS produces_VBZ no_DT inju-_JJ rious_JJ effects_NNS on_IN the_DT mind_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD indeed_RB be_VB accepted_VBN that_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN special-_JJ ly_NN marked_VBD neurotic_JJ diathesis_NN ,_, even_RB the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN may_MD produce_VB mental_JJ injury_NN ._.

But_CC putting_VBG aside_RB these_DT quite_RB exceptional_JJ cases_NNS ,_, the_DT moder-_JJ ate_NN use_NN of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS produces_VBZ no_DT mental_JJ injury_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ otherwise_RB with_IN the_DT excessive_JJ use_NN ._.
Excessive_JJ use_NN indicates_NNS and_CC intensifies_NNS mental_JJ instability_NN ._.
It_PRP tends_VBZ to_TO weaken_VB the_DT mind_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD even_RB lead_VB to_TO insanity_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN said_VBD by_IN Dr._NNP Blanford_NNP that_IN ``_`` two_CD factors_NNS only_RB are_VBP necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT causation_NN of_IN insanity_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP complementary_JJ ,_, heredity_NN ,_, and_CC stress_NN ._.

It_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN the_DT excessive_JJ use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS may_MD ,_, especially_RB in_IN cases_NNS where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ any_DT weakness_NN or_CC hereditary_JJ predisposition_NN ,_, induce_VB insanity_NN ._.

There_EX is_VBZ no_DT adequate_JJ ground_NN for_IN believing_VBG that_IN it_PRP injuriously_RB affects_VBZ the_DT character_NN of_IN the_DT consumer_NN ._.
Excessive_JJ consumption_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, both_DT indicates_NNS and_CC inten-_JJ sifies_NNS moral_JJ weakness_NN or_CC depravity_NN ._.
Manifest_NNP excess_NN leads_VBZ directly_RB to_TO loss_NN of_IN self-_JJ respect_NN ,_, and_CC thus_RB to_TO moral_JJ degradation_NN ._.

His_PRP$ excesses_NNS may_MD indeed_RB bring_VB him_PRP to_TO degraded_VB poverty_NN which_WDT may_MD lead_VB him_PRP to_TO dishonest_VB practices_NNS ;_: and_CC occasionally_RB ,_, but_CC apparently_RB very_RB rarely_RB indeed_RB ,_, exces-_JJ sive_JJ indulgence_NN in_IN hemp_JJ drugs_NNS may_MD lead_VB to_TO violent_JJ crime_NN ._.
But_CC for_IN all_DT practical_JJ purposes_NNS it_PRP may_MD be_VB laid_VBN down_RP that_IN there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ or_CC no_DT connection_NN between_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS and_CC crime_NN ._.
Viewing_VBG the_DT subject_NN generally_RB ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB added_VBN that_IN the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS is_VBZ the_DT rule_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT excessive_JJ use_NN is_VBZ comparatively_RB exceptional_JJ ._.
The_DT moderate_JJ use_NN practically_RB produces_VBZ no_DT ill_JJ effects_NNS ._.
In_IN all_DT but_CC the_DT most_RBS excep-_JJ tional_JJ cases_NNS ,_, the_DT injury_NN from_IN habitual_JJ moderate_JJ use_NN is_VBZ not_RB appreciable_JJ ._.
The_DT excessive_JJ use_NN may_MD certainly_RB be_VB accepted_VBN as_IN very_RB injurious_JJ ,_, though_IN it_PRP must_MD be_VB admit-_JJ ted_VBN that_IN in_IN many_JJ excessive_JJ consumers_NNS the_DT injury_NN is_VBZ not_RB clearly_RB marked_VBN ._.
The_DT injury_NN done_VBN by_IN the_DT excessive_JJ use_NN is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, confined_VBD almost_RB exclusively_RB to_TO the_DT consumer_NN himself_PRP ;_: the_DT effect_NN on_IN society_NN is_VBZ rarely_RB appreciable_JJ ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT most_RBS striking_JJ feature_NN in_IN this_DT inquiry_NN to_TO find_VB how_WRB little_JJ the_DT effects_NNS of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS have_VBP obtruded_VBN themselves_PRP on_IN observation_NN ._.
The_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN witnesses_NNS of_IN all_DT classes_NNS who_WP professed_VBD never_RB to_TO have_VB seen_VBN these_DT effects_NNS ,_, the_DT vague_JJ statements_NNS made_VBN by_IN many_JJ who_WP professed_VBD to_TO have_VB observed_VBN them_PRP ,_, the_DT very_RB few_JJ witnesses_NNS who_WP could_MD so_RB recall_VB a_DT case_NN as_IN to_TO give_VB any_DT definite_JJ account_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN these_DT cases_NNS broke_VBD down_RB on_IN the_DT first_JJ attempt_NN to_TO examine_VB them_PRP ,_, are_VBP facts_NNS which_WDT combine_VBP to_TO show_VB most_JJS clearly_RB how_WRB little_JJ injury_NN society_NN has_VBZ hitherto_VBN sustained_VBN from_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.
CHAPTER_NN XIV_NN ._.
THE_DT POLICY_NNP OF_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUG_NNP ADMINISTRATION_NNP ._.
General_NNP principles_NNS regarding_VBG sump-_JJ tuary_JJ laws_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ application_NN to_TO India_NNP ._.
553_CD ._.
The_DT question_NN of_IN prohibiting_VBG the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN and_CC the_DT sale_NN of_IN ganja_NN and_CC allied_JJ drugs_NNS is_VBZ one_CD which_WDT stands_VBZ in_IN the_DT forefront_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ inquiry_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN remarked_VBN by_IN a_DT well_RB known_VBN historian*_NN that_IN ``_`` no_DT laws_NNS are_VBP of_IN any_DT service_NN which_WDT are_VBP above_IN the_DT working_VBG level_NN of_IN public_JJ morality_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT deeper_NN they_PRP are_VBP carried_VBN down_IN into_IN life_NN ,_, the_DT larger_JJR become_VB the_DT opportunities_NNS of_IN evasion_NN ._. ''_''
If_IN these_DT words_NNS are_VBP true_JJ as_IN applied_VBN to_TO England_NNP under_IN a_DT feudal_JJ system_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP much_RB more_JJR true_JJ in_IN the_DT present_JJ day_NN as_IN applied_VBN to_TO British_JJ India_NNP ._.
The_DT Gov-_NNP ernment_NN of_IN this_DT country_NN has_VBZ not_RB grown_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT forces_NNS contained_VBN within_IN it_PRP ,_, but_CC has_VBZ been_VBN superimposed_VBN upon_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT paternal_JJ system_NN of_IN government_NN which_WDT may_MD have_VB been_VBN suitable_JJ in_IN England_NNP during_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT initial_JJ development_NN of_IN some_DT Indian_JJ provinces_NNS during_IN the_DT period_NN immediately_RB following_VBG their_PRP$ annexation_NN ,_, becomes_VBZ purely_RB visionary_JJ when_WRB public_JJ opinion_NN is_VBZ in_IN process_NN of_IN formation_NN and_CC the_DT needs_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS are_VBP year_NN by_IN year_NN finding_VBG more_JJR ready_JJ expression_NN ._.
Occasionally_RB ,_, no_DT doubt_NN ,_, the_DT Legislature_NNP in_IN India_NNP has_VBZ anti-_RB cipated_VBN a_DT standard_NN of_IN morality_NN not_RB universally_RB accepted_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN laws_NNS relating_VBG to_TO infanticide_VB or_CC the_DT burning_NN of_IN Hindu_NNP widows_NNS ;_: but_CC these_DT measures_NNS were_VBD passed_VBN under_IN an_DT overwhelming_JJ sense_NN of_IN the_DT necessity_NN of_IN correct-_JJ ing_VBG popular_JJ notions_NNS of_IN morality_NN in_IN matters_NNS coming_VBG well_RB within_IN the_DT sphere_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT assurance_NN that_IN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN time_NN they_PRP could_MD not_RB fail_VB to_TO secure_VB the_DT assent_NN of_IN all_DT intelligent_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN ._.

XIV_NN ._.
as_IN is_VBZ personal_JJ only_RB ,_, involving_VBG no_DT consequences_NNS ,_, none_NN at_IN least_JJS of_IN a_DT painful_JJ or_CC inju-_JJ rious_JJ kind_NN ,_, to_TO other_JJ people_NNS ,_, I_PRP hold_VBP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ allowable_JJ in_IN all_DT ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT more_RBR thoughtful_JJ and_CC cultivated_VBD often_RB a_DT duty_NN ,_, to_TO assert_VB and_CC promulgate_VB with_IN all_PDT the_DT force_NN they_PRP are_VBP capable_JJ of_IN their_PRP$ opinion_NN of_IN what_WP is_VBZ good_JJ or_CC bad_JJ ,_, admirable_JJ or_CC contemptible_JJ ,_, but_CC not_RB to_TO compel_VB others_NNS to_TO conform_VB to_TO that_DT opinion_NN ,_, whether_IN the_DT force_NN used_VBN is_VBZ that_IN of_IN extra_JJ legal_JJ coercion_NN ,_, or_CC exerts_NNS itself_PRP by_IN means_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN ._.
Even_RB in_IN those_DT portions_NNS of_IN conduct_NN which_WDT do_VBP affect_VB the_DT interests_NNS of_IN others_NNS ,_, the_DT onus_NN of_IN making_VBG out_RP a_DT case_NN always_RB lies_VBZ on_IN the_DT defenders_NNS of_IN legal_JJ prohibitions_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB merely_RB a_DT constructive_NN or_CC presumptive_JJ injury_NN to_TO others_NNS which_WDT will_MD justify_VB the_DT interference_NN of_IN law_NN with_IN individual_JJ freedom_NN ._.
To_TO be_VB prevented_VBN from_IN what_WP one_CD is_VBZ inclined_VBN to_TO ,_, or_CC from_IN acting_VBG contrary_JJ to_TO one_CD 's_POS own_JJ judgment_NN of_IN what_WP is_VBZ desirable_JJ ,_, is_VBZ not_RB only_RB always_RB irksome_VB ,_, but_CC always_RB tends_NNS ,_, pro_FW tanto_FW ,_, to_TO starve_VB the_DT develop-_JJ ment_NN of_IN some_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT bodily_NN or_CC mental_JJ faculties_NNS ,_, either_RB sensitive_JJ or_CC active_JJ ;_: and_CC ,_, unless_IN the_DT conscience_NN of_IN the_DT individual_NN goes_VBZ freely_RB with_IN the_DT legal_JJ restraint_NN ,_, it_PRP partakes_VBZ ,_, either_RB in_IN a_DT great_JJ or_CC in_IN a_DT small_JJ degree_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT degradation_NN of_IN slavery_NN ._.
Scarcely_RB any_DT degree_NN of_IN utility_NN short_JJ of_IN absolute_JJ necessity_NN will_MD justify_VB a_DT prohibi-_JJ tory_NN regulation_NN ,_, unless_IN it_PRP can_MD also_RB be_VB made_VBN to_TO recommend_VB itself_PRP to_TO the_DT general_JJ conscience_NN ;_: unless_IN persons_NNS of_IN ordinary_JJ good_JJ intentions_NNS either_CC believe_VBP already_RB ,_, or_CC can_MD be_VB induced_VBN to_TO believe_VB ,_, that_IN the_DT thing_NN prohibited_VBN is_VBZ a_DT thing_NN which_WDT they_PRP ought_MD not_RB to_TO wish_VB to_TO do_VB ._. ''_''
These_DT remarks_NNS have_VBP been_VBN given_VBN at_IN length_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT Com-_NNP mission_NN believe_VBP that_IN they_PRP contain_VBP a_DT clear_JJ exposition_NN of_IN the_DT principles_NNS which_WDT should_MD guide_VB them_PRP in_IN deciding_VBG whether_IN the_DT prohibition_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS should_MD be_VB authoritatively_RB enforced_VBN by_IN Government_NNP ._.
The_DT question_NN of_IN entirely_RB suppress-_JJ ing_VBG all_DT intoxicants_NNS ._.
554_CD ._.
Now_RB ,_, a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS (_( among_IN whom_WP may_MD in_IN all_DT probability_NN be_VB reckoned_VBN the_DT mover_NN of_IN the_DT question_NN in_IN the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS which_WDT led_VBD to_TO the_DT appointment_NN of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ Hemp_NNP Drugs_NNP Commission_NNP )_) deem_VBP it_PRP to_TO be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT British_JJ Govern-_NNP ment_NN to_TO suppress_VB the_DT trade_NN in_IN all_DT intoxicants_NNS in_IN all_PDT the_DT countries_NNS under_IN its_PRP$ sway_NN ;_: and_CC there_EX are_VBP no_DT doubt_NN special_JJ circumstances_NNS in_IN India_NNP which_WDT render_VBP it_PRP less_RBR impossible_JJ than_IN in_IN some_DT other_JJ countries_NNS to_TO consider_VB even_RB so_RB drastic_JJ a_DT policy_NN ._.
These_DT are_VBP notably_RB the_DT general_JJ sobriety_NN of_IN its_PRP$ races_NNS and_CC the_DT feeling_NN ,_, popular_JJ as_RB well_RB as_IN religious_JJ ,_, which_WDT prevails_VBZ against_IN their_PRP$ use_NN among_IN a_DT large_JJ section_NN of_IN the_DT commu-_JJ nity_NN ._.
Even_RB then_RB no_DT appeal_NN in_IN support_NN of_IN such_PDT a_DT measure_NN can_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO the_DT public_JJ morality_NN or_CC practice_NN of_IN civilised_JJ nations_NNS at_IN large_JJ ,_, nor_CC ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT Commission_NNP are_VBP aware_JJ ,_, to_TO any_DT marked_JJ success_NN attending_VBG the_DT experiment_NN in_IN parti-_JJ cular_JJ instances_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT exceptional_JJ cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT experiment_NN has_VBZ been_VBN attend-_JJ ed_NN with_IN partial_JJ success_NN (_( as_IN in_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT American_NNP States_NNPS )_) ,_, the_DT reformation_NN of_IN the_DT habit_NN has_VBZ become_VBN an_DT object_NN of_IN desire_NN to_TO the_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT enactment_NN for_IN promoting_VBG such_JJ reformation_NN has_VBZ presented_VBN itself_PRP less_JJR as_IN a_DT re-_JJ strictive_JJ force_NN than_IN as_IN an_DT auxiliary_JJ agency_NN ._.
Not_RB laid_VBN before_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ._.
555_CD ._.

It_PRP was_VBD not_RB upon_IN the_DT basis_NN of_IN this_DT general_JJ principle_NN that_IN the_DT Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP for_IN India_NNP accepted_VBD the_DT proposal_NN made_VBN in_IN the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS ,_, nor_CC do_VBP the_DT instructions_NNS issued_VBN to_TO the_DT Commission_NNP by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP cover_NN so_RB wide_JJ a_DT field_NN ._.
The_DT question_NN of_IN prohibiting_VBG the_DT production_NN and_CC sale_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS in_IN India_NNP has_VBZ to_TO be_VB considered_VBN by_IN the_DT Commission_NNP apart_RB from_IN the_DT general_JJ question_NN ,_, and_CC such_JJ prohibition_NN must_MD be_VB justified_VBN ,_, if_IN at_IN all_DT ,_, on_IN some_DT more_RBR special_JJ ground_NN than_IN the_DT mere_JJ fact_NN that_IN they_PRP are_VBP intoxicants_NNS ._.

267_CD The_DT past_JJ history_NN of_IN the_DT case_NN how_WRB far_RB to_TO be_VB relied_VBN upon_IN ._.

arrived_VBN at_IN :_: ``_`` Upon_IN a_DT consideration_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT opinions_NNS thus_RB collected_VBN ,_, it_PRP does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB to_TO the_DT Governor-General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP to_TO be_VB specially_RB proved_VBN that_IN hemp_NN incites_NNS to_TO crime_NN more_JJR than_IN other_JJ drugs_NNS or_CC than_IN spirits_NNS ._.

''_''
In_IN 1877_CD the_DT Bengal_NNP Government_NNP appointed_VBD a_DT special_JJ officer_NN ,_, Babu_NNP Hem_NNP Chunder_NNP Kerr_NNP ,_, to_TO make_VB a_DT full_JJ inquiry_NN into_IN the_DT details_NNS of_IN the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN ganja_NN ,_, the_DT sufficiency_NN or_CC otherwise_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ safeguards_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT reforms_NNS which_WDT it_PRP might_MD be_VB advisable_JJ to_TO introduce_VB ._.

Unfortunately_RB it_PRP is_VBZ habitually_RB used_VBN by_IN large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN the_DT lower_JJR classes_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN ,_, who_WP would_MD ,_, if_IN deprived_VBN of_IN it_PRP altogether_RB ,_, apparently_RB find_VBP in_IN the_DT leaves_NNS of_IN the_DT wild_JJ hemp_NN plant_NN and_CC in_IN other_JJ drugs_NNS narcotics_NNS and_CC stimulants_NNS of_IN equally_RB deleterious_JJ character_NN ._.
It_PRP does_VBZ not_RB seem_VB possible_JJ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, to_TO stop_VB the_DT cultiva-_JJ tion_NN altogether_RB ._.
The_DT policy_NN of_IN Government_NNP must_MD be_VB to_TO limit_VB its_PRP$ production_NN and_CC sale_NN by_IN a_DT high_JJ rate_NN of_IN duty_NN without_IN placing_VBG the_DT drug_NN entirely_RB beyond_IN the_DT reach_NN of_IN those_DT who_WP will_MD insist_VB upon_IN having_VBG it_PRP ._. ''_''
The_DT last_JJ important_JJ utterance_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN previous_JJ to_TO the_DT appoint-_JJ ment_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP is_VBZ contained_VBN in_IN the_DT letter_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Finance_NNP Department_NNP ,_, to_TO Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.

But_CC even_RB if_IN the_DT absolute_JJ prohibition_NN of_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN could_MD be_VB enforced_VBN ,_, the_DT result_NN might_MD be_VB to_TO induce_VB the_DT use_NN of_IN still_RB more_RBR noxious_JJ drugs_NNS ._.

REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
269_CD plant_NN is_VBZ the_DT dhatura_NN (_( Stramonium_NNP )_) ,_, the_DT seeds_NNS of_IN which_WDT are_VBP already_RB used_VBN to_TO inten-_JJ sify_VB the_DT narcotic_JJ effects_NNS of_IN bhang_NN ,_, a_DT liquid_JJ preparation_NN of_IN hemp_NN leaves_NNS ;_: and_CC we_PRP apprehend_VBP that_IN if_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN ganja_NN were_VBD suppressed_VBN altogether_RB ,_, dhatura_NN might_MD be_VB largely_RB resorted_VBN to_TO by_IN the_DT poorer_NN classes_VBZ as_IN a_DT means_NN of_IN satisfying_VBG their_PRP$ craving_NN for_IN stimulants_NNS ._.

That_DT drug_NN is_VBZ produced_VBN in_IN Native_NNP States_NNPS ,_, and_CC the_DT difficulties_NNS in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN preventing_VBG its_PRP$ import_NN from_IN them_PRP ,_, if_IN the_DT supply_NN in_IN British_JJ India_NNP were_VBD cut_VBN off_RP ,_, would_MD be_VB immense_JJ ._.

The_DT hemp_NN plant_NN grows_VBZ readily_RB in_IN India_NNP ,_, in_IN many_JJ places_NNS wild_VBP without_IN cultivation_NN of_IN any_DT kind_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP would_MD be_VB easy_JJ for_IN any_DT one_CD addicted_VBN to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN ganja_NN to_TO grow_VB a_DT plant_NN or_CC two_CD in_IN the_DT enclosure_NN of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ house_NN and_CC in_IN nooks_NNS and_CC corners_NNS which_WDT would_MD be_VB safe_JJ from_IN observation_NN and_CC from_IN the_DT risk_NN of_IN detection_NN ._.
The_DT question_NN in_IN the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS suggests_VBZ that_IN as_IN the_DT possession_NN and_CC sale_NN of_IN ganja_NN has_VBZ been_VBN prohibited_VBN for_IN many_JJ years_NNS in_IN Burma_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ desirable_JJ that_IN the_DT same_JJ pro-_JJ hibition_NN should_MD be_VB extended_VBN to_TO other_JJ provinces_NNS of_IN British_JJ India_NNP ._.

When_WRB the_DT prohibition_NN was_VBD enforced_VBN in_IN Burma_NNP ,_, the_DT drug_NN was_VBD very_RB little_JJ used_VBN by_IN the_DT Native_NNP Burmese_NNP ,_, its_PRP$ consumption_NN being_VBG almost_RB entirely_RB confined_VBN to_TO coolies_NNS and_CC other_JJ immigrants_NNS from_IN India_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN in_IN Burma_NNP ,_, which_WDT had_VBD never_RB been_VBN extensive_JJ ,_, had_VBD vir-_JJ tually_RB ceased_VBN ,_, the_DT consumers_NNS being_VBG dependent_NN on_IN importations_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ supplies_NNS ._.
In_IN India_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT practice_NN of_IN ganja_NN smoking_NN has_VBZ existed_VBN from_IN time_NN immemorial_JJ ,_, and_CC among_IN certain_JJ sects_NNS of_IN Hindus_NNP ,_, ascetics_NNS ,_, and_CC religi-_JJ ous_JJ mendicants_NNS hemp_JJ intoxication_NN is_VBZ habitually_RB indulged_VBN in_IN ;_: and_CC ,_, as_IN explained_VBN in_IN the_DT preceding_NN paragraph_NN ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB impossible_JJ to_TO suppress_VB the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN ._.
But_CC ,_, although_IN we_PRP consider_VBP it_PRP impracticable_JJ to_TO enforce_VB the_DT absolute_JJ prohi-_JJ bition_NN of_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN ganja_NN ,_, we_PRP fully_RB recognise_VBP it_PRP as_IN our_PRP$ duty_NN to_TO restrict_VB its_PRP$ con-_JJ sumption_NN as_RB far_RB as_IN practicable_JJ ,_, and_CC we_PRP have_VBP distinctly_RB laid_VBN down_RP the_DT policy_NN to_TO be_VB pursued_VBN in_IN respect_NN of_IN this_DT drug_NN in_IN our_PRP$ Resolution_NN of_IN the_DT 17th_CD December_NNP 1873_CD already_RB quoted_VBN ._.
The_DT annual_JJ reports_NNS of_IN Excise_NNP Administration_NNP show_VBP that_IN the_DT sub-_JJ ject_NN has_VBZ since_IN been_VBN continually_RB before_RB Local_JJ Governments_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP making_VBG every_DT possible_JJ endeavour_NN to_TO minimise_VB the_DT evils_NNS and_CC discourage_VB the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN wherever_NN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT source_NN of_IN danger_NN to_TO consumers_NNS ._. ''_''
Thus_RB ``_`` restraining_VBG the_DT use_NN and_CC improving_VBG the_DT revenue_NN by_IN the_DT imposi-_JJ tion_NN of_IN suitable_JJ taxation_NN ,_, ''_'' ``_`` discouraging_VBG the_DT consumption_NN by_IN placing_VBG restric-_JJ tions_NNS on_IN the_DT cultivation_NN ,_, preparation_NN ,_, and_CC retail_JJ ,_, and_CC imposing_VBG on_IN their_PRP$ use_NN as_IN high_JJ a_DT rate_NN of_IN duty_NN as_IN can_MD be_VB levied_VBN without_IN inducing_VBG illicit_NN practices_NNS ,_, ''_'' ``_`` limit-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT production_NN and_CC sale_NN by_IN a_DT high_JJ rate_NN of_IN duty_NN without_IN placing_VBG the_DT drug_NN en-_NN tirely_RB beyond_IN the_DT reach_NN of_IN those_DT who_WP will_MD insist_VB upon_IN having_VBG it_PRP ,_, ''_'' ``_`` restricting_VBG consumption_NN as_RB far_RB as_IN practicable_JJ ,_, minimising_VBG the_DT evils_NNS ,_, and_CC discouraging_VBG the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN wherever_NN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT source_NN of_IN danger_NN to_TO consumers_NNS ''_'' have_VBP from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN been_VBN the_DT watch-words_NNS of_IN the_DT Government_NNP in_IN the_DT matter_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS ,_, a_DT policy_NN only_RB once_RB definitely_RB abandoned_VBN ,_, viz._NN ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Burma_NNP ,_, where_WRB total_JJ prohibition_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN in_IN 1873_CD ._.

The_DT ground_NN of_IN the_DT prohibition_NN in_IN Turkey_NNP is_VBZ thus_RB stated_VBN in_IN a_DT note_NN addressed_VBN by_IN the_DT Grand_NNP Vizir_NNP to_TO the_DT Ministry_NNP of_IN Commerce_NNP ,_, Constantinople_NNP ,_, on_IN 1st_CD March_NNP 1292_CD (_( sic_JJ )_) :_: ''_'' From_IN the_DT reports_NNS furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT Imperial_NNP Medical_NNP Council_NNP ,_, it_PRP appeared_VBD that_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN hashish_NN in_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN medicines_NNS was_VBD extremely_RB rare_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN ,_, being_VBG a_DT narcotic_JJ ,_, its_PRP$ use_NN must_MD of_IN necessity_NN be_VB injurious_JJ ,_, and_CC that_DT consequently_RB the_DT sup-_JJ pression_NN of_IN the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN hashish_NN could_MD not_RB fail_VB to_TO prove_VB highly_RB advantageous_JJ ._. ''_''
The_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT prohibition_NN is_VBZ thus_RB described_VBN in_IN an_DT enclosure_NN to_TO the_DT Ambassa-_NNP dor_NN 's_POS reply_NN :_: ``_`` The_DT importation_NN and_CC sale_NN in_IN Turkey_NNP of_IN hashish_NN ,_, though_IN contraband_NN ,_, is_VBZ still_RB ,_, I_PRP hear_VBP ,_, largely_RB carried_VBN on_IN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN smoking_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT composition_NN of_IN various_JJ sweetmeats_NNS ,_, and_CC as_IN an_DT opiate_NN in_IN general_JJ ._. Egypt_NNP ._.
559_CD ._.
In_IN Egypt_NNP the_DT cultivation_NN ,_, use_NN ,_, and_CC importation_NN of_IN hashish_NN were_VBD first_JJ for-_JJ bidden_NN in_IN 1868_CD ,_, but_CC in_IN 1874_CD it_PRP was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB imported_VBN on_IN payment_NN of_IN duty_NN ._.
In_IN November_NNP 1877_CD an_DT order_NN was_VBD received_VBN from_IN Constantinople_NNP that_IN all_DT hashish_JJ brought_VBN into_IN Egypt_NNP was_VBD to_TO be_VB seized_VBN and_CC destroyed_VBN ,_, and_CC finally_RB ,_, in_IN March_NNP 1879_CD ,_, the_DT importation_NN and_CC culti-_JJ vation_NN of_IN hashish_NN were_VBD prohibited_VBN by_IN a_DT Khedivial_NNP decree_NN ._.
In_IN March_NNP 1884_CD it_PRP was_VBD provided_VBN that_IN confiscated_JJ hashish_NN should_MD be_VB sold_VBN by_IN the_DT Customs_NNS (_( for_IN delivery_NN abroad_RB )_) instead_RB of_IN being_VBG destroyed_VBN as_IN formerly_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT proceeds_NNS of_IN the_DT sale_NN divided_VBD amongst_PDT the_DT informers_NNS and_CC officers_NNS who_WP took_VBD part_NN in_IN the_DT seizure_NN ._.
``_`` This_DT measure_NN was_VBD rendered_VBN necessary_JJ ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Mr._NNP Caillard_NNP ,_, the_DT Director-General_NNP of_IN the_DT Customs_NNP ,_, ``_`` by_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN any_DT fund_NN from_IN which_WDT rewards_NNS could_MD be_VB distributed_VBN ;_: while_IN ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT profits_NNS of_IN smuggling_VBG being_VBG very_RB great_JJ ,_, large_JJ sums_NNS were_VBD paid_VBN by_IN the_DT smugglers_NNS to_TO insure_VB the_DT silence_NN or_CC com-_JJ plicity_NN of_IN the_DT Customs_NNP officers_NNS ,_, coastguards-men_NNS ,_, and_CC others_NNS ._.
A_DT considerable_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS are_VBP employed_VBN in_IN the_DT smuggling_NN trade_NN ,_, many_JJ of_IN them_PRP having_VBG no_DT other_JJ means_NNS of_IN subsistence_NN ._.
Great_NNP ingenuity_NN is_VBZ displayed_VBN by_IN the_DT smugglers_NNS in_IN this_DT illicit_JJ trade_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT sooner_NN has_VBZ one_CD trick_NN been_VBN discovered_VBN than_IN another_DT is_VBZ invented_VBN ._.
The_DT great_JJ obstacle_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO the_DT complete_JJ repression_NN of_IN the_DT contra-_JJ band_NN trade_NN is_VBZ the_DT refusal_NN of_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT European_JJ Governments_NNP to_TO recognize_VB the_DT right_NN of_IN the_DT Egyptian_JJ Government_NNP to_TO search_VB suspected_JJ shops_NNS or_CC warehouses_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO punish_VB the_DT delinquents_NNS by_IN fine_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN confiscation_NN ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ._.
In_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT impossibility_NN of_IN suppressing_VBG the_DT contraband_NN trade_NN in_IN hashish_JJ under_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS described_VBN above_IN ,_, I_PRP suggested_VBD to_TO the_DT Minister_NNP of_IN Finance_NNP the_DT desirability_NN of_IN removing_VBG the_DT prohibition_NN against_IN the_DT importation_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP proposed_VBD to_TO collect_VB a_DT customs_NNS duty_NN of_IN P_NNP T._NNP 100_CD per_IN kilogramme_NN (_( 9s_CD ._.
3d.per_CD lb_NN ._.
)_) ,_, besides_IN a_DT license-tax_NN on_IN the_DT sale_NN of_IN the_DT hashish_NN ._.

Prohibition_NN of_IN bhang_NN ._.
564_CD The_DT effects_NNS of_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS have_VBP been_VBN treated_VBN in_IN Chapters_NNP X_NNP to_TO XIII_VB of_IN the_DT Report_NNP ;_: and_CC as_IN the_DT first_JJ result_NN of_IN these_DT conclu-_JJ sions_NNS ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP are_VBP prepared_JJ to_TO state_NN that_IN the_DT suppression_NN of_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN bhang_NN would_MD be_VB totally_RB unjustifiable_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ established_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ satisfaction_NN that_IN this_DT use_NN is_VBZ very_RB ancient_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ some_DT religious_JJ sanc-_JJ tion_NN among_IN a_DT large_JJ body_NN of_IN Hindus_NNP ;_: that_IN it_PRP enters_VBZ into_IN their_PRP$ social_JJ customs_NNS ;_: that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ almost_RB without_IN exception_NN harmless_NN in_IN moderation_NN ,_, and_CC perhaps_RB in_IN some_DT cases_NNS beneficial_JJ ;_: that_IN the_DT abuse_NN of_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB so_RB harmful_JJ as_IN the_DT abuse_NN of_IN alcohol_NN ;_: that_IN its_PRP$ suppression_NN ,_, involving_VBG the_DT extirpation_NN of_IN the_DT wild_JJ hemp_NN plant_NN ,_, would_MD in_IN some_DT tracts_NNS be_VB a_DT matter_NN of_IN great_JJ difficulty_NN ;_: that_IN such_PDT a_DT measure_NN would_MD be_VB extremely_RB unpopular_JJ ,_, and_CC would_MD give_VB rise_NN to_TO widespread_JJ discontent_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, finally_RB ,_, that_IN ,_, if_IN successfully_RB accomplished_VBN ,_, it_PRP would_MD lead_VB to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN more_RBR hurtful_JJ stimulants_NNS ._.
The_DT Com-_NNP mission_NN deem_VBZ it_PRP unnecessary_JJ to_TO traverse_VB the_DT evidence_NN further_RBR than_IN has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN in_IN the_DT preceding_VBG chapters_NNS of_IN this_DT report_NN in_IN support_NN of_IN these_DT propositions_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ almost_RB unanimous_JJ in_IN regard_NN to_TO them_PRP ._.

But_CC absolute_JJ prohibition_NN is_VBZ ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, entirely_RB out_IN of_IN the_DT question_NN ._.
Prohibition_NN of_IN ganja_NN and_CC charas_NNS ._.
565_CD ._.

Ganja_NNP is_VBZ regularly_RB cultivated_VBN in_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, the_DT Central_NNP Prov-_NNP inces_NNS ,_, Madras_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC Berar_NNP ._.
In_IN Bengal_NNP and_CC the_DT Central_NNP Provinces_NNPS ,_, the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN for_IN its_PRP$ production_NN is_VBZ under_IN complete_JJ control_NN ._.
In_IN Berar_NNP cultivation_NN is_VBZ only_RB permitted_VBN under_IN license_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT other_JJ tracts_NNS of_IN British_JJ territory_NN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB directly_RB controlled_VBN ._.

XIV_NN ._. ]_NN
REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
275_CD that_IN the_DT privation_NN to_TO the_DT consumers_NNS would_MD not_RB be_VB serious_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO suggest_VB any_DT drug_NN more_RBR deleterious_JJ than_IN ganja_NN to_TO which_WDT they_PRP could_MD take_VB ._.
The_DT Society_NNP contends_VBZ that_IN the_DT alleged_VBN religious_JJ sanction_NN to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS is_VBZ a_DT fallacy_NN ,_, and_CC refers_NNS to_TO the_DT opinions_NNS of_IN several_JJ pandits_NNS in_IN support_NN of_IN this_DT view_NN ._.
The_DT Society_NNP argues_VBZ that_IN to_TO meet_VB the_DT deficit_NN in_IN the_DT revenue_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD be_VB about_IN 24_CD lakhs_NNS per_IN annum_NN ,_, the_DT salaries_NNS of_IN European_JJ officers_NNS should_MD be_VB cut_VBN down_RP ,_, the_DT duties_NNS on_IN cotton_NN goods_NNS re-imposed_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT income-tax_NN increased_VBD with_IN an_DT enhanced_JJ taxable_JJ minimum_NN ._.
