A_DT general_JJ review_NN of_IN the_DT evidence_NN relating_VBG to_TO the_DT question_NN of_IN prohibition_NN of_IN ganja_NN and_CC charas_JJ brings_VBZ the_DT Commission_NNP to_TO the_DT same_JJ conclusion_NN as_IN that_DT which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP framed_VBN upon_IN a_DT consideration_NN of_IN the_DT evidence_NN on_IN the_DT as-_JJ certained_JJ effects_NNS alone_RB ._.
The_DT weight_NN of_IN the_DT evidence_NN above_IN abstracted_VBN is_VBZ almost_RB entirely_RB against_IN prohibition_NN ._.
Not_RB only_RB is_VBZ such_JJ a_DT measure_NN unnecessary_JJ with_IN refer-_JJ ence_NN to_TO the_DT effects_NNS ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ abundantly_RB proved_VBN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ considered_VBN unnecessary_JJ or_CC impossible_JJ by_IN those_DT most_RBS competent_JJ to_TO form_VB an_DT opinion_NN on_IN general_JJ grounds_NNS of_IN experience_NN ;_: that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB strongly_RB resented_VBN by_IN religious_JJ mendicants_NNS ,_, or_CC would_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN an_DT interference_NN with_IN religion_NN ,_, or_CC would_MD be_VB likely_RB to_TO become_VB a_DT political_JJ danger_NN ;_: and_CC that_IN it_PRP might_MD lead_VB to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN dhatura_NN or_CC other_JJ intoxicants_NNS worse_JJR than_IN CH_NNP ._.
XIV_NN ._. ]_NN
REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
287_CD ganja_NN ._.
Apart_RB from_IN all_PDT this_DT ,_, there_EX is_VBZ another_DT consideration_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN urged_VBN in_IN some_DT quarters_NNS with_IN a_DT manifestation_NN of_IN strong_JJ feeling_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO which_WDT the_DT Com-_NNP mission_NN are_VBP disposed_VBN to_TO attach_VB some_DT importance_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, that_IN to_TO repress_VB the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS in_IN India_NNP and_CC to_TO leave_VB alcohol_NN alone_RB would_MD be_VB misunderstood_VBN by_IN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS who_WP believe_VBP ,_, and_CC apparently_RB not_RB without_IN reason_NN ,_, that_IN more_JJR harm_NN is_VBZ done_VBN in_IN this_DT country_NN by_IN the_DT latter_JJR than_IN by_IN the_DT former_JJ ._.
The_DT conclusion_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP regarding_VBG bhang_NN has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 564_CD ;_: under_IN all_PDT the_DT circumstances_NNS they_PRP now_RB unhesitatingly_RB give_VBP their_PRP$ verdict_NN against_IN such_PDT a_DT violent_JJ measure_NN as_IN total_JJ prohibition_NN in_IN respect_NN of_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.
Policy_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO hemp_VB drugs_NNS ._.
586_CD ._.
Failing_VBG prohibition_NN ,_, the_DT question_NN arises_VBZ ,_, what_WP should_MD be_VB the_DT policy_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS ?_.
On_IN this_DT point_NN some_DT important_JJ evidence_NN has_VBZ been_VBN recorded_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT Commission_NNP deem_VBD it_PRP to_TO be_VB within_IN the_DT scope_NN of_IN their_PRP$ duty_NN to_TO state_NN in_IN general_JJ terms_NNS their_PRP$ own_JJ conclusions_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, they_PRP are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN in_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT harmful_JJ effects_NNS produced_VBN by_IN the_DT excessive_JJ use_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN exceptional_JJ cases_NNS even_RB by_IN the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ,_, the_DT action_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP should_MD be_VB directed_VBN towards_IN restraining_VBG the_DT former_JJ and_CC avoiding_VBG all_DT encouragement_NN to_TO the_DT latter_NN ._.
The_DT object_NN should_MD be_VB to_TO prevent_VB the_DT consumers_NNS ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN may_MD be_VB possible_JJ ,_, from_IN doing_VBG harm_NN to_TO themselves_PRP and_CC to_TO lessen_VB the_DT inducements_NNS to_TO the_DT formation_NN of_IN the_DT habit_NN which_WDT might_MD lead_VB to_TO such_JJ harm_NN ._.
In_IN aiming_VBG at_IN this_DT object_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, other_JJ considerations_NNS need_VBP to_TO be_VB kept_VBN in_IN view_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ in_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN the_DT question_NN of_IN illicit_JJ consumption_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT restriction_NN imposed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP is_VBZ counterbalanced_VBN by_IN a_DT corresponding_JJ increase_NN in_IN smuggling_VBG ,_, no_DT advantage_NN is_VBZ gained_VBN ,_, but_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT contrary_JJ ,_, a_DT moral_JJ wrong_NN is_VBZ done_VBN to_TO the_DT community_NN apart_RB from_IN the_DT annoyance_NN necessitated_VBN by_IN such_JJ restrictions_NNS ._.
Then_RB ,_, if_IN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT legitimate_JJ use_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ,_, restrictions_NNS should_MD not_RB be_VB such_JJ as_IN to_TO make_VB the_DT exercise_NN of_IN this_DT use_NN impossible_JJ ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP have_VBP formed_VBN the_DT opinion_NN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT legitimate_JJ use_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP exists_VBZ generally_RB among_IN the_DT poorest_JJS of_IN the_DT population_NN ._.
Again_RB ,_, if_IN the_DT restrictions_NNS lead_VBP to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN more_RBR deleterious_JJ substances_NNS ,_, or_CC even_RB drive_VB the_DT people_NNS from_IN a_DT habit_NN the_DT evil_NN of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ known_VBN to_TO another_DT of_IN which_WDT the_DT evil_NN may_MD be_VB greater_JJR ,_, they_PRP are_VBP no_RB longer_RBR justifiable_JJ ._.
The_DT policy_NN of_IN Government_NNP must_MD be_VB tempered_VBN by_IN all_PDT these_DT considerations_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT neglect_NN of_IN any_DT one_CD of_IN them_PRP may_MD lead_VB to_TO serious_JJ error_NN ._.
Objection_NN to_TO raising_VBG revenue_NN from_IN hemp_JJ drugs_NNS ._.
587_CD ._.
In_IN this_DT connection_NN an_DT objection_NN to_TO the_DT present_JJ system_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN raised_VBN by_IN some_DT few_JJ of_IN the_DT witnesses_NNS ,_, deserves_VBZ a_DT brief_JJ notice_NN ._.
They_PRP have_VBP laid_VBN down_RP the_DT maxim_NN that_IN the_DT Gov-_NNP ernment_NN should_MD not_RB derive_VB revenue_NN from_IN the_DT vices_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC starting_VBG from_IN this_DT theory_NN they_PRP condemn_VBP the_DT taxation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.
Now_RB ,_, if_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN using_VBG the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS were_VBD so_RB disastrous_JJ as_IN to_TO call_VB for_IN suppression_NN ,_, and_CC such_JJ sup-_JJ pression_NN were_VBD possible_JJ ,_, the_DT conclusion_NN would_MD be_VB just_RB ._.
But_CC this_DT is_VBZ not_RB the_DT Commis-_NNP sion_NN 's_POS view_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT policy_NN which_WDT the_DT Government_NN has_VBZ generally_RB adopted_VBN of_IN restricting_VBG the_DT use_NN by_IN taxation_NN is_VBZ in_IN their_PRP$ opinion_NN the_DT right_JJ one_NN ._.
Taxation_NN by_IN itself_PRP does_VBZ not_RB imply_VB encouragement_NN ,_, though_IN the_DT methods_NNS by_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ raised_VBN may_MD ,_, if_IN not_RB guarded_VBN ,_, tend_VBP to_TO encouragement_VB ._.
And_CC this_DT is_VBZ perhaps_RB the_DT tendency_NN which_WDT the_DT witnesses_NNS above_IN alluded_VBN to_TO mean_VB to_TO criticise_VB ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT taxing_NN of_IN intoxicants_NNS generally_RB ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP can_MD not_RB do_VB better_JJR than_IN quote_NN from_IN a_DT standard_JJ work_NN on_IN political_JJ economy_NN by_IN Professor_NNP Henry_NNP Sidgwick_NNP (_( Chapter_NNP VIII_NNP ,_, paragraph_RB 7_CD )_) :_: ``_`` Generally_RB speaking_VBG ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ desirable_JJ to_TO select_VB 288_CD REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INDIAN_NNP HEMP_NNP DRUGS_NNP COMMISSION_NNP ,_, 1893-94_JJ ._.
[_JJ CH_NNP ._.
XIV_NN ._.
for_IN taxation_NN commodities_NNS of_IN which_WDT the_DT consumption_NN is_VBZ not_RB likely_JJ to_TO be_VB restricted_VBN to_TO any_DT great_JJ extent_NN through_IN the_DT desire_NN to_TO avoid_VB payment_NN of_IN the_DT tax_NN ,_, as_IN all_DT such_JJ restriction_NN increases_VBZ the_DT excess_NN of_IN the_DT loss_NN to_TO the_DT public_NN caused_VBN by_IN the_DT tax_NN over_IN and_CC above_IN the_DT gain_NN to_TO the_DT Treasury_NNP ,_, since_IN the_DT persons_NNS who_WP are_VBP driven_VBN to_TO consume_VB commodities_NNS which_WDT they_PRP do_VBP not_RB like_IN so_RB well_RB suffer_VB a_DT manifest_JJ loss_NN of_IN utility_NN ._.
But_CC there_EX is_VBZ one_CD exceptional_JJ case_NN very_RB important_JJ in_IN our_PRP$ own_JJ system_NN of_IN taxation_NN in_IN which_WDT this_DT principle_NN does_VBZ not_RB apply_VB ,_, viz._NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT commodity_NN taxed_NN is_VBZ largely_RB consumed_VBN in_IN excess_NN of_IN what_WP is_VBZ salutary_JJ ._.
So_RB far_RB as_IN such_JJ excess_NN is_VBZ prevented_VBN by_IN the_DT tax_NN ,_, the_DT restriction_NN of_IN consumption_NN is_VBZ positively_RB beneficial_JJ to_TO the_DT community_NN ;_: and_CC though_IN legislative_JJ interference_NN with_IN the_DT sole_JJ object_NN of_IN limiting_VBG the_DT consumption_NN of_IN dangerous_JJ commodities_NNS is_VBZ emphatically_RB condemned_VBN by_IN advocates_NNS of_IN natural_JJ liberty_NN ,_, they_PRP have_VBP not_RB for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN pushed_VBD their_PRP$ antagonism_NN so_RB far_RB as_IN to_TO maintain_VB that_IN the_DT selection_NN of_IN taxes_NNS ought_MD not_RB to_TO be_VB partly_RB influenced_VBN by_IN this_DT consideration_NN ._. ''_''
In_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, the_DT general_JJ principle_NN may_MD be_VB fearlessly_RB asserted_VBN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ right_JJ to_TO tax_NN intoxicants_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT higher_JJR they_PRP are_VBP taxed_VBG the_DT better_JJR ,_, provided_VBD the_DT considera-_JJ tions_NNS mentioned_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ paragraph_NN are_VBP not_RB lost_VBN sight_NN of_IN ._.
The_DT primary_JJ object_NN of_IN such_JJ taxation_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB the_DT enhancement_NN of_IN the_DT revenue_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT habit_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, if_IN this_DT end_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN in_IN view_NN ,_, the_DT revenue_NN which_WDT flows_VBZ into_IN the_DT Treasury_NNP from_IN this_DT source_NN need_NN be_VB viewed_VBN with_IN no_DT more_JJR suspicion_NN than_IN the_DT fines_NNS on_IN criminals_NNS for_IN breaches_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN ._.
If_IN it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO put_VB briefly_NN in_IN words_NNS a_DT description_NN of_IN what_WP the_DT policy_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP should_MD be_VB in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB somewhat_RB as_IN follows_VBZ :_: To_TO control_VB their_PRP$ use_NN ,_, and_CC especially_RB their_PRP$ harmful_JJ use_NN ,_, in_IN such_PDT a_DT manner_NN as_IN to_TO avoid_VB a_DT worse_JJR evil_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, subject_JJ to_TO this_DT proviso_NN ,_, to_TO tax_NN them_PRP as_RB fully_RB as_IN possible_JJ ._.
Systematic_JJ treatment_NN necessary_JJ ._.
588_CD ._.

The_DT system_NN approved_VBD for_IN one_CD province_NN must_MD not_RB be_VB reversed_VBN in_IN the_DT next_JJ ._.
A_DT standard_NN of_IN administration_NN consistent_NN with_IN itself_PRP must_MD be_VB put_VBN before_IN the_DT Native_NNP States_NNPS ,_, which_WDT in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS are_VBP interlaced_VBN with_IN British_JJ territory_NN ,_, or_CC it_PRP will_MD be_VB impossible_JJ for_IN them_PRP to_TO co-operate_NN ._.

289_CD Question_NN of_IN introducing_VBG a_DT Gov-_JJ ernment_NN monopoly_NN for_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS discussed_VBN ._.

final_JJ arrangements_NNS with_IN the_DT Native_NNP States_NNPS ,_, which_WDT ,_, even_RB if_IN ultimately_RB practicable_JJ ,_, would_MD take_VB an_DT indefinite_JJ time_NN to_TO elaborate_VB ,_, and_CC would_MD probably_RB be_VB regarded_VBN by_IN them_PRP with_IN disfavour_NN ._.

The_DT system_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP :_: Rajshahi_NNP ganja_NN ._.
594_CD ._.
The_DT system_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN elaborated_VBN under_IN these_DT provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN will_MD now_RB be_VB briefly_VBN described_VBN ._.
Though_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN grows_VBZ spontaneously_RB in_IN many_JJ districts_NNS of_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, this_DT fact_NN does_VBZ not_RB seem_VB to_TO affect_VB the_DT ganja_JJ administration_NN to_TO any_DT great_JJ extent_NN ,_, as_IN ganja_NN ,_, except_IN of_IN a_DT very_RB inferior_JJ sort_NN ,_, can_MD not_RB be_VB manufactured_VBN from_IN the_DT wild_JJ plants_NNS ._.
Culti-_JJ vation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN for_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ only_RB allowed_VBN in_IN an_DT area_NN of_IN about_IN 64_CD square_JJ miles_NNS in_IN the_DT Rajshahi_NNP Division_NNP ._.
Every_DT cultivator_NN has_VBZ to_TO take_VB out_RP a_DT license_NN for_IN which_WDT no_DT fee_NN is_VBZ charged_VBN ._.
Within_IN the_DT area_NN above_IN mentioned_VBN ,_, which_WDT ,_, for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN ganja_JJ administration_NN ,_, is_VBZ placed_VBN under_IN the_DT jurisdiction_NN of_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Rajshahi_NNP ,_, though_IN it_PRP lies_VBZ in_IN the_DT three_CD districts_NNS of_IN Rajshahi_NNP ,_, Dinajpur_NNP ,_, and_CC Bogra_NNP ,_, applications_NNS for_IN licenses_NNS are_VBP granted_VBN ,_, unless_IN there_EX be_VB any_DT valid_JJ objection_NN ,_, and_CC remain_VBP in_IN force_NN for_IN one_CD working_VBG year_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ area_NN of_IN ganja_JJ cultivation_NN is_VBZ 2,220_CD bighas_NN ,_, equal_JJ to_TO 740_CD acres_NNS ._.
What_WP follows_VBZ is_VBZ in_IN the_DT words_NNS of_IN the_DT Hon'ble_NNP D._NNP R._NNP Lyall_NNP ,_, C.S.I._NNP ,_, Member_NNP ,_, Board_NNP of_IN Revenue_NNP :_: ``_`` The_DT cultivation_NN is_VBZ inspected_VBN by_IN supervisors_NNS throughout_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN growth_NN ,_, the_DT areas_NNS cultivated_VBD being_VBG com-_JJ pared_VBN with_IN the_DT licenses_NNS ._.
The_DT cultivator_NN cuts_VBZ his_PRP$ crop_NN not_RB necessarily_RB under_IN the_DT supervisor_NN 's_POS eye_NN ,_, nor_CC does_VBZ he_PRP require_VB to_TO get_VB permission_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP gives_VBZ 3_CD days_NNS '_POS notice_NN of_IN his_PRP$ intention_NN to_TO cut_VB ._.

293_CD receive_VBP the_DT whole_JJ crop_NN ._.

Garbjat_NNP ganja_NN and_CC illicit_JJ practices_NNS ._.
596_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ not_RB ordinarily_RB imported_VBN from_IN any_DT other_JJ British_JJ province_NN into_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, but_CC ganja_VBP grown_VBN in_IN the_DT Orissa_NNP Tributary_NNP Mahals_NNP (_( Garhjat_NNP )_) is_VBZ imported_VBN under_IN passes_NNS in_IN small_JJ quantities_NNS into_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN the_DT Orissa_NNP Division_NNP ._.
The_DT rules_NNS as_IN to_TO storage_VB and_CC levy_VB of_IN duty_NN on_IN Rajshahi_NNP ganja_NN apply_NN mutatis_NN mutandis_NN to_TO Garhjat_NNP ganja_NN ._.
Any_DT vendor_NN licensed_VBN to_TO retail_JJ Rajshahi_NNP ganja_NN may_MD sell_VB Garhjat_NNP ganja_NN under_IN the_DT same_JJ license_NN ._.
The_DT Excise_NNP Commissioner_NNP states_VBZ that_IN Garhjat_NNP ganja_NN is_VBZ largely_RB smuggled_VBN into_IN Orissa_NNP ._.
This_DT subject_NN will_MD be_VB again_RB mentioned_VBN further_RB on_IN ._.
With_IN this_DT excep-_JJ tion_NN ,_, the_DT growth_NN and_CC trade_NN in_IN ganja_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP is_VBZ fairly_RB under_IN control_NN ._.
The_DT cases_NNS of_IN illicit_JJ cultivation_NN are_VBP few_JJ ._.
They_PRP are_VBP all_DT of_IN a_DT petty_JJ description_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT growing_NN of_IN a_DT few_JJ plants_NNS (_( very_RB often_RB only_RB a_DT single_JJ plant_NN )_) in_IN the_DT courtyards_NNS of_IN houses_NNS more_RBR for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN using_VBG the_DT leaves_NNS as_IN bhang_NN than_IN for_IN manufac-_JJ turing_NN ganja_NN ._.

XV_NN ._.
Mahal_NNP in_IN the_DT Rajshahi_NNP Division_NNP gives_VBZ some_DT opportunity_NN for_IN illicit_JJ disposal_NN of_IN the_DT ganja_NN ,_, partly_RB owing_VBG to_TO the_DT inadequacy_NN of_IN the_DT supervising_JJ staff_NN ,_, and_CC partly_RB to_TO the_DT storage_NN arrangements_NNS above_IN mentioned_VBN ;_: but_CC the_DT principal_JJ authorities_NNS are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_WDT very_RB little_JJ smuggling_VBG actually_RB occurs_VBZ ._.

Charas_NNS ._.

Bhang_NNP ._.
598_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT licensed_JJ cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN for_IN production_NN of_IN bhang_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ either_RB imported_VBN from_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS or_CC collected_VBN for_IN the_DT market_NN from_IN the_DT spontaneous_JJ growth_NN which_WDT abounds_VBZ in_IN Bhagalpur_NNP and_CC in_IN dis-_JJ tricts_NNS north_RB of_IN the_DT Ganges_NNP ,_, especially_RB Monghyr_NNP and_CC Purnea_NNP ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN observed_VBN above_IN that_IN this_DT collection_NN of_IN the_DT leaves_NNS hardly_RB comes_VBZ within_IN the_DT term_NN ``_`` manufacture_NN ,_, ''_'' and_CC no_DT license_NN is_VBZ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, legally_RB necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT process_NN ._.
But_CC legal_JJ possession_NN of_IN bhang_NN ,_, except_IN by_IN licensed_JJ persons_NNS ,_, is_VBZ limited_VBN to_TO 1/4_CD sér_NN ,_, hence_RB all_DT transactions_NNS of_IN any_DT importance_NN require_VBP a_DT license_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ only_RB when_WRB prepared_VBN to_TO be_VB used_VBN ,_, stored_VBN ,_, or_CC sold_VBN as_IN a_DT narcotic_JJ or_CC stimulant_JJ that_IN it_PRP comes_VBZ under_IN Excise_NNP rules_NNS ._.

The_DT rules_NNS for_IN storage_NN are_VBP similar_JJ to_TO those_DT for_IN ganja_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT small_JJ duty_NN is_VBZ levied_VBN when_WRB the_DT bhang_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN from_IN the_DT warehouse_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN to_TO the_DT shop_NN for_IN retail_JJ sale_NN ._.
The_DT extensive_JJ growth_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN in_IN the_DT districts_NNS above_IN mentioned_VBN renders_NNS control_NN of_IN transactions_NNS in_IN bhang_JJ very_RB difficult_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ certain_JJ that_IN the_DT amount_NN brought_VBD to_TO record_NN and_CC dealt_NN with_IN under_IN Excise_NN rules_NNS does_VBZ not_RB by_IN any_DT means_NNS represent_VBP all_PDT the_DT bhang_NN consumed_VBN in_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
``_`` The_DT use_NN of_IN untaxed_JJ bhang_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ the_DT Excise_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, ``_`` is_VBZ general_JJ ._. ''_''
In_IN January_NNP 1893_CD orders_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Excise_NNP Commissioner_NNP with_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN extirpating_VBG the_DT spontaneous_JJ growth_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN ,_, and_CC thus_RB bringing_VBG bhang_NN under_IN more_RBR efficient_JJ excise_NN control_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT orders_NNS were_VBD cancelled_VBN by_IN the_DT Bengal_NNP Govern-_NNP ment_NN in_IN the_DT following_JJ June_NNP on_IN the_DT ground_NN that_IN the_DT attempt_NN was_VBD impracticable_JJ ,_, and_CC likely_RB to_TO have_VB no_DT result_NN except_IN petty_JJ oppression_NN ._.

295_CD Wholesale_JJ vend_NN ._.
599_CD ._.
The_DT Act_NNP is_VBZ almost_RB silent_JJ on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN wholesale_JJ vendors_NNS ._.

They_PRP very_RB often_RB combine_VBP the_DT functions_NNS of_IN retail_JJ vendor_NN with_IN those_DT of_IN wholesale_JJ vendor_NN ._.

He_PRP says_VBZ that_IN their_PRP$ absence_NN from_IN the_DT ganja_NN tract_NN would_MD itself_PRP cause_VB the_DT decline_NN of_IN the_DT cultivation_NN ._.

603_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT licensed_JJ cultivation_NN of_IN hemp_NN for_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ._.

Wild_NNP hemp_NN grows_VBZ spontaneously_RB in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT province_NN ,_, and_CC especially_RB in_IN the_DT hill_NN tracts_VBZ ._.
The_DT offi-_JJ ciating_NN Excise_NNP Commissioner_NNP says_VBZ :_: ``_`` There_EX is_VBZ nothing_NN to_TO show_VB that_IN the_DT trade_NN in_IN the_DT wild_JJ plant_NN is_VBZ sufficiently_RB large_JJ to_TO compete_VB seriously_RB with_IN excise_NN ganja_NN ,_, unless_IN possibly_RB in_IN the_DT Khasi_NNP Hills_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT continuous_JJ decrease_NN in_IN the_DT consumption_NN of_IN the_DT Rajshahi_NNP drug_NN can_MD ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, only_RB be_VB attributed_VBN to_TO the_DT cheapness_NN of_IN wild_JJ hemp_NN and_CC the_DT great_JJ facilities_NNS for_IN its_PRP$ use_NN ._.

A_DT circular_JJ issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP in_IN October_NNP 1882_CD contains_VBZ a_DT ruling_NN which_WDT appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB the_DT cause_NN of_IN this_DT diversity_NN of_IN practice_NN ._.

Excise_NN system_NN ._.
614_CD ._.

Ordinarily_RB the_DT farm_NN or_CC license_NN is_VBZ held_VBN for_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, the_DT fee_NN payable_JJ being_VBG determined_VBN by_IN auction_NN ._.

The_DT Punjab_NNP system_NN of_IN excise_JJ administration_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO hemp_VB drugs_NNS was_VBD described_VBN by_IN the_DT Excise_NNP Commissioner_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ report_NN for_IN 1892_CD as_IN ``_`` going_VBG very_RB near_IN to_TO reversing_VBG the_DT principle_NN of_IN a_DT maximum_NN of_IN revenue_NN with_IN a_DT minimum_NN of_IN con-_JJ sumption_NN ._. ''_''
In_IN the_DT report_NN for_IN 1893_CD the_DT Excise_NNP Commissioner_NNP says_VBZ :_: ``_`` Taking_VBG Rs_NNP ._.
1,70,854_CD to_TO be_VB approximately_RB the_DT real_JJ value_NN of_IN the_DT licenses_NNS for_IN the_DT sale_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ,_, it_PRP represents_VBZ the_DT total_JJ taxation_NN now_RB levied_VBN on_IN a_DT consumption_NN of_IN up-_JJ wards_NNS of_IN 1,000_CD maunds_NNS of_IN charas_NNS and_CC of_IN nearly_RB 4,000_CD maunds_NNS of_IN bhang_NN ._. ''_''
This_DT is_VBZ ``_`` the_DT weakest_JJS part_NN of_IN our_PRP$ excise_NN system_NN in_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ hoped_VBN that_IN we_PRP are_VBP now_RB within_IN measurable_JJ distance_NN of_IN arrangements_NNS which_WDT will_MD give_VB us_PRP complete_JJ control_NN over_IN the_DT import_NN trade_NN in_IN charas_NNS ,_, and_CC enable_VB us_PRP to_TO impose_VB a_DT duty_NN which_WDT can_MD be_VB gradually_RB raised_VBN ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT plant_NN grows_VBZ wild_VBP in_IN so_RB many_JJ dis-_JJ tricts_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ to_TO be_VB had_VBN for_IN the_DT gathering_NN ,_, while_IN charas_NNS comes_VBZ in_IN by_IN a_DT few_JJ well_RB recognised_VBN routes_NNS and_CC can_MD scarcely_RB escape_VB us_PRP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ much_RB more_RBR difficult_JJ to_TO deal_VB with_IN the_DT trade_NN in_IN bhang_NN efficiently_RB ._.

In_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN license_NN for_IN retail_JJ vend_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT provision_NN against_IN consumption_NN on_IN the_DT premises_NNS ._.

System_NN of_IN vend_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
627_CD ._.

Scope_NN of_IN this_DT Chapter_NN ._.
633_CD ._.
In_IN Chapter_NNP XIV_NNP the_DT Commission_NNP dealt_NN with_IN the_DT general_JJ policy_NN which_WDT ,_, in_IN their_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, should_MD regulate_VB the_DT excise_NN administra-_JJ tion_NN in_IN respect_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN Chapter_NNP XV_NNP they_PRP have_VBP described_VBN the_DT systems_NNS at_IN present_JJ existing_VBG in_IN British_JJ India_NNP ._.
They_PRP will_MD now_RB offer_VB some_DT remarks_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT measures_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO give_VB effect_NN to_TO that_DT policy_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD then_RB proceed_VB to_TO examine_VB the_DT existing_VBG systems_NNS in_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN these_DT remarks_NNS ,_, adding_VBG their_PRP$ recommendations_NNS where_WRB change_NN of_IN any_DT kind_NN seems_VBZ desir-_JJ able_JJ ._.
Farm_NN of_IN monopoly_NN of_IN vend_NN not_RB sufficient_JJ ._.
634_CD ._.
The_DT simplest_JJS method_NN of_IN dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT subject_NN is_VBZ to_TO farm_VB the_DT mono-_JJ poly_NN of_IN vend_NN ,_, leaving_VBG the_DT lessee_NN to_TO make_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ arrangements_NNS for_IN a_DT supply_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ sale_NN to_TO the_DT public_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ the_DT system_NN (_( with_IN some_DT slight_JJ differences_NNS )_) which_WDT is_VBZ in_IN force_NN in_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS ,_, the_DT Punjab_NNP ,_, Madras_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT minor_JJ administrations_NNS ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ the_DT advantage_NN of_IN relieving_VBG the_DT Government_NNP of_IN all_DT responsi-_JJ bility_NN or_CC interest_NN in_IN the_DT matter_NN beyond_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT farms_NNS ._.
It_PRP secures_VBZ a_DT preventive_JJ agency_NN of_IN a_DT non-official_JJ kind_NN for_IN dealing_VBG with_IN illicit_JJ sale_NN and_CC smug-_JJ gling_NN ;_: and_CC if_IN proper_JJ care_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN to_TO appoint_VB respectable_JJ vendors_NNS to_TO prevent_VB combinations_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN keeping_VBG down_RP the_DT price_NN of_IN the_DT farms_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO license_VB shops_NNS only_RB when_WRB they_PRP are_VBP required_VBN by_IN the_DT local_JJ demand_NN ,_, such_PDT a_DT system_NN may_MD appear_VB to_TO be_VB successful_JJ and_CC sufficient_JJ ._.
But_CC there_EX are_VBP some_DT serious_JJ objec-_JJ tions_NNS to_TO it_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ the_DT disadvantage_NN of_IN exercising_VBG no_DT control_NN over_IN the_DT production_NN and_CC consumption_NN ._.
Large_JJ profits_NNS do_VBP not_RB depend_VB upon_IN the_DT price_NN being_VBG raised_VBN to_TO the_DT pitch_NN necessary_JJ to_TO check_VB excess_NN ;_: they_PRP are_VBP as_IN easily_RB real-_NNS ised_VBN by_IN large_JJ sales_NNS at_IN low_JJ rates_NNS ._.
Thus_RB consumption_NN may_MD very_RB probably_RB be_VB un-_JJ duly_NN stimulated_VBD ._.
Secondly_RB ,_, the_DT Government_NNP acquires_VBZ no_DT accurate_JJ information_NN regarding_VBG the_DT extent_NN of_IN the_DT production_NN ,_, the_DT sources_NNS of_IN supply_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT increase_NN or_CC decrease_NN of_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN using_VBG the_DT drugs_NNS ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP think_VB it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP to_TO acquire_VB this_DT information_NN ._.
Thirdly_RB ,_, the_DT system_NN leaves_VBZ the_DT whole_JJ revenue_NN and_CC consequent_JJ check_NN on_IN consumption_NN at_IN the_DT mercy_NN of_IN com-_JJ petition_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT very_RB unsafe_JJ regulator_NN ._.
And_CC ,_, lastly_RB ,_, direct_JJ taxation_NN has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN resorted_VBN to_TO in_IN some_DT cases_NNS with_IN good_JJ results_NNS ,_, whereas_NNS in_IN provinces_NNS where_WRB only_RB the_DT license_NN system_NN prevails_VBZ control_NN is_VBZ insufficient_JJ and_CC taxation_NN inadequate_NN ._.
Combination_NN of_IN direct_JJ duty_NN with_IN auction_NN of_IN licenses_NNS the_DT best_JJS sys-_JJ tem_NN ._.
635_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, the_DT combination_NN of_IN a_DT fixed_JJ duty_NN with_IN license_NN fees_NNS for_IN the_DT privilege_NN of_IN vend_NN constitutes_VBZ the_DT best_JJS system_NN of_IN taxation_NN for_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT system_NN which_WDT prevails_VBZ in_IN regard_NN to_TO spiritu-_JJ ous_JJ liquors_NNS produced_VBD in_IN India_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ equally_RB applicable_JJ to_TO other_JJ intoxicants_NNS ,_, in_IN regard_NN to_TO which_WDT a_DT policy_NN of_IN control_NN and_CC restriction_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ ._.
Unless_IN there_EX are_VBP special_JJ reasons_NNS to_TO the_DT contrary_JJ ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP think_VBP that_IN the_DT monopoly_NN of_IN vend_NN should_MD be_VB auctioned_VBN ._.
The_DT special_JJ advantage_NN of_IN doing_VBG this_DT lies_VBZ in_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN a_DT method_NN is_VBZ thus_RB secured_VBN of_IN adjusting_VBG the_DT total_JJ incidence_NN of_IN taxation_NN to_TO special_JJ circumstances_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT local_JJ demand_NN ,_, the_DT expense_NN of_IN carriage_NN ,_, the_DT facilities_NNS for_IN smuggling_NN ,_, the_DT habits_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT price_NN of_IN other_JJ intoxicants_NNS ._.

XVI_NN ._.
The_DT danger_NN of_IN relying_VBG mainly_RB on_IN the_DT auction_NN system_NN as_IN a_DT check_NN on_IN con-_JJ sumption_NN is_VBZ that_IN a_DT combination_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT absence_NN of_IN competition_NN ,_, among_IN the_DT vendors_NNS might_MD at_IN any_DT time_NN destroy_VB its_PRP$ efficiency_NN ._.

Control_NN of_IN cultivation_NN ._.
636_CD ._.
But_CC besides_IN that_DT which_WDT results_NNS from_IN adequate_JJ taxation_NN ,_, another_DT method_NN of_IN restricting_VBG consumption_NN is_VBZ available_JJ to_TO the_DT Gov-_NNP ernment_NN in_IN the_DT limitation_NN of_IN the_DT sources_NNS of_IN supply_NN ._.
And_CC the_DT most_RBS effective_JJ way_NN of_IN doing_VBG this_DT ,_, at_IN all_DT events_NNS in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN ganja_NN ,_, is_VBZ to_TO prohibit_VB cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ,_, except_IN under_IN license_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO grant_VB licenses_NNS for_IN cultivation_NN in_IN such_JJ a_DT way_NN as_IN to_TO secure_VB supervision_NN and_CC registration_NN of_IN the_DT produce_NN ._.
Unless_IN this_DT is_VBZ done_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ to_TO have_VB any_DT idea_NN of_IN the_DT extent_NN of_IN consumption_NN ._.
The_DT opinions_NNS formed_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO this_DT matter_NN in_IN provinces_NNS where_WRB cultivation_NN is_VBZ not_RB controlled_VBN are_VBP mere_JJ guesses_NNS doomed_VBD to_TO be_VB falsified_VBN ._.

In_IN regard_NN to_TO charas_VB ,_, the_DT only_JJ way_NN of_IN limiting_VBG the_DT supply_NN is_VBZ by_IN taxa-_JJ tion_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT conditions_NNS of_IN the_DT trade_NN are_VBP such_JJ that_IN the_DT supply_NN can_MD be_VB completely_RB regulated_VBN by_IN the_DT application_NN of_IN this_DT method_NN ._.
Where_WRB the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN grows_VBZ spontaneously_RB in_IN abundance_NN ,_, the_DT supply_NN of_IN bhang_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB regulated_VBN ,_, but_CC in_IN other_JJ places_NNS there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN why_WRB its_PRP$ cultivation_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB placed_VBN under_IN the_DT same_JJ restrictions_NNS as_IN that_DT of_IN ganja_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT direct_JJ duty_NN ,_, which_WDT must_MD be_VB light_VBN in_IN proportion_NN to_TO the_DT facilities_NNS for_IN importing_VBG the_DT drug_NN free_JJ of_IN charge_NN ,_, imposed_VBN ._.
The_DT subject_NN will_MD be_VB referred_VBN to_TO again_RB further_RB on_IN ._.
Limitation_NN of_IN shops_NNS ._.
637_CD ._.
Another_DT most_RBS effective_JJ way_NN of_IN reducing_VBG the_DT sources_NNS of_IN supply_NN is_VBZ by_IN keep-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN licensed_JJ shops_NNS to_TO the_DT lowest_JJS limit_NN compatible_JJ with_IN meeting_VBG the_DT real_JJ demand_NN ._.
The_DT increase_NN of_IN shops_NNS or_CC failure_NN to_TO reduce_VB them_PRP has_VBZ often_RB been_VBN pointed_VBN out_RP as_IN an_DT error_NN committed_VBN by_IN individual_JJ district_NN officers_NNS whose_WP$ aim_NN was_VBD too_RB much_JJ to_TO raise_VB revenue_NN ._.
The_DT impropriety_NN of_IN this_DT and_CC its_PRP$ danger_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB too_RB strongly_RB insisted_VBN upon_NN ._.
The_DT matter_NN is_VBZ one_CD which_WDT should_MD be_VB kept_VBN constantly_RB in_IN view_NN by_IN the_DT Local_JJ Governments_NNS and_CC by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
Artificial_JJ checks_NNS not_RB desirable_JJ ._.
638_CD ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP do_VBP not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, advocate_VBP any_DT attempt_NN to_TO restrict_VB the_DT supply_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS by_IN an_DT artificial_JJ check_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN limiting_VBG cultivation_NN of_IN ganja_NN or_CC import_NN of_IN charas_NNS ,_, with_IN reference_NN to_TO an_DT ascertained_VBN or_CC computed_VBN average_JJ demand_NN ._.

The_DT present_JJ system_NN of_IN ganja_JJ administration_NN in_IN the_DT Central_NNP Provinces_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN force_NN since_IN 1882-83_CD ,_, previous_JJ to_TO which_WDT there_EX were_VBD several_JJ changes_NNS ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_VB briefly_NN recapitulated_VBN ._.
In_IN 1871-72_CD ,_, the_DT first_JJ year_NN during_IN which_WDT Act_NNP X_NNP of_IN 1871_CD was_VBD in_IN force_NN ,_, the_DT monopoly_NN of_IN vend_NN of_IN drugs_NNS (_( which_WDT included_VBD madak_NN )_) was_VBD put_VBN up_RP to_TO auction_VB for_IN each_DT district_NN as_IN a_DT whole_JJ ,_, or_CC for_IN smaller_JJR areas_NNS ,_, and_CC knocked_VBD down_RB to_TO the_DT highest_JJS bidder_NN ._.
The_DT contractors_NNS were_VBD free_JJ to_TO make_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ arrange-_JJ ments_NNS for_IN obtaining_VBG the_DT drug_NN from_IN cultivators_NNS ,_, and_CC cultivation_NN was_VBD free_JJ ._.
In_IN 1873-74_CD the_DT Local_NNP Administration_NNP had_VBD to_TO consider_VB complaints_NNS by_IN the_DT retail_JJ con-_NN tractors_NNS to_TO the_DT effect_NN that_IN the_DT extensive_JJ cultivation_NN of_IN ganja_NN for_IN home_NN con-_NN sumption_NN by_IN private_JJ individuals_NNS seriously_RB interfered_VBN with_IN their_PRP$ profits_NNS ,_, and_CC prevented_VBD them_PRP from_IN paying_VBG to_TO Government_NNP as_RB high_VBD a_DT revenue_NN as_IN they_PRP other-_VBP wise_NN might_MD ._.

Accordingly_RB ,_, in_IN April_NNP 1875_CD ,_, rules_NNS were_VBD introduced_VBN pro-_JJ hibiting_NN cultivation_NN except_IN under_IN license_NN ,_, for_IN which_WDT the_DT levy_NN of_IN an_DT acreage_NN fee_NN was_VBD authorised_VBN ,_, and_CC embodying_VBG other_JJ provisions_NNS for_IN inspection_NN of_IN stocks_NNS and_CC licenses_NNS to_TO cover_VB the_DT possession_NN of_IN the_DT produce_NN until_IN its_PRP$ purchase_NN by_IN the_DT licensed_JJ vendor_NN ._.
The_DT acreage_NN fee_NN was_VBD fixed_VBN soon_RB afterwards_NNS at_IN Re_NNP ._.
1_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN 1876-77_CD a_DT special_JJ penal_JJ fee_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.

1_CD per_IN sér_NN ._.

Mr._NNP Monteath_NNP ,_, Col-_NNP lector_NN ,_, says_VBZ :_: ``_`` I_PRP think_VBP the_DT present_JJ system_NN of_IN excise_JJ administration_NN in_IN respect_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS has_VBZ worked_VBN fairly_RB well_RB ,_, but_CC that_IN the_DT time_NN has_VBZ come_VBN for_IN putting_VBG these_DT drugs_NNS on_IN the_DT same_JJ footing_NN as_IN alcoholic_JJ stimulants_NNS and_CC opium_NN ._.

Mr._NNP Ebden_NNP ,_, Collector_NNP ,_, says_VBZ :_: ``_`` The_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS are_VBP very_RB much_RB cheaper_JJR than_IN liquor_JJR now_RB ._.

Control_NN of_IN bhang_NN ._.
676_CD ._.
The_DT difficulty_NN of_IN controlling_VBG bhang_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, Assam_NNP ,_, the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT Punjab_NNP arises_VBZ from_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ large_JJ spontaneous_JJ growth_NN in_IN the_DT mountainous_JJ and_CC submontane_JJ tracts_NNS of_IN these_DT provinces_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ undoubtedly_RB a_DT belt_NN of_IN growth_NN which_WDT precludes_VBZ strict_JJ control_NN ._.
But_CC in_IN parts_NNS of_IN these_DT provinces_NNS away_RB from_IN the_DT hills_NNS there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ or_CC no_DT spontaneous_JJ growth_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN these_DT parts_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN the_DT other_JJ provinces_NNS control_NN is_VBZ possible_JJ ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT little_JJ cultivation_NN in_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP and_CC the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS ,_, and_CC considerably_RB more_RBR in_IN proportion_NN in_IN Sind_NNP ._.
None_NN of_IN this_DT cultivation_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT Himalayan_NNP region_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT wild_JJ growth_NN exists_NNS ._.

In_IN Bengal_NNP a_DT duty_NN of_IN 8_CD annas_NNS a_DT sér_NN is_VBZ levied_VBN on_IN all_DT bhang_NN brought_VBD to_TO the_DT storehouses_NNS under_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN supervision_NN ,_, which_WDT represents_VBZ but_CC a_DT small_JJ fraction_NN of_IN what_WP is_VBZ illicitly_RB con-_JJ sumed_NN ._.

bhang_NN ,_, which_WDT operates_VBZ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT imports_NNS from_IN passing_VBG a_DT very_RB limited_JJ figure_NN ._.

Now_RB that_IN the_DT habitat_NN of_IN the_DT spontaneous_JJ growth_NN has_VBZ been_VBN clearly_RB defined_VBN ,_, Local_JJ Governments_NNP will_MD have_VB no_DT difficulty_NN in_IN deciding_VBG where_WRB ,_, for_IN the_DT present_JJ at_IN least_JJS ,_, the_DT existing_VBG system_NN must_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO continue_VB ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP think_VBP that_IN it_PRP may_MD be_VB impossible_JJ to_TO treat_VB the_DT bhang_NN which_WDT is_VBZ pro-_JJ duced_VBN in_IN ganja-growing_JJ tracts_NNS in_IN a_DT different_JJ manner_NN from_IN ganja_NN ._.
To_TO do_VB so_RB would_MD probably_RB be_VB to_TO imperil_VB the_DT ganja_JJ administration_NN ._.
But_CC if_IN this_DT opinion_NN is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO be_VB mistaken_VBN ,_, they_PRP would_MD be_VB glad_JJ to_TO see_VB this_DT bhang_NN more_RBR leniently_RB treated_VBN than_IN ganja_NN ._.
The_DT Commission_NNP find_VBP that_IN in_IN the_DT Central_NNP Provinces_NNP bhang_NN is_VBZ only_RB per-_JJ mitted_VBN to_TO be_VB sold_VBN by_IN the_DT wholesale_JJ vendors_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT duty_NN is_VBZ the_DT same_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN ganja_NN ._.

As_IN regards_NNS the_DT distribution_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS to_TO retail_JJ vendors_NNS ,_, the_DT Commis-_JJ sion_NN think_VBP that_IN when_WRB adequate_JJ arrangements_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN for_IN their_PRP$ taxation_NN ,_, not_RB much_JJ interference_NN is_VBZ required_VBN ._.
The_DT evidence_NN contains_VBZ various_JJ suggestions_NNS on_IN this_DT subject_NN ._.
Some_DT witnesses_NNS point_VBP to_TO the_DT large_JJ profits_NNS reaped_VBN by_IN whole-_JJ sale_NN vendors_NNS ,_, and_CC suggest_VBP that_IN these_DT middlemen_NNS should_MD be_VB abolished_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT functions_NNS discharged_VBN by_IN them_PRP should_MD be_VB assumed_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP in_IN order_NN that_IN these_DT profits_NNS may_MD be_VB secured_VBN for_IN the_DT public_JJ revenues_NNS ._.

Mr._NNP Laurie_NNP says_VBZ :_: ``_`` In_IN an_DT agricultural_JJ province_NN like_IN this_DT ,_, the_DT people_NNS are_VBP not_RB given_VBN to_TO formulating_VBG their_PRP$ views_NNS in_IN speech_NN or_CC writing_NN ;_: and_CC 'public_JJ opinion_NN '_POS can_MD only_RB be_VB arrived_VBN at_IN by_IN laborious_JJ research_NN ._. ''_''
In_IN Madras_NNP ``_`` it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN directed_VBN that_IN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN alterations_NNS in_IN the_DT number_NN or_CC sites_NNS of_IN shops_NNS in_IN muni-_JJ cipalities_NNS ,_, a_DT list_NN of_IN the_DT proposed_VBN shops_NNS with_IN their_PRP$ sites_NNS should_MD be_VB forwarded_VBN to_TO the_DT Council_NNP in_IN sufficient_JJ time_NN to_TO admit_VB of_IN its_PRP$ remarks_NNS being_VBG received_VBN and_CC con-_JJ sidered_VBN ;_: and_CC though_IN in_IN the_DT rural_JJ tracts_VBZ the_DT location_NN of_IN shops_NNS is_VBZ at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN Revenue_NNP officers_NNS ,_, representations_NNS from_IN District_NNP or_CC Taluk_NNP Boards_NNP or_CC Taluk_NNP Unions_NNP would_MD invariably_RB be_VB received_VBN with_IN attention_NN ._. Taxation_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS according_VBG to_TO strength_NN ._.
691_CD ._.

Burma_NNP ._.
History_NN of_IN prohibition_NN ._.
692_CD ._.
The_DT province_NN of_IN Burma_NNP stands_VBZ on_IN a_DT different_JJ footing_NN from_IN that_DT of_IN any_DT other_JJ province_NN ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS are_VBP entirely_RB prohibited_VBN ._.
This_DT prohibition_NN was_VBD put_VBN into_IN force_NN in_IN the_DT year_NN 1873_CD and_CC embodied_VBN in_IN the_DT Excise_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1881_CD ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN has_VBZ power_NN to_TO grant_VB special_JJ licenses_NNS for_IN cultivation_NN ,_, sale_NN ,_, and_CC possession_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT power_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN used_VBN ._.
The_DT prohibition_NN arose_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT inquiry_NN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP in_IN 1871_CD ._.
Sir_NNP Ashley_NNP Eden_NNP ,_, then_RB Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, recorded_VBD the_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS regarding_VBG ganja_NN in_IN his_PRP$ review_NN of_IN the_DT Excise_NNP Report_NNP for_IN 1870-71_JJ :_: ``_`` The_DT sale_NN of_IN this_DT article_NN is_VBZ prohibited_VBN at_IN Ram-_NNP ree_NN ,_, Sandoway_NNP ,_, Tavoy_NNP ,_, and_CC Mergui_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP considers_NNS that_IN no_DT further_JJ addition_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO the_DT number_NN of_IN places_NNS for_IN the_DT sale_NN of_IN this_DT pernicious_JJ drug_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ smoked_VBN only_RB by_IN the_DT natives_NNS of_IN India_NNP ._.
Indeed_RB ,_, he_PRP would_MD be_VB glad_VBN to_TO have_VB the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Commissioners_NNPS as_IN to_TO the_DT possibility_NN of_IN with-_JJ drawing_VBG all_DT licenses_NNS for_IN the_DT sale_NN of_IN ganja_NN throughout_IN the_DT province_NN ._.
Its_PRP$ use_NN is_VBZ at_IN present_JJ happily_RB little_JJ known_VBN to_TO the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ;_: at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN there_EX is_VBZ every_DT reason_NN to_TO fear_VB that_IN a_DT taste_NN for_IN it_PRP may_MD be_VB spread_VBN among_IN them_PRP by_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN India_NNP as_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN opium_NN ._.
It_PRP certainly_RB seems_VBZ to_TO the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB desirable_JJ to_TO at_IN once_RB sacrifice_VB the_DT small_JJ revenue_NN derived_VBN from_IN this_DT source_NN and_CC stop_VB the_DT consumption_NN absolutely_RB before_IN the_DT evil_NN comes_VBZ upon_IN the_DT country_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ sufferers_NNS from_IN the_DT cessation_NN of_IN the_DT supply_NN will_MD be_VB a_DT few_JJ of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ labourers_NNS who_WP come_VBP to_TO work_VB here_RB during_IN the_DT rice_NN season_NN ._.
They_PRP must_MD learn_VB to_TO take_VB the_DT want_NN of_IN ganja_NN as_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT discomforts_NNS of_IN a_DT sojourn_NN in_IN a_DT foreign_JJ land_NN ,_, for_IN which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP amply_RB compensated_VBN by_IN the_DT large_JJ earnings_NNS they_PRP obtain_VB ._.

CHAPTER_NN XVII_NN ._.
SYSTEMS_NNP OF_NNP NATIVE_NNP STATES_NNPS ._.
Systems_NNS in_IN Native_JJ States_NNS ._.
696_CD ._.
The_DT foregoing_NN chapter_NN contains_VBZ the_DT views_NNS of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP on_IN the_DT introduction_NN throughout_IN British_JJ India_NNP of_IN a_DT system_NN of_IN excise_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO hemp_VB drugs_NNS which_WDT will_MD be_VB ultimately_RB uniform_JJ ._.
But_CC this_DT uniformity_NN of_IN system_NN must_MD necessarily_RB fail_VB of_IN its_PRP$ purpose_NN unless_IN the_DT co-operation_NN of_IN the_DT Native_NNP States_NNPS which_WDT are_VBP interlaced_VBN with_IN British_JJ territory_NN is_VBZ at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN secured_VBN ._.
A_DT brief_JJ review_NN of_IN the_DT systems_NNS at_IN present_JJ in_IN force_NN in_IN Native_NNP States_NNPS is_VBZ therefore_RB necessary_JJ ,_, together_RB with_IN some_DT remarks_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT desirability_NN of_IN securing_VBG the_DT adoption_NN of_IN a_DT similar_JJ system_NN in_IN those_DT States_NNS ._.
The_DT material_NN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT States_NNPS is_VBZ somewhat_RB incomplete_JJ and_CC fragmentary_JJ ,_, but_CC a_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN inform-_JJ ation_NN of_IN a_DT general_JJ character_NN has_VBZ been_VBN obtained_VBN which_WDT will_MD enable_VB the_DT Commission_NNP to_TO come_VB to_TO some_DT decision_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
States_NNS in_IN the_DT Himalayan_NNP tract_NN where_WRB the_DT plant_NN grows_VBZ wild_NNS ._.
697_CD ._.
The_DT conditions_NNS under_IN which_WDT the_DT wild_NN hemp_NN is_VBZ found_VBN have_VBP been_VBN detailed_VBN in_IN Chapter_NNP III_NNP ._.
Generally_RB it_PRP may_MD be_VB said_VBD that_IN the_DT wild_JJ growth_NN only_RB thrives_VBZ in_IN the_DT Himalayan_NNP tract_NN ._.
The_DT Native_NNP States_NNPS falling_VBG within_IN this_DT tract_NN are_VBP Kashmir_NNP ,_, some_DT of_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP Hill_NNP States_NNPS ,_, Garhwal_NNP Tehri_NNP and_CC Rampur_NNP in_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS ,_, Nepal_NNP ,_, Kuch_NNP Behar_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Assam_NNP Hill_NNP States_NNPS ._.
In_IN all_PDT these_DT States_NNS bhang_VBP is_VBZ produced_VBN ;_: but_CC as_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN bhang_NN in_IN similarly_RB situated_VBN tracts_NNS in_IN British_JJ territory_NN has_VBZ been_VBN pronounced_VBN impracticable_JJ ,_, this_DT fact_NN need_MD not_RB interfere_VB with_IN British_JJ excise_NN arrangements_NNS ._.
Kashmir_NNP apparently_RB produces_VBZ no_DT charas_NNS properly_RB so_RB called_VBN ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT charas_NNS which_WDT comes_VBZ to_TO the_DT Punjab_NNP through_IN Kashmir_NNP is_VBZ accounted_VBN for_IN under_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP system_NN of_IN registration_NN ._.
A_DT little_JJ charas_NN comes_VBZ from_IN Garhwal_NNP and_CC from_IN Nepal_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT amount_NN is_VBZ not_RB sufficient_JJ to_TO disturb_VB British_JJ arrangements_NNS ._.
The_DT cultivation_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ prohibited_VBN in_IN Kuch_NNP Behar_NNP ,_, which_WDT receives_VBZ its_PRP$ supplies_NNS from_IN Rajshahi_NNP ,_, the_DT duty_NN being_VBG credited_VBN to_TO the_DT State_NNP ._.
Ganja_NNP to_TO a_DT very_RB small_JJ extent_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO be_VB imported_VBN from_IN Nepal_NNP ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ considerable_JJ smuggling_NN of_IN inferior_JJ ganja_NN from_IN the_DT Assam_NNP Hill_NNP States_NNP which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN noticed_VBN in_IN Chapter_NNP XV_NNP ._.

The_DT cultivation_NN of_IN hemp_NN for_IN ganja_NN in_IN Hyderabad_NNP is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO amount_VB to_TO 300_CD or_CC 400_CD acres_NNS ._.

Tributary_JJ States_NNS of_IN Chota_NNP Nagpur_NNP ._.
731_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Chota_NNP Nagpur_NNP Tributary_NNP States_NNPS ,_, Seraikela_NNP and_CC Kharsawan_NNP ,_, the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ prohibited_VBN ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ im-_JJ ported_VBN from_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT contractor_NN in_IN Khar-_NNP sawan_NN who_WP holds_VBZ at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN the_DT monopoly_NN of_IN sale_NN of_IN opium_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT other_JJ States_NNPS there_EX is_VBZ no_DT very_RB definite_JJ system_NN of_IN excise_JJ administration_NN in_IN respect_NN of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.
There_EX are_VBP no_DT shops_NNS for_IN the_DT sale_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ,_, though_IN one_CD formerly_RB existed_VBN in_IN Gangpur_NNP and_CC Jashpur_NNP ,_, which_WDT derived_VBD their_PRP$ supplies_NNS from_IN the_DT Government_NNP gola_NN at_IN Ranchi_NNP ;_: and_CC Mr._NNP Grim-_NNP ley_NN ,_, Commissioner_NNP of_IN Chota_NNP Nagpur_NNP ,_, says_VBZ that_IN he_PRP gave_VBD a_DT license_JJ some_DT months_NNS ago_IN to_TO a_DT vendor_NN in_IN the_DT Gangpur_NNP State_NNP to_TO import_VB ganja_NN ,_, though_IN he_PRP can_MD not_RB definitely_RB say_VBP that_IN the_DT shop_NN has_VBZ been_VBN opened_VBN yet_RB ._.
Duty_NN on_IN the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN ganja_NNS grown_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ domestic_JJ use_NN is_VBZ levied_VBN in_IN Udaipur_NNP ,_, Gangpur_NNP ,_, and_CC Bonai_NNP ._.
In_IN Gangpur_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ 4_CD annas_JJ per_NN plant_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN Bonai_NNP 1_CD anna_NN 6_CD pies_NNS per_IN plant_NN ._.
The_DT amount_NN of_IN the_DT Udaipur_NNP duty_NN is_VBZ not_RB mentioned_VBN ._.
In_IN 1883_CD the_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN Excise_NNP ,_, Central_NNP Provinces_NNP ,_, complained_VBD that_IN untaxed_JJ ganja_NN from_IN Sirguja_NNP ,_, Gang-_NNP pur_NN ,_, and_CC Udaipur_NNP was_VBD imported_VBN into_IN Sambalpur_NNP and_CC Bilaspur_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT Commis-_NNP sioner_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Hewitt_NNP ,_, ordered_VBD the_DT chiefs_NNS not_RB to_TO allow_VB ganja_NN to_TO be_VB grown_VBN by_IN any_DT one_CD without_IN their_PRP$ permission_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO keep_VB lists_NNS of_IN those_DT who_WP grew_VBD ganja_NN and_CC see_VBP that_IN they_PRP did_VBD not_RB grow_VB more_JJR than_IN they_PRP wanted_VBD for_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ use_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN no_DT one_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO sell_VB ganja_NN ._.
In_IN regard_NN to_TO this_DT order_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Grimley_NNP ,_, Commissioner_NNP of_IN Chota_NNP Nagpur_NNP ,_, says_VBZ :_: ``_`` I_PRP am_VBP not_RB prepared_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN the_DT Rajas_NNP keep_VB the_DT lists_NNS prescribed_VBD ;_: but_CC I_PRP think_VBP the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT order_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN out_RP ._.

Tributary_JJ States_NNS of_IN Orissa_NNP ._.
732_CD ._.
The_DT Tributary_NNP States_NNPS of_IN Orissa_NNP have_VBP for_IN many_JJ years_NNS constituted_VBD the_DT principal_JJ difficulty_NN of_IN the_DT Bengal_NNP Government_NNP in_IN regard_NN to_TO its_PRP$ excise_JJ administration_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.

These_DT measures_NNS proved_VBD ineffectual_JJ ;_: and_CC ,_, although_IN the_DT consumption_NN of_IN Raj-_NNP shahi_NN ganja_NN may_MD have_VB increased_VBN somewhat_RB in_IN all_DT three_CD districts_NNS of_IN Orissa_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD believed_VBN that_IN smuggling_VBG still_RB continued_VBN to_TO a_DT considerable_JJ extent_NN ._.

Rs_NNP ._.
300_CD a_DT year_NN was_VBD given_VBN to_TO Mohurbhanj_NNP as_IN compensation_NN ,_, and_CC Rajshahi_NNP ganja_NN was_VBD imported_VBN into_IN the_DT State_NNP under_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ Excise_NN rules_NNS ._.
In_IN June_NNP 1882_CD the_DT importation_NN of_IN Garhjat_NNP ganja_NN and_CC bhang_VB into_IN British_JJ terri-_JJ tory_NN was_VBD entirely_RB prohibited_VBN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD not_RB till_JJ 1884_CD that_IN the_DT prohibition_NN was_VBD actually_RB enforced_VBN ._.
Further_RB ,_, from_IN the_DT same_JJ year_NN (_( 1882_CD )_) the_DT policy_NN was_VBD adopted_VBN of_IN levying_VBG duty_NN in_IN Orissa_NNP on_IN Rajshahi_NNP ganja_NN at_IN rates_NNS lower_JJR than_IN elsewhere_RB in_IN the_DT province_NN ._.

In_IN 1889_CD the_DT Bengal_NNP Government_NNP finally_RB concluded_VBD that_IN the_DT experiment_NN of_IN entirely_RB prohibiting_VBG cultivation_NN must_MD be_VB abandoned_VBN as_IN useless_JJ and_CC inefficacious_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT only_JJ way_NN to_TO prevent_VB smuggling_NN was_VBD to_TO legalise_VB importation_NN under_IN suitable_JJ regulations_NNS ._.
Doubts_NNS were_VBD also_RB entertained_VBN as_IN to_TO the_DT real_JJ nature_NN of_IN Garhjat_NNP ganja_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD suggested_VBN that_IN Garhjat_NNP ganja_NN in_IN a_DT particular_JJ form_NN was_VBD looked_VBN upon_RP as_IN an_DT absolute_JJ necessary_JJ of_IN life_NN with_IN certain_JJ influential_JJ classes_NNS in_IN Puri_NNP ,_, and_CC that_DT injury_NN might_MD be_VB done_VBN by_IN encouraging_VBG the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT strong_JJ Rajshahi_NNP drug_NN in_IN place_NN of_IN the_DT milder_NN local_JJ article_NN ._.

''_''
It_PRP was_VBD accordingly_RB proposed_VBN to_TO legalise_VB the_DT im-_JJ portation_NN of_IN Garhjat_NNP ganja_NN at_IN a_DT duty_NN of_IN eight_CD annas_NNS a_DT sér_NN (_( the_DT rate_NN prevailing_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP for_IN bhang_NN )_) ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN the_DT orders_NNS prohibiting_VBG cultivation_NN ,_, whe-_JJ ther_NN within_IN the_DT three_CD miles_NNS limit_RB or_CC not_RB ,_, were_VBD withdrawn_VBN ._.

2-8-0_CD a_DT sér_NN on_IN Garhjat_NNP ganja_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD done_VBN ._.
